Job Description: •	Setting sale and profitability targets for individual fleets and your team as a whole•	Monitoring your fleets sale/service performance and demand.•	Draw strategic plan and carry out implementation accordingly.•	Continuously looking for area for implementation to achieve higher efficiency and Effectiveness of sale/services and factory operations.•	Weekly update and analyze total market situation / customer feedback.•	Prepare monthly production report and analysis.•	Build culture of teamwork and P-D-C-A among factory staff while maintaining excellent staff morale.•	Deal with some major customer account yourself and handle complains.•	Maintains contact with all clients in the market area to ensure high levels of client Satisfaction.
Job Requirement: •	Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if at least 3 years’ experience in similar positions•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.•	Strong time management and result oriented.•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure.•	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities•	Discretion and Dedication

Job Description:
 Develop portfolio strategy of hospital.
 Develop winning road map over competitors by offering best treatment with competitive advantage. 
 To be responsible for product development for hospital.
 Direct and oversee product managers 
 Work with cross functional department to launch new product.
 Monitor portfolio performance with tracking tools, establish corrective measures as needed, and prepare detailed reports for management team.
 Other tasks assigned by Business Development and Marketing Director.
Job Requirement:
 Male or Female
 University degree in pharmacy or medical doctor
 Min 5 years of experience in management level
 Min 3 years of experience leading health care product development or working in hospital
 Detail Oriented with costing analysis person
 Computer Ms. Office skill
 Good written and spoken English language
 Creative and good at problem solving as well as negotiation skill 
 Be able to handle multi tasks

* Benefit:
- Salary is very competitive
- Insurance
- Annual leave 18days
- Special leave 7days
- Sick leave 5days
- Public Holiday
- Seniority
- Bonus

Job Description:
 Own and hit/exceed annual sales targets within assigned territory and accounts.
 Develop and execute strategic plan to achieve sales targets, expand our customer base and account retention.
 Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships with proper strategic key account management system.
 Partner with corporate partner to understand their business needs and objectives.
 Effectively communicate the value proposition through proposals and presentations.
 Collaborate with members of the Marketing team to penetrate key markets.
 Project leads on in-house event and seeking sponsorship opportunities.
 Foster relationships with new partners to achieve desired revenue.
 Influence senior stakeholders within customers' organizations and premier buyers in the industry.
 Investigate factors impacting sales performance.
 Leverage innovations to maximize revenue of traditional and digital assets and products.
 Monitor changes in the industry and leverage them for business opportunities.
 Promote positive relationships with major customers to understand their needs.
 Provide advice when preparing bid documents and integrated proposals for key accounts.
 Provide input on sales incentive structure and key performance indicators to help monitor targets.
 Provide input to the Content Development team based on customer and industry feedback.
 Recommend changes in pricing structures in product lines or products.
 Review sales performance by analyzing performance reports.
 Other tasks assigned by Director of Sales & Marketing.
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor’s degree in business administration, sales, or related field, MBA a plus
 5-8 years’ sales or marketing experience
 3-5 years’ supervisory or management experience
 Relationship management
 Leadership, management, and mentoring skills
 Strategic planning skills
 Knowledge of product and sector
 Financial and business acumen
 Excellent presentation and communication skills
* Benefit:
- Salary is very competitive
- Insurance
- Annual leave 18days
- Special leave 7days
- Sick leave 5days
- Public Holiday
- Seniority
- Bonus

Job Description:
 Serve insurance patients to get best service in hospital.
 Coordinate with insurance companies and patients as well as internal stakeholders to ensure high standard of service level. 
 To be responsible for daily dashboard tracking of insurance revenue and number of patients using insurance.
 Work with marketing team, business development team, product development, PR, cashier, medical team to ensure high standard of service quality.

Job Description:
•	Involve in setting sale target for the team.
•	Meet and exceed the set targets
•	Check and follow-up sales activities and sale plans.
•	Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products, promotion techniques, etc.
•	Focuses sales efforts by studying existing and potential volume of customers to increase our share in the market. 
•	Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; marketing recommendation to management.
•	Educate sales team by establishing programs/seminars in the areas of new account sales and growth.
•	Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the company’s policies and compliance procedures. 
•	Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
Job Requirement:
•	Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if  at least 3 years’ experience in similar positions
•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)
•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.
•	Strong time management and result oriented.
•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure. 
•	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities
•	Discretion and Dedication

Job Description:
1.  Clinical
 Provide radiology services by directing and coordinating Imaging procedures within the hospital. Oversee handling of biomedical imaging equipment by radiographers, e.g. general x-ray machines, Computed Tomography (CT), Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) and other related equipment.
 Enhance patient healthcare by collaborating with different healthcare providers or specialists such as physicians, radiologist, surgeon and ancillary staff.

2.  Managerial
 Responsible for managing the Imaging Department’s day to day operations including planning of daily work schedule of radiographers, Imaging staff nurses and other ancillary staff and managing the patient load in line with keeping a short waiting time.
 Develop, implement and evaluate department policy, Standard Operating Procedures and workflow and ensure that all these are in compliance with the Hospital overall policy and infection control protocols.
 Establish objectives and targets for the Department and participate in quality improvement projects to improve patient safety, patient satisfaction and lean operation
 Prepare and meet the Imaging Department’s financial standard by managing annual budget, monitoring expenditures and identifying variances.

3.  Training and Education
 Ensure that all staff attend all required in house CME and trainings e.g. safety workshops (including radiation safety), infection control and customer service trainings.  

4.  Quality
 Ensure all Imaging equipment are functioning at optimum level and all periodic preventive maintenance (PPM) scheduled for the equipment, are carried out promptly by the Vendor.
 Ensure high diagnostic quality of images produced from various modalities.
 Manage the Picture Archiving & Communication System (PACS) workflow in the department to ensure smooth running of the system.
 Ensure stock level of pharmaceutical and non-pharmaceutical consumables items are adequate at all times.  Par levels of the items shall be monitored closely to ensure the variance between
 Actual physical stocks and that in the Hospital Management System (HMS) be minimized or almost equal.
 Obtain the necessary quotations for intended purchase, from interested suppliers and advise the Management by means of justifications.
 Patient confidentiality and appropriate respect of his or her privacy to be upheld at all times.
Job Requirement:
 Education Level: Diploma, Associated Degree, Bachelor Degree or Master Degree of Medical Imaging
 Work Experience: 5years in technical skill practice and 2 to 3 years shall be in a supervisory position.
 Other Skills: Good interpersonal skills and communication.
 Foreign Language: Good English for listening, speaking, reading and writing.
 Computer Skill: MS Office, Excel, Power Point.
 Have communication skill and technical skill in handling equipment.
 Ability to manage department materials and documents.
 Must be able to communicate with the team and able to solve problems that occurred in the department.
 Good behavior, attitude, manners, diligent and willing to learn new things
* Benefit:
- Salary is very competitive
- Insurance
- Annual leave 18days
- Special leave 7days
- Sick leave 5days
- Public Holiday
- Seniority
- Bonus

job title: ប្រធាននាយកដ្ឋានហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
position: ប្រធាននាយកដ្ឋានហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
Job Description:
 រៀបចំផែនការអាជីវកម្ម ដោយមានការវិភាគយ៉ាងល្អិតល្អន់ជាមូយ (SWOT)
 រៀបចំគោលការណ៍ និងនិតិវិធីគណនេយ្យ 
 ពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
 ពិនិត្យមើលរបាយការណ៍បង់ព័ន្ធ និងកាតព្វកិច្ចពន្ធដារបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
 សម្របសម្រួលការងារជាមួយសវនករខាងក្រៅដើម្បីប្រាដកថាក្រុមហ៊ុនមិនទទួលបានការពិន័យពីនាយកដ្ឋានព័ន្ធដា
 ការអនុវត្តការងារផ្សេងៗ តាមការចាត់តាំងពីអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
 ជួយធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិការប្រចាំខែដើម្បីដាក់ជូនប្រធាននាយកដ្ឋានប្រតិបត្តិការ
 ការអនុវត្តន៍ភារកិច្ចពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងទៀតដែលនឹងត្រូវបានផ្ដល់ដោយប្រធាននាយិកាប្រតិបត្តិ
Job Requirement:
 កម្រិតសិក្សា៖ បរិញ្ញាបត្រឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ ជំនាញគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ក្នុង វិស័យធនាគារ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ទីផ្សារ ឬវិស័យផ្សេងៗពាក់ព័ន្ធ
 បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ៖ យ៉ាងតិច ១០ ឆ្នាំក្នុងវិស័យហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ, បទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការស្រាវជ្រាវ, ការសរសេររបាយការណ៍ ការប្រមូល និងវិភាគទិន្នន័យនិងផ្នែកសុខាភិបាល
 ភាសាបរទេស៖ មានជំនាញភាសាអង់គ្លេសល្អ សម្រាប់ការស្តាប់ ការនិយាយ ការអាន និងការសរសេរ 
 ចំណេះដឹងកុំព្យូទ័រ៖ MS office, MS Outlook, or other analysis applications 
 មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង និងអន្តរបុគ្គលល្អ ការងារជាក្រុម ម្ចាស់ការលើការងារ
 លទ្ធភាពទទួលកិច្ចការងារច្រើន និងសាំញ៉ាំ ដែលត្រូវអនុវត្តក្នុងពេលតែមួយ
 លទ្ធភាពធ្វើការងារដោយមិនមានការបង្គាប់បញ្ជារ
 មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ខ្ពស់ គណនេយ្យភាព ឆន្ទៈការងារ វិន័យការងារ សមត្ថភាពនិងការងារជាក្រុម 
 មានការផ្តល់តម្លៃឱ្យគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមក
* Benefit:
- Salary is very competitive
- Insurance
- Annual leave 18days
- Special leave 7days
- Sick leave 5days
- Public Holiday
- Seniority
- Bonus

Job Description:
Job Summary:
 Responsible for Cutting meat or cheese and packing as requirement.

Responsibility:
 Make sure meat or cheese cut/pack are correctly size and timely as requirement from​​ Customer
 Ensure all meat or cheese cut/pack for customer are good quality
 Make sure all product pick from warehouse to cut/pack are followed FEFO procedure
 Monitoring (CCP3P) Product repacking requirement from HACCP Procedure
 Assist in keeping area and ground clean and neat
 Assist in keeping all company equipment well and safety
 Follow Company Policy and HACC procedure
 Other tasks to be assigned by superior.
Job Requirement:
Requirement:
 High School or Fresh Graduated Student
 At least two years of relevant experience.
 Good commend in English language (Speaking, Writing and Listening).
 Strong interpersonal communication skill.
 Be honest, teamwork, and commit to deadline.
Working Days and Hours:
 Monday to Sunday (Off 1 day)
 Working hour: From 7:30 am to 16:30 pm (Break 1 hour);

Salary and Benefit:
 Salary (Based on work experience)

Job Description:
Job Summary: 
Providing positive impression to all visitors and assisting in variety of administrative and clerical tasks.

Duties and Responsibilities

- Receiving visitors at the front desk by greeting, welcoming, directing them to concerned person
- Serve coffee or tea for potential visitors
- Checking the cleanliness at reception area
- Key in cars and motorbikes repaired expense
- Key in for office stationary and other expense report
- Issued telephone cards and making report
- Issued fuel cards and making report
- Key in employees lateness excuse report
- Daily check lateness of all employees and report to Admin/HR Assistant
- Compile training attendance and update training report
- Help A/P to issued cheques to suppliers (Wednesdays and Fridays)
- Help A/R to call follow up due payment customers everyday
- Others tasks to be assigned by superior.
Job Requirement:
SKILLS AND EXPERIENCES:
 Proficiency in Microsoft word and excel
 Pleasant personality
 Customer service attitude
 High school or University Studying

Working Days and Hours:
 Monday- Half Saturday
 Working hour: From 7:30am to 5:00pm (Break 1 hour);

 Uniform
 Insurance covered

Job Description:
Job Summary:
 Responsible for Service Station and Payment Receiving.

Responsibility:
 Looks after the necessary preparations before the start of operation.
 Checks and re-stocks service station.
 Attends to guest inquiries, request and complaints.
 Assists in welcoming guests.
 Assist cost control in inventory taking.
 Store meats in refrigerators or freezer at the required temperature.
 Ensure the equipment and working area to maintain health and the sanitation standards.
 Assist in keeping area and ground clean and neat
 Assist in keeping all company equipment well and safety
 Receive payment from customer
 Make daily payment receive report
 Other tasks to be assigned by superior.
Job Requirement:
Requirement:
 High School or Fresh Graduated Student
 At least two years of relevant experience.
 Good commend in English language (Speaking, Writing and Listening).
 Strong interpersonal communication skill.
 Be honest, teamwork, and commit to deadline.

Working Days and Hours:
 Monday to Sunday (Off 1 day)
 Working hour: From 7:30 am to 16:30 pm (Break 1 hour);

Job Description: •	Involve in setting sale target for the team.•	Meet and exceed the set targets•	Check and follow-up sales activities and sale plans.•	Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products, promotion techniques, etc.•	Focuses sales efforts by studying existing and potential volume of customers to increase our share in the market. •	Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; marketing recommendation to management.•	Educate sales team by establishing programs/seminars in the areas of new account sales and growth.•	Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the company’s policies and compliance procedures. •	Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
Job Requirement: •	Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if  at least 3 years’ experience in similar positions•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.•	Strong time management and result oriented.•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure. •	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities•	Discretion and Dedication

Job Description:
Monitor company’s advertising and promotion and report to management.
- Carry out planned marketing activities efficiently in timely manner.
- Tracking and analyzing competitors’ advertising and promotion.
- Research and gather relevant market information to analyze latest market trend.
- Developing new initiatives continually to bring products brand to scale further heights.
- Establishing good relationships with media, handling press releases as well as 
  managing web initiatives
- Other tasks assigned by managements.
Job Requirement:
Cambodian nationality
- Bachelor Degree in Sales/Marketing or related field.
-  Minimum 1 year of experience in Sales and Marketing, preferred from automotive 
   industry.
-  Must be able to work well with diverse groups of people from various departments
- Strong interpersonal and communication skill.
- Familiar with MS. Office, Photoshop, Illustrator.

job title: ដំណឹងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ផ្នែកលក់
company_name: Air-King Global Technology and Solution Co., LTD
position: ដំណឹងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ផ្នែកលក់
Job Description:
ការងារចម្បង៖
• ទាក់ទងអតិថិជនតាមរយៈ DATA ដែលមានផ្តល់ជូនដោយក្រុមហ៊ុន
• បង្ហាញផលិតផលជូនអតិថិជន
• ពន្យល់ និងណែនាំអតិថិជនពីរបៀបបង់ប្រាក់
• ការពារ មើលថែអតិថិជនអោយបានល្អ
• ចេះភាសាវៀតណាម(និយាយ និងសរសេរបាន)
Job Requirement:
គុណប្រយោជន៍៖
• ទទួលបានប្រាក់ខែខ្ពស់ ចន្លោះ 330$/ខែ រហូតដល់ 1000$/ខែ
• មានប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ និងរង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្ត
• ទទួលបានអាហារថ្ងៃត្រង់១ពេល(ចំពោះអ្នកធ្វើការដល់ម៉ោង ៩យប់ និងទទួលបានអាហារ បន្ថែមល្ងាច ១ពេល
• ផ្តល់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលលើជំនាញផ្នែកលក់
• មិនមានបទពិសោធន៍ក៏អាចដាក់ពាក្យបាន
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  088 7777 265; 097 4018 924 ipheacambodia@gmail.com Phnom Penh 3rd floor #83D, Sothearose Blvd, Tonle Bassac, Khan Chomkamon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 088 7777 265; 097 4018 924

job title: អ្នករៀបចំបន្ទប់
position: អ្នករៀបចំបន្ទប់
Job Description:
១) សំអាតកន្លែងទទួលភ្ញៀវ បន្ទប់គេង បន្ទប់ទឹក និងគ្រឿងសង្ហាររឹមផ្សេងៗក្នុងបន្ទប់
២) សំអាតបន្ទប់តាមចំនួនកំនត់ដែលថ្នាក់លើបានដាក់អោយ
៣) ប្រមូលសំរាមដាក់ក្នុងស្បោងសំរាម
៤) កន្សែងប្រលាក់ដាក់ក្នុងស្បោងរទេះតាមលំដាប់លំដោយ
៥) រាយការណ៍ដល់ប្រធានផ្នែក នូវរាល់ការខូតខាត បាត់បង់ និងបាក់បែក ក្នុងបន្ទប់
Job Requirement:
១) អាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម
២) មានអត្តចរឹតស្លូតបូត គោរពអ្នកដទៃ ខិតខំធ្វើការ និងមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ចំពោះតួនាទីការងារ
៣) មានសុខភាពមាំមួន កាយសម្បទាគ្រប់គ្រាន់ ទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ 
៤) អាចធ្វើការបត់បែនតាមស្ថានការណ៍ជាក់ស្តែងរបស់ការងារក្រុមហ៊ុន
៥) អត្ថប្រយោជន៍បន្ថែមផ្សេងៗទៀតរួមមាន៖ ថ្លៃអាហារថ្ងៃត្រង់, ការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព និងគ្រោះថ្នាក់, ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ, ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ, ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញបុគ្គលិក, កម្មវិធីជប់លៀង និងដំណើរកំសាន្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំរបស់បុគ្គលិក និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍បន្ថែមផ្សេងៗទៀត

• សូមដាក់ពាក្យតាមរយៈ Email: hr@nakigroup.com ឬប្រព័ន្ធតេឡេក្រាម 081 99 09 59 / 076 2222 769
Company Profile:
Since 2013, Naki Group has grown from a local real estate and property management firm into an investment firm focused on developing the Indo-China belt. With representation in Singapore and Seattle, the Group invests in our 3 key pillars of property development, realty services, and hospitality management.

As a developer, Naki Group has completed Silvertown Metropolitan, a 111-unit condominium in 2014, Woodland Residences, an 84-unit luxury villa gated community to be completed in 2022, and Agile Sky Residence, a 44-storey condominium to be completed in 2022.

As a property management firm, Naki Group have served Silvertown Metropolitan, Woodland Residences, Agile Showroom, TK Avenue Community Mall and The One Mall. In addition to managing medium to large projects, our property management services extend to those smaller shops who require janitorial, pest control and sanitization services.

As a hospitality services provider, Naki Group has maintained a high quality standards of stay to our tenants. From long stay to short stay, we ensure enjoyable accommodation coupled with services of convenience.

Now as a growing real estate company, Naki Group is determined to reach out to larger domestic and overseas projects. On a larger scale, investors both financial and expertise will play a large role in achieving the goal of higher and faster returns to our partners.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resource   081 990 959 hr@nakigroup.com 22nd Floor, Diamond Twin Tower, Koh Pich, Sangkat Tonle Bassac Khan Chamkamorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia 081 990 959

Job Description:

• វេនធ្វើការ៖ ម៉ោង០៦:០០ព្រឹក ដល់ ០៣:០០រសៀល និងម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល ដល់ ១០:០០យប់

Company Profile:
Since 2013, Naki Group has grown from a local real estate and property management firm into an investment firm focused on developing the Indo-China belt. With representation in Singapore and Seattle, the Group invests in our 3 key pillars of property development, realty services, and hospitality management.

As a developer, Naki Group has completed Silvertown Metropolitan, a 111-unit condominium in 2014, Woodland Residences, an 84-unit luxury villa gated community to be completed in 2022, and Agile Sky Residence, a 44-storey condominium to be completed in 2022.

As a property management firm, Naki Group have served Silvertown Metropolitan, Woodland Residences, Agile Showroom, TK Avenue Community Mall and The One Mall. In addition to managing medium to large projects, our property management services extend to those smaller shops who require janitorial, pest control and sanitization services.

As a hospitality services provider, Naki Group has maintained a high quality standards of stay to our tenants. From long stay to short stay, we ensure enjoyable accommodation coupled with services of convenience.

Now as a growing real estate company, Naki Group is determined to reach out to larger domestic and overseas projects. On a larger scale, investors both financial and expertise will play a large role in achieving the goal of higher and faster returns to our partners.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resource   081 990 959 hr@nakigroup.com 22nd Floor, Diamond Twin Tower, Koh Pich, Sangkat Tonle Bassac Khan Chamkamorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia 081 990 959

Established since 2015, SingBuild laids its roots in Phnom Penh, Cambodia with a focus on providing design and build services for our clients. Our dedicated team of Architects and Designers fulfill our clients’ dreams by challenging norms to reimagine spaces whilst managing functionality. It is our commitment to create exciting spaces that resonate with our clients’ needs. Our in-house Civil Engineers and M&E consultants seeks to push boundaries to deliver innovative and sustainable design solutions that uphold the integrity of all projects, where technical aspects are in compliance with internationally acclaimed standards. With project management being one of our many key strengths, we go the distance to bring our clients’ imagination to life.

Our Mission is to Design enriching spaces and continuously build our company with our clients’ Trust to deliver Quality designs with ultimate Precision

Promoting the brand via his personal social media accounts

If you are interested in this opportunity, please send your CV via email to: info@hops-brewery.com or contact +855 (0)93 999 017
Company Profile:
Hops Craft Beer Garden & Restaurant is a German brewery and beer garden located in the very center of one of Asia’s most attractive and vibrant cities: Phnom Penh, Cambodia. The main venue features a craft beer brewery with a beer garden & outdoor grill, a restaurant, an art lounge, private rooms, terraces and a sports bar with high-end billiard tables and electronic darts. Our main location features a full international cuisine with a comprehensive menu.

Unique in Cambodia - our brewery ingredients are 100% natural, imported from Germany and our beer is produced following highest German brewing standards. Our food is generally modern German, occasionally fused with Asian and international cuisines. We use natural local and imported ingredients of highest quality and pride ourselves on top level food preparation with fresh produce only.

We are adding satellite locations around town ranging from a kiosk with craft beer and German snacks, to smaller craft beer restaurants with full German menus of up to 20 items.
The main venue holds up to 200 diners at a time, with 150 servings being a standard evening. Other venues will be able to serve up to 30 diners at a time.

We have developed a standard food offering which is highly appreciated by our international clientele, which is comprised of 50% Cambodian, 25% Asian and 25% international customers. Our food is a mix between German classic and modern specialties, and international options including vegetarian and vegan options.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  093 999 017 info@hops-brewery.com Hops Garden Co. Ltd No. 17, Street 228 12207 Phnom Penh Cambodia 093 999 017

Job Description:
•	Study design briefs (mood board) and determine requirements
•	Prepares work to be accomplished by conducting research, gathering information and materials
•	Prepare rough drafts and present ideas to line manager
•	Work with marketing and creative manager or line manager to produce final design
•	Reviewing final layouts and suggest improvements when necessary
•	Design brochures, flyer, poster, logo, signages, books, magazine, annual reports, advertisements, merchandizes, wall art, certificate, pin, banner, stickers, and other communication materials as required by the Company
•	Ensure final graphics and layouts are visually appealing, follow brand guideline and mood board, and completed on time before deadline
•	Managing graphic designs from conception to delivery
•	Conceptualizing visuals based on requirements
•	Use the appropriate colors and layouts for each graphic
•	Selecting colors, fonts, photographs, layouts and other design elements to communicate creative concepts
•	Thinking creatively to produce new ideas and concepts and developing interactive design
•	Learning how to use a new software or program
•	Keeping up-to-date with industry developments
•	Teaching or lead junior graphic designer/or internship
•	Manage a team of junior designers to ensure all work produced
•	Liaise with third party providers and agencies as and when needed
•	Help to source and manage freelancers as and when required
•	Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor's degree in graphic arts, design, communications, or related field 
•	2-3 Years of experience in graphic design 
•	Knowledge of layouts, graphic fundamentals, typography, print, and the web 
•	Knowledge of Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and other graphic design software 
•	Compelling portfolio of work over wide range of creative projects 
•	Strong analytical skills 

All interested candidates are invited to send your CV, a cover letter, school transcript and other relevant documents, to TUBE CAFE CO., LTD at the following address or via email. 
Contact detail:  Name: TUBE CAFE CO., LTD.
- Address: #03, Street 317, Sangkat Boeung Kak I, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia
- Tel/Telegram: 016 550 564
- Email: recruitment@tubecafecambodia.com
Company Profile: TUBE COFFEE created by 3 Cambodian Shareholders. Tube is inspired by London’s metro system, the underground TUBE, for which its fast speed, reliable quality, and affordability are world-renowned. Naturally, these are the very essence which Tube coffee strives to be. We aim to bring fast, affordable, and quality services to Cambodia just like our underground counterpart, but in a coffee way. As synonymous as the tube is with London, Tube coffee aims to be the same in Cambodia, simply by being a Khmer brand created in Cambodia and made by Cambodians to compete with foreign brands. By using yellow, we hope to present to the world the warmth, freshness, happiness, optimism, and positivity of the Khmer culture. So, hop aboard and enjoy a smooth ride on the Khmer tube.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   016 55 05 64  recruitment@tubecafecambodia.com TUBE COFFEE OFFICE, St.317, Sangkat Boeng Kak Ti Pir, Khan Tuol Kouk, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 016 55 05 64

-	រៀបចំសៀវភៅគោលមុខវិជ្ជាដែលបង្រៀន
-	ដឹកនាំការពិភាក្សា និង ការស្រាវជ្រាវឯកសារថ្មីៗ ដែលទាក់ទងនឹងមេរៀនដល់និស្សិត
-	ចូលរួមវាយតម្លៃនិស្សិត លើមុខវិជ្ជាដែលបានបង្រៀន និង ប្រឡងបញ្ចប់ផ្សេងៗ
-	ចូលរួមរៀបចំផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងមានលក្ខណៈគរុកោសល្យ 
-	ចូលរួមតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំស.ប.ថ.វ និង ស.វ.ស
Job Requirement:
-	មានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬ  បរិញ្ញាបត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ផ្នែកគិលានុបដ្ឋាក
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនមុខវិជ្ជា Adult Nursing និង Fundamental Nursing Methodology រយៈពេលយ៉ាងតិច០១ឆ្នាំ
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍គ្លីនិករយៈពេលយ៉ាងតិច ០១ឆ្នាំ 
-	មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាបរទេស អង់គ្លេស និង បារំាងអាចស្តាប់បាន និយាយបាន 
-	ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី (Microsoft Office, Microsoft Word, PowerPoint ) 
-	មានក្រមសីលធម៌រស់នៅល្អ ថ្លៃថ្នូរ ស្លូតបូត គោរពគ្នា ទៅវិញទៅមក និង គោរពវិន័យស.វ.ស 
-	គំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើម ស្ថាបនា និង កែលម្អ 
-	មានស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវ ធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម មានភាពអំណត់អត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ និងមានសុខភាពល្អ

job title: គ្រូបង្រៀនពេញម៉ោង(សណ្ដំប្រពាធនកម្ម និង សង្គ្រោះបន្ទាន់)
company_name: សាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រសុខាភិបាល (University of Health Sciences)
position: គ្រូបង្រៀនពេញម៉ោង(សណ្ដំប្រពាធនកម្ម និង សង្គ្រោះបន្ទាន់)
Job Description:
-	បំពេញការងារនៅផ្នែកគិលានុបដ្ឋាក 
-	ចូលរួមបង្រៀនទ្រឹស្តី អនុវត្តបង្ហាញត្រាប់ និងដឹកនាំកម្មសិក្សាគ្លីនិកថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រសណ្តំ ប្រពោធនកម្ម និង សង្រ្គោះបន្ទាន់ តាមការណែនាំរបស់សាលា
-	រៀបចំកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន (Lesson Plan) តាមការណែនាំរបស់ស.វ.ស
-	ចូលរួមរៀបចំកម្មវិធីលម្អិតនៃមេរៀន (Course Syllabus) តាមការណែនាំរបស់ស.វ.ស
-	 ជំរុញនិស្សិតឱ្យចេះស្វ័យសិក្សា Self-directed learning 
-	ស្រាវជ្រាវឯកសារថ្មីៗ ដែលទាក់ទងនឹងមេរៀន 
-	រៀបចំសៀវភៅគោល មុខវិជ្ជាដែលបង្រៀន
-	ដឹកនាំការពិភាក្សា និង ការស្រាវជ្រាវឯកសារថ្មីៗ ដែលទាក់ទងនឹងមេរៀនដល់និស្សិត
-	ចូលរួមវាយតម្លៃនិស្សិត លើមុខវិជ្ជាដែលបានបង្រៀន
-	ចូលរួមរៀបចំផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងមានលក្ខណៈគរុកោសល្យ 
-	ចូលរួមតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ ស.ប.ថ.វ និង ស.វ.ស។
Job Requirement:
-	មានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតចាប់ពីបរិញ្ញាបត្រសណ្តំ ប្រពោធនកម្ម និង សង្រ្គោះបន្ទាន់ 
-	វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតដែលមានជំនាញឯកទេសសណ្តំ ប្រពោធនកម្ម និងសង្រ្គោះបន្ទាន់ 
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀននិងបទពិសោធន៍គ្លីនិករយៈពេលយ៉ាងតិច០១ឆ្នាំ
-	មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាបរទេសអង់គ្លេស និង បារំាងអាចស្តាប់បាន និង និយាយបាន 
-	ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី (Microsoft Office, Microsofe Word, PowerPoint ) 
-	មានក្រមសីលធម៌រស់នៅល្អ ថ្លៃថ្នូរ ស្លូតបូត គោរពគ្នា ទៅវិញទៅមក និង គោរពវិន័យស.វ.ស 
-	គំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើម ស្ថាបនា និង កែលម្អ 
-	មានស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម មានភាពអំណត់អត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ និង មានសុខភាពល្អ  ។

job title: គ្រូបង្រៀនពេញម៉ោង លើមុខវិជ្ជា ព្យាបាលការ ឈឺចាប់ និងការព្យាបាលសម្រន់
company_name: សាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រសុខាភិបាល (University of Health Sciences)
position: គ្រូបង្រៀនពេញម៉ោង លើមុខវិជ្ជា ព្យាបាលការ ឈឺចាប់ និងការព្យាបាលសម្រន់
Job Description:
-	ចូលរួមបង្រៀនទ្រឹស្តី និងអនុវត្តត្រាប់ តាមការណែនាំរបស់មហាវិទ្យាល័យវេជ្ជសាស្ត្រ ។
-	ដឹកនាំនិស្សិតក្នុងការសិក្សាអនុវត្តន៍បង្ហាញត្រាប់ ដើម្បីពង្រឹងជំនាញគ្លីនីក (Simulation based Learning)។
-	ជំរុញនិស្សិតឱ្យចេះស្វ័យសិក្សា (Self-Directed Learning)
-	ចូលរួមជា Co-trainer ជាមួយសាស្រ្តាចារ្យបរទេសដែលអញ្ជើញមកបង្រៀនដល់និស្សិតនៅម.វ.វ។
-	ស្រាវជ្រាវឯកសារថ្មីៗ ដែលទាក់ទងនឹងមេរៀន។
-	ចូលរួមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពមេរៀន នៅមហាវិទ្យាល័យវេជ្ជសាស្ត្រ ។
-	រៀបចំសំណួរវាយតម្លៃនិស្សិត ទាំង Formative និង Summative តាមការណែនាំរបស់មហាវិទ្យាល័យវេជ្ជសាស្ត្រ ។
-	ធ្វើកិច្ចតែងការមេរៀន (Lesson plan) តាមការណែនាំ របស់ ស.វ.ស។
-	ចូលរួមធ្វើកម្មវិធីលម្អិតនៃមេរៀន (Course syllabus) ។
-	ចូលរួមលើកគម្រោង និងធ្វើការស្រាវជ្រាវ លើប្រធានបទទាក់ទងនឹងវិស័យសុខាភិបាល និងការងារបណ្តុះបណ្តាល (Medical Education)។
-	ចូលរួមសហការជាមួយមហាវិទ្យាល័យវេជ្ជសាស្រ្ត ក្នុងការពង្រឹងវិន័យ និងវត្តមាននិស្សិត ព្រមទាំងជួយណែនាំលើកកម្ពស់សីលធម៌ និងគុណធម៌ដល់និស្សិត។
-	ធ្វើជាគម្រូល្អដល់និស្សិត ទាំងវិន័យ សេចក្តីថ្លៃថ្នូ និងសាមគ្គីភាព។
-	ចូលរួមវគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលជំនាញអប់រំគរុកោសល្យរបស់ ស.វ.ស។
-	ចូលរួមតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ម.វ.វ និង ស.វ.ស។
Job Requirement:
-	មានសញ្ញាបត្រថ្នាក់ វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតទូទៅ ឬវេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតឯកទេស។
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនណែនាំគ្លីនីក ឬធ្លាប់ជាជំនួយការបង្រៀនអនុវត្តបង្ហាញត្រាប់ (Teaching assistant) នៅ នៃស.វ.ស ។
-	មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាបរទេស (បារាំង ឬ/និង អង់គ្លេស)។
-	ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Microsoft Office ។
-	ធ្លាប់បានចូលរួមវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ESME Course ត្រូវបានផ្តល់អាទិភាព។
-	ធ្លាប់បានចូលរួមក្នុងសកម្មភាពមិត្តជួយមិត្ត (PAL)  នៅម.វ.វ នៃស.វ.ស ត្រូវបានផ្តល់អាទិភាព។
-	ធ្លាប់បានចូលរួមក្នុងសកម្មភាពសង្គមនានា ដែលរៀបចំឡើងដោយស.វ.ស ត្រូវបានផ្តល់អាទិភាព។
-	មានសីលធម៌រស់នៅល្អ ថ្លៃថ្នូរ ស្លូតបូត គោរពគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមក និងគោរពវិន័យ ស.វ.ស ។
-	មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើម ស្ថាបនា កែលម្អ។
-	មានស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវ និងស្មារតីវិជ្ជាជីវៈ។
-	មានស្មារតីធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងមានភាពអំណត់អត់ធន់ក្នុងការងារ។
-	មានសុខភាពល្អ ។

Job Description:
You will be responsible for creating social media campaigns and the day-to-day management of the company’ s social media
properties. Your passion for social media as a communications tool will result in the adoption and implementation of social
media best practices across all social media channels.
The successful candidate will be an excellent communicator, a versatile creative writer, and a team player. You will be an
active participant in data collection and analyses in order to consistently improve the company’ s social media practices over time.

- Build and execute social media strategy through competitive research, platform determination, benchmarking, messaging and audience identification
- Generate, edit, publish and share daily content (original text, images, video or HTML) that builds meaningful connections and encourages community members to take action
- Set up and optimize company pages within each platform to increase the visibility of company’ s social content
- Moderate all user-generated content in line with the moderation policy for each community
- Create editorial calendars and syndication schedules
- Communicating with social media followers, including responding to queries in a timely manner.
- Developing and managing social influencer programs and attend social influencer events.
- Using analytical tools such as Google Analytics, Hootsuite Pro, and Facebook Insights to monitor and evaluate the company’s social media presence and performance.
- Understand the process of Facebook Ads, Google AdWords or similar programs and search engine optimization towards
promoting appropriately the profit goal of the organization
- Preparing monthly reports on social media marketing efforts.
- Plan and oversee execution of campaign schedules and budgets
- Staying up to date on best practices and emerging trends in social media.
Job Requirement:
- Proven working experience in social media marketing or as a Digital Media Specialist
- Excellent consulting, writing, editing (photo/video/text), presentation and communication skills
- Demonstrable social networking experience and social analytics tools knowledge
- Adequate knowledge of web design, web development, CRO and SEO
- Knowledge of online marketing and good understanding of major marketing channels
- Positive attitude, detail and customer oriented with good multitasking and organisational ability
- Fluency in English
- Sound knowledge of necessary software, such as Photoshop, Final Cut Pro, Premiere Pro, Audacity, and other media editing
software
- BS in Communications, Marketing, Business, New Media or Public Relations
Company Profile:

Job Description:
Mainly focus in managing the reputation and communication strategies of mobile companies.
Needs to be a strategic thinker, an excellent communicator, and well-versed in technology trends

*** Responsibilities:
Building and maintaining relationships with journalists, bloggers, and influencers in the tech and
mobile space. Pitching story ideas and press releases to secure media coverage for product
launches, updates, and events.
Preparing for and managing crises that may arise, such as product malfunctions, security breaches, or
negative publicity. Developing strategies to address these issues promptly and transparently.
Planning and executing PR campaigns for new mobile products, including developing press materials,
coordinating media events, and generating buzz in the industry.
Creating compelling content like press releases, blog posts, social media updates, and videos to
communicate key messages and engage the target audience.
Developing and implementing social media strategies to increase brand visibility and engagement on
platforms relevant to the mobile industry.
Managing communication with stakeholders, including customers, partners, investors, and employees.
Keeping them informed about company developments and initiatives.
Staying updated with the latest trends, advancements, and competition within the mobile industry.
This knowledge informs PR strategies and helps position the company effectively.
Organizing and promoting events like trade shows, conferences, and product demonstrations that
showcase the company's products and expertise.
Establishing key company figures as thought leaders by securing opportunities for speaking
engagements, contributing articles to industry publications, and participating in panel discussions.
Measuring the effectiveness of PR campaigns through various metrics, such as media coverage, social
media engagement, and sentiment analysis.
Job Requirement:
- Basic skills in graphic design, video editing, and multimedia content creation can enhance the
impact of PR materials.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills are essential for crafting compelling messages and effectively interacting with media and stakeholders.
- Building and nurturing relationships with journalists, influencers, and industry stakeholders is vital for successful PR efforts.
- Being able to remain composed and develop effective strategies during times of crisis is crucial for maintaining the company's reputation.
- Deep understanding of mobile technology trends and developments is necessary to communicate effectively within the industry.
- Developing unique and attention-grabbing campaigns that differentiate the company from competitors.
- The ability to analyze data and metrics to gauge the success of PR initiatives and make informed decisions.
- Tech industry evolves rapidly, so being adaptable to changes and staying ahead of trends is essential.
- PR specialists often encounter unique challenges that require creative problem-solving to navigate successfully.
- Organizational skills are necessary for handling multiple campaigns, events, and tasks
simultaneously

Job Description:
Job Summary: We are looking for a skilled and innovative Graphic Designer to join our dynamic team.
The ideal candidate will combine their artistic flair with a strong understanding of technology trends
to create visually appealing and impactful designs. You will work closely with cross-functional teams
to translate concepts into compelling visual assets that resonate with our tech-savvy audience.

- Collaborate with the marketing and product teams to understand design requirements and objectives within the tech industry context.
- Create visually engaging designs for a variety of platforms, including websites, mobile apps, social media, email campaigns, presentations, and more.
- Design intuitive user interfaces that enhance the user experience for our digital products and services.
- Develop graphics that communicate complex technical concepts in a clear and accessible manner.
- Stay updated on the latest design and technology trends, incorporating innovative ideas into design projects.
- Prepare and present design concepts to internal stakeholders, incorporating feedback to refine designs.
- Maintain brand consistency and adhere to design guidelines while exploring creative ways to evolve our visual identity.
- Collaborate with developers to ensure design integrity during implementation.
- Manage multiple design projects, adhering to deadlines and prioritizing tasks effectively.
- Keep a strong attention to detail while producing high-quality designs that align with business goals.
- Occasionally assist with basic video editing and motion graphics, creating dynamic visuals for tech-related content.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, or a related field.
- Proven experience as a Graphic Designer, preferably in the tech industry or with tech-related
projects. Proficiency in graphic design software, including Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator,
InDesign), and familiarity with design tools such as Sketch or Figma.
- Solid understanding of user-centered design principles and responsive design concepts.
- Portfolio showcasing a range of tech-related design projects, with an emphasis on digital platforms and user interfaces.
- Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and articulate design decisions.
- Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think creatively to develop unique design solutions.
- Basic understanding of HTML and CSS is a plus.
- Knowledge of animation and motion graphics tools is an advantage.
- Adaptability and willingness to learn about emerging technologies and design techniques.

job title: អ្នកបច្ចេកទេសមេកានិចសង្វាក់ផលិតកម្ម (Mechanical Technician-Production Line)
position: អ្នកបច្ចេកទេសមេកានិចសង្វាក់ផលិតកម្ម (Mechanical Technician-Production Line)
Job Description:
ប្រាក់ខែ៖ ចរចារតាមបទពិសោធន៏ និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៏ផ្សេងៗទៀត

* តួនាទី និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវៈ
1.	ដំឡើងនិងត្រួតពិនិត្យប្រព័ន្ធមេកានិចនៃដំណើរការរបស់ម៉ាស៊ីនផលិតកម្ម
2.	គ្រប់គ្រងលើបណ្តាញប្រព័ន្ធបញ្ជាម៉ាស៊ីនផលិតកម្មសាច់អាហារកែច្នៃ
3.	យល់ដឹងអំពីតួនាទីដំណើរការរបស់ប្រព័ន្ធមេកានិច អេឡិចត្រូនិច របស់ឧបករណ៏ គ្រឿងម៉ាស៊ីនក្នុងផលិតកម្មសាច់ និងអាហារកែច្នៃ 
4.	រៀបចំបណ្តាញ ពិនិត្យ និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាដំណើរការបណ្តាញរបស់ប្រព័ន្ធទឹកភ្លើងនៅក្នុងផលិតកម្ម
5.	រៀបចំតារាងកាលវិភាគតំហែទាំជាប្រចាំ និងជួសជុល រាល់គ្រឿងម៉ាស៊ីន និងឧបករណ៏អគ្គិសនី ក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធផលិតកម្មទាំងមូល មានដំណើរការល្អជានិច្ច
6.	ធ្វើការប៉ាន់ប្រមាណអំពី ទំហំការងារ បរិមាណការងារ រយៈពេល ថវិការចំណាយ និងសម្ភារគ្រឿងបន្លាស់ ដើម្បីបំពេញការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃដោយរលូន
7.	គ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ សម្ភារ ឧបករណ៏ គ្រឿងបន្លាស់ និងកត់ត្រា រាប់ ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
8.	បណ្តុះបណ្តាលបុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់ និងផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធអំពីសុវត្តិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធិភាពនៃការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៏ និងគ្រឿងម៉ាស៊ីន
9.	ត្រួតពិនិត្យរៀបចំទូភ្លើង ទូបញ្ជា គ្រឿងអេឡិចត្រូនិចផ្សេងៗឲ្យមានដំណើរការល្អ និងសុវត្តិភាពខ្ពស់
10.	មានលទ្ធភាពទទួលការងារកិច្ចការងារច្រើន និងសាំញាំ ដែលត្រូវអនុវត្តក្នុងពេលតែមួយ
11.	មានលទ្ធភាពធ្វើការងារដោយឯករាជ្យ
12.	បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមជំនាញ និងចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែក
Job Requirement:
1.	មានបរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ វិស្វកកម្មអគ្គិសនី ឬបច្ចេកទេសមេកានិក ឬ សញ្ញាបត្រប្រហាក់ប្រហែលដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
2.	មានជំនាញ/ចំណេះដឹង និងបទពិសោធន៍លើការងារផ្នែកមេកានិច ទឹក ភ្លើង អគ្គីសនី ចាប់ពី ២ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
3.	អាទិភាពសម្រាប់បេក្ខជនមានបទពិសោធន៏ការងារក្នុងផលិតកម្មសាច់ និងអាហារកែច្នៃ 
4.	មានលទ្ធភាពអាចជួសជុល បរិក្ខា ឧបករណ៏ គ្រឿងម៉ាស៊ីន ក្នុងស្ថានភាពចាំបាច់ និងបន្ទាន់
5.	អាចធ្វើការលើសម៉ោង ឬថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកបាន
6.	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ក្លាហាន មានទំនូលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការងារ និងតួនាទី
7.	គោរពពេលវេលាអោយបានទៀងទាត់មានភាពឆ្លាតវៃក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
8.	មានផ្នត់គំនិតរៀន និងអភិវឌ្ឍន៏ចំណេះដឹងជាប្រចាំ

Company Profile:
HMC Broiler is our supply chain which is created to add value to the slaughtered-aged broilers from HMC farm*. The main business activities are slaughtering activity and supplying channels to the supermarket markets and retail stores.
Product portfolios, from slaughter house of HMC Broiler, guaranteed quality and safety to the consumers. Items ranging from whole bird to cut-up meats, wing, drumstick, half-chicken, chicken feet, etc., aiming to meet daily market demand. Products will be stored in a preserved environment such as cold showcases and cold rooms to maintain stable quality and increase consumers’ awareness on food safety for themselves as well as their loved ones. 
By collecting output from HMC Farm with cost efficient and healthy broilers, HMC supply channel will be able to sell their products with affordable price to our potential clients at various markets. 
Through client-first approach, HMC broiler will have networks of supply chain throughout the country aiming to make sure our product portfolio is nearby and within reach by clients to experience its high-quality products—which affordable price and hygiene is our non-negotiable unique proposition to our customers.

yes, the FIRST and BEST Digital Service Provider, is the only telecommunication company in Cambodia with 100% 4G VoLTE network. Our network is designed for ultra-high-speed usage. Job Description:
** Assists the Branch Manager in various aspects of branch management to ensure the efficient and effective operation of the branch as follows:
a) Meets with current and potential customers to discuss their financial needs; offers appropriate products and services while developing and expanding account relationships; or refers customers to other Bank departments as appropriate.
b) Jointly establishes quantitative sales objectives, with assigned supervisor, on an annual basis; this activity to be integrated with the office's annual marketing/sales plan.
c) Assists in the proper staffing and training of office personnel; ensures staff is trained in all areas of customer service, including transaction processing, operations, product knowledge, and sales.
d) Assists in managing branch staff to maximize productivity and to achieve sales and referral goals.
e) In the absence of the Branch Manager, makes certain that all office operations are performed accordance with established policies and procedures, either directly or through appropriate supervisor, e.g., office balancing, control of vault cash, etc.
2. Performs duties of a Customer Service Representative.
3. Participates with the Branch Manager in establishing specific goals for the office; implements strategies to achieve these goals.
4. Cooperates with, participates in, and supports the adherence to all internal policies, procedures, and practices in support of risk management.
5. Communicates with the Branch manager, other supervisors, and appropriate staff personal in order to integrate activities.
6. Provides timely reporting to the Branch Manager and other appropriate groups or individuals.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor/Master Degree in Marketing, Finance, Banking, Business Administration or equivalent;- Local Candidate is priority;- Proven track record in delivering high quality results in short time frames;- Possess superior communication and leadership skills;- At least 4 years work experience in banking industry;- Have a sound understanding of the credit operation and supervision will be an added advantage;- High proficiency spoken and written of English.- Creative, dynamic, flexible, self-direct and self-motivated team player;- Committed, hard-working, and honest individual;- Willing to work under pressure.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department HR Manager +855964006845 No 217, Norodom Blvd(St. 41), Sangkat Tonle Basak, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia.  +855964006845

Job Description:
•	Manage, implement and support the day-to-day of an IT operational works in an assigned sector.
•	Responsible for end-user’s computer issues and general IT technical supports.
• Weekly report to the line managers but must be immediately report if any critical issues found.
• Maintain Computer hardware and software such as Servers, Printer, Finger Print, Network Devices, Utilities including Virus cleaning, and etc
• Coordinate and implement network security measures in order to protect data, software, and hardware.
• Research, diagnose, troubleshoot and identify solutions to resolve customer issues.
• Responsible for network devices configuration within security methods.
•  All authentication/authorization information must be in a secret way.
• Provide smoothly communication with IT team and user.
• Adapt with company environment and quick learn the new technologies.
• Other technical tasks will be assigned by Senior IT Supervisor.
Job Requirement:
• Hold bachelor’s degree and have 1 to 3 years related experience or equivalent combination
• Have at least 3 years of experience in support and manage system
• Have background in IT Operation
• Possess professional certifications as appropriate
• Have knowledge of current trends in the specific field
• Have ability to handle many tasks at the same time with priority
• Supervise assigned junior technician team assign by the management team in the service
• Have ability to work calmly and thoughtfully in demanding situation
• Have ability to work collaboratively 
• Identify the root cause of the problem then apply appropriate resolution
• Have Microsoft Product Skill and Cisco Networking (preferred)
• Be able to produce continued reporting and monitoring on the defined controls and suggest improvement actions
• Demonstrate analytical skill, problem solving skill, leadership skill and interpersonal skill
• Have good communication (both verbal and writing) skills
• Be able to work under high pressure
• Have good command of English
• Have skills in Server and Networks.

What we offer: 

We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including free meals, 13th month double pay, bonus, and insurance, etc. with excellent career development opportunities to the right candidates. 

How to apply: 

To submit your job application, please go to http://www.chipmong.com/job/senior-officer-support/?action=apply

Important Note: applications submitted via above link only will be considered.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ (អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាចិន)
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ (អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាចិន)
Job Description:
• បើកប្រាក់បៀវត្សជូនបុគ្គលិកគ្រប់ផ្នែកទាំងអស់ ហើយធានាអោយបានថាសាច់ប្រាក់ដែលត្រូវបើកបានទាន់ពេលវេលា និងមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព ។
• កត់ត្រាទិន្នន័យគណនេយ្យ និងលំហូរសាច់ប្រាក់អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ ។
• បែងចែកបុរេប្រទានសាច់ប្រាក់ និងកំណត់ពេលវេលាសម្រាប់ទូទាត់ដើម្បីជូនដំណឹងដល់បុគ្គលិក
• គ្រប់គ្រងសំណើរថវិកាក្នុងការទិញសម្ភារស្តុក និងការចំណាយចាំបាច់ផ្សេងៗ ។
• កត់ត្រាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនអោយបានច្បាស់លាស់ និងធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពតាមកាលកំណត់ដើម្បីធានាថារាល់ទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិត្រូវបានកត់ត្រា និងគ្រប់គ្រងសមស្របតាមគោលការណ៍។
• រៀបចំទុកដាក់ និងរក្សាឯកសារហិរញ្ញវត្ថុទាំងអស់ និងកំណត់ត្រាផ្សេងទៀត អោយបានល្អនិងមានសុវត្ថិភាព ។
• ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលត្រូវបានចាត់ចែងឬកំណត់ដោយប្រធានគណនេយ្យ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ។
Job Requirement:
• ត្រូវតែអាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាចិនបានជាចាំបាច់
• អាយុចាប់ពី 20ឆ្នាំ ដល់ 35ឆ្នាំ
• មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យចាប់ពី 2ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
• មានសញ្ញាប័ត្របរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
• មានចំណេះដឹងអំពីការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Word និង Excel បានយ៉ាងល្អ
• មានឆន្ទៈ និងសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការរៀនជំនាញថ្មីៗ
• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អក្នុងក្រុមការងារ

Job Description: *Main Duties*- Ensure the smooth, efficiency and continuity of the operation at branches to comply with both internal and external compliance and risk management framework.- Ensure the operational processes at branches are effective and adequate to cope with the increasing business and transactional operations.-Being the driver on the continuous process improvements to ensure that the processes deployed at branches are relevant and up to date in line with the changes in the bank businesses.-To ensure that the related system used by branches staff are smooth and effective and other changes made to the systems are properly reviewed and tested before being deployed for operation-Ensure a high level of internal and external customer service-Introduce, implement and monitor processes to manage change, encourage team spirit and communication between departments and across all FTB branch network-Investigate (and correct) customer issues and complaints relating to service quality-Manage and oversee branch expansion-Encourage new branch managers to fulfill their roles more effectively.-Share good work-related experiences to subordinates to develop knowledge.-Responsible for establishing and maintaining customer-bank relationships.-Encourage and motivate employees to perform work to achieve common goals.
Job Requirement: *Skills/ Experiences*-Bachelor’s Degree or MBA in Management, Finance and Banking, or related field.-At least 8-year banking experience with strong leadership in branch management.-A strong desire to work in a team and deal with challenge.-High attention to details and accuracy.-Practical knowledge and experience in branch management.​​ Solid skills in planning, organizing, and problem solving.
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

Job Description:
• Support Admin and HR Manager and executives with daily tasks.
• Scheduling meetings, events and make detail minutes.
• Drafting agendas, booking venues, and sourcing refreshments ahead of each event.
• Make travel arrangements and reservations for managers and staff upon request.
• Assist manager in formulating and distributing administration policies, and updating existing protocols.
• Answer phone calls, provide information to callers.
• Schedule appointments and update calendar.
• Develop and maintain a filing system.
• Printing, scanning and distributing hard copies of documents.
• Greet and provide general support to visitors.
• Develop, implement and improve office policies and procedures.
• Manage and maintain the company's vehicles.
• Control petty cash and making a clearance.
• Supervise and provide technical support on assets and stock control.
• Develop, implement and improve stock and assets system and procedures.
• Count stock, update assets and making report send to Admin and HR manager.
• Purchasing stationery and other office supplies as these become depleted.
Job Requirement:
• Age: 20-30 years old
• Proven work experience as a senior administrative assistant, virtual assistant or executive administrative assistant.
• Understanding of office management and daily operations.
• Advanced computer literacy.
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
• Strong organizational and time-management skills.
• Ability to prioritize tasks.
• Excellent verbal and written communication.

Job Benefits
• Monthly salary
• GPA insurance
• Annual leave 18 days
• Special leave
• Annual bonus
• Annual appraisal
• Others.

job title: អនុប្រធានតំបន់​ បាត់ដំបង, កំពង់ឆ្នាំង, ពោធិ៍សាត់, កំពង់ធំ និងសៀមរាប (ភេទប្រុស) $300+
position: អនុប្រធានតំបន់​ បាត់ដំបង, កំពង់ឆ្នាំង, ពោធិ៍សាត់, កំពង់ធំ និងសៀមរាប (ភេទប្រុស) $300+
Job Description:
១.ការងារគ្រប់គ្រង៖
- ជួយសម្រួលការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃជាមួយប្រធានតំបន់។
- តាមដាន និងត្រួតពិនិត្យការអនុវត្តការងារនៅមូលដ្ឋានក្នុងតំបន់ឲ្យដំណើរការដោយរលូន។
- គ្រប់គ្រងបុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់ឲ្យមានវិន័យការងារល្អ រួមមានវត្តមានការងារ ការពង្រឹង និងជំរុញការអនុវត្តការងារ ការលើកទឹកចិត្ត ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានានា។
- សហការជាមួយផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ទាំងនៅថ្នាក់មូលដ្ឋាន និងការិយាល័យកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ ដើម្បីអនុវត្តសកម្មភាពការងារនៅមូលដ្ឋានរបស់ខ្លួន ឲ្យសម្រេចបានទៅតាមផែនការដែលបានគ្រោងទុក។
- ការអនុវត្តការងារ និងការប្រឈមមុខការងារផ្សេងៗជាមួយការិយាល័យកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ។
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងតាមដានការប្រើប្រាស់ទឹក ភ្លើងដោយធ្វើការណែនាំដល់បុគ្គលិកយាមផ្ទះដើម្បីឲ្យប្រើប្រាស់ប្រកបដោយការសន្សំសំចៃខ្ពស់បំផុត ត្រួតពិនិត្យបណ្តាញទឹក និងរៀបចំវិកយបត្រចំណាយទឹកភ្លើងប្រចាំខែផ្ញើមកកាន់ការិយាល័យរដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្សឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
- ធ្វើការជាមួយបុគ្គលិកយាមផ្ទះនៅក្នុងតំបន់របស់ខ្លួន សិក្សាពីតម្រូវការ រៀបចំសំណើទិញសម្ភារប្រចាំខែ ផ្ញើមកកាន់ការិយាល័យរដ្ឋបាលឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលបានកំណត់។

២.ការងារបច្ចេកទេស៖
- ដឹកនាំ និងចូលរួមក្នុងការរាប់សំបុក និងប្រមូលផលសំបុក នៅតាមផ្ទះនីមួយៗនៅក្នុងតំបន់របស់ខ្លួន និងត្រូវធានាថា របាយការណ៍រាប់សំបុក និងទិន្នផលសំបុកត្រឹមត្រូវ និងមានតម្លារភាព។
- ធ្វើការយ៉ាងជិតស្និតជាមួយបុគ្គលិកយាមផ្ទះ ត្រូវប្រាកដថាបរិស្ថាននៅជុំវិញផ្ទះ មានបរិយាកាសល្អស្របតាមការណែនាំរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- សម្របសម្រួល និងផ្តល់វិធានការដល់អ្នកយាមផ្ទះនៅតាមតំបន់ដែលកំណត់ដោយកក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុននៅក្នុងតំបន់របស់ខ្លួន។
- ប្រមូលព័ត៌មានពីមូលដ្ឋានអំពីភាពរីកចម្រើនរបស់ផ្ទះបញ្ចូលទិន្ន័យក្នុងតារាងតាមដានប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ឬប្រចាំខែជូនប្រធានបទ ។
- ត្រូវដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាប្រព័ន្ធសំឡេង និងបច្ចេកទេសនានានៃផ្ទះក្នុងតំបន់ដែលទទួលខុសត្រូវ។
- តាមដានការងារមូលដ្ឋានឬតំបន់ទទួលខុសត្រូវ អោយបានទៀងទាត់ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យលើគុណភាពនៃការថែទាំបរិស្ថានទាំងខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅផ្ទះ ។
- ចូលរួមការពារកុំឯឱ្យសត្វដែលជាសត្រូវ មកវាយលុកលើសត្វជាមួយអ្នកយាមផ្ទះ។
- ត្រូវដឹងអំពីបញ្ហាដែលបង្កការរំខានដល់ការរស់នៅរបស់សត្វ ។
- ប្រមូលព័ត៌មានទាក់ទង និងការវិវត្តរបស់សត្វ នៅជុំវិញតំបន់គ្រប់គ្រងរបស់ខ្លូន។
- មានឆន្ទះក្នុងការរៀនសូត្របន្ថែម និងស្វែងយល់អំពីស្ថានភាពរស់នៅរបស់សត្វ និងបច្ចេកទេសនានា។
- ផ្តល់ការកសាងសមត្ថភាពដល់អ្នកយាមផ្ទះ ប្រកបដោយស្មារតីសហការល្អ។
- ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតក្រោយការបង្គាប់ការរបស់ប្រធានតំបន់ ។

៣.ការងារហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ៖
- ត្រូវមានការកត់ត្រារាល់ការទទួលប្រាក់ពីការិយាល័យកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ និងការប្រគល់ប្រាក់ឲ្យក្រុមការងារនៅមូលដ្ឋាន។
- គ្រប់គ្រងការចំណាយទូទៅនៅមូលដ្ឋានប្រកបដោយគណនេយ្យភាព និងមានតម្លាភាព។
- រាល់ការចំណាយនានាត្រូវមានវិក្កយបត្រ រាល់វិក្កយបត្រចំណាយត្រូវបំពេញព័ត៌មានឲ្យបានពេញលេញ និងមានសុក្រឹតភាពខ្ពស់។
- រៀបចំឯកសារទូទាត់ចំណាយប្រចាំខែជាមួយផ្នែកគណនេយ្យឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលបានកំណត់។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ ឬ ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ គ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ កាន់តែប្រសើរ។

Job Description: Main Duties- Organize FTB’s events and CSR activities.- Identifying targeted community or group and social needs.- Creating partnerships with clients, employees, suppliers, charities, and other groups.- Lead the team to Raise public awareness of a bank’s corporate social responsibility- Commitments through the bank vision and mission.- Ensuring the bank has a positive impact on local communities and the environment.- Manage, supervise team on Tracking and consistently assess the social need and propose action.- Verify all marketing collaterals effectively and submit monthly report head of department.- Lead the team and Conducting research into best practice.- Preparing schedules work plan and targets.- Lead and motivate team to Spreading the word in schools and local communities about the bank and construction in general. - Perform other duties as assigned head of department.
Job Requirement: *Skills/ Experiences*- Bachelor’s Degree or MBA in Management or related field.- At least 3-5 years experience in related areas.- A strong desire to work in a team and deal with challenge.- Excellent negotiation and internal & external relationship building skills.- Good organizational skill, time management, and team building.- High initiative, commitment, good communication and problem solving skills.- Computer literacy and English language proficiency.
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023862111 hr@ftb.com.kh Phnom Penh Building No. 33 C-D, Tchecoslovaquie Blvd (169), Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 023862111

job title: Manager, IT Security Operation Center Unit
position: Manager, IT Security Operation Center Unit
Job Description: *Main Duties*- Giving advice on security risks by supporting risk based management decisions.- Developing, monitoring, tuning, evaluating, reporting on and maintaining security networks, systems, and procedures.- Collaborating with other IT teams to ensure continuous cyber security improvement and workflows.- Ensuring security incident response team effectiveness and readiness.- Building and developing a team of individual responsible for triaging, analyzing, and responding to security incidents.- Work with related departments to ensure that cash management and movement across the network are in line with the approved process and guidelines.- Recommending tools for automating incident workflows and reducing time to investigate.- Developing security incident playbook and digital forensics procedures.- Overseeing the future of SOC/SIEM goals and strategies.
Job Requirement: *Skills/ Experiences*- Bachelor Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or other related field.- Minimum 2 years of experience in Information Security, IT or related field.- Demonstrated ability to identify risks associated with business processes, operations, technology projects and information security programs.- Knowledge on Windows, UNIX and Linux operating systems.- Knowledge on IPS/IDS, Anti-malware, SIEM, EDR, DLP, etc.- Understanding of relevant industry security standards and protocols including ISO27001 and National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST); Control Objectives for Information.- Experience in routers, firewalls, switches and VLAN security; wireless security.- Experience in Risk assessment procedures, policy formation, role-based authorization methodologies, and authentication and encryption technologies.- Outstanding communication skills; strong critical thinking and analytical skills.- Experience in Networking, System Architecture, Project Implementation.- Prefer industrial certificates: CCNA, MCSA, CEH, CISSP, Security+, CySA+.

Job Description: *Main Duties*- provide consultative performing reviews of system architecture documentation; creation of the scope of work for engagements, conduct security testing engagements on scoped assets, systems, processes, and/or employees; mentor other team members with lesser subject matter expertise.- Perform network penetration, web and mobile application testing, source code reviews, threat analysis, wireless network assessments, and social-engineering assessments to identify and/or validate vulnerabilities and attack chains- Develop comprehensive and accurate reports and presentations for both technical and executive audiences- Works with business teams to identify remediation solutions to security findings.- Builds and maintains pen testing vendor partnerships to further FTB’s mission and goals.- Researches and remains up to date with emerging threats and Threat Emulation methodologies.- Responsible for continued personal growth in the areas of technology, business knowledge, and FTB policies and platforms.- Develops and documents standards and best practices.
Job Requirement: Skills/ Experiences- 2+ years direct or equivalent experience in areas of penetration testing (web application, host, network), exploit development, fuzzing and designing countermeasures to identified security vulnerabilities/risks- A Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science.- One or more professional security certifications such as CISA, CEH, GIAC, GSEC, OSCP or CISSP (or equivalent experience).- Knowledge of attack surfaces in web technologies, networks, modern applications (microservices/containers), and operating systems; and should demonstrate the ability to analyze closed source applications using several off-the-shelf or custom developed tools- Experience with tools such as: Kali Linux, Metasploit, Burp suite, Tenable Nessus, Web Inspect, IDA PRO, Wireshark , scripting and development languages (e.g., Bash, PowerShell, Python, Perl, Ruby, PHP, C/C++, C#, Java, etc.) , Windows, Linux and cloud environment testing- Demonstrate a high level of communication skills, verbal and written.- Offensive security experience in AWS/Azure or certifications in Cloud technologies.- Experience developing Red Team applications, tools and infrastructure (e.g., implants, exploits, C2, etc.)

job title: Relationship Manager (Trade Finance Sale & Financial Service)
position: Relationship Manager (Trade Finance Sale & Financial Service)
Job Description: Main Duties- Lead trade financing team to issue Letter of Credit and Bank Guarantee to target   customers based on Policies of the Foreign Trade Bank of Cambodia.- Focus on sales annual target, with sustainable growth for the long run, through   implementing effective client retention and new client acquisition strategy.- Build good relationship with potential customers, management and staffs, and local   authorities at all levels to ensure that the bank’s trade financing operation going   smoothly and having strong supportive from them.- Ensure that cross-selling activities, such as collecting deposit, transfer, and other   banking product, is widely implemented during loan process.- Enhance key differentiation and value proposition of the bank’s trade financing and VIP   transactions to ensure customers excellence banking experience.- Evaluate quality of corporate officer(s) and work closely with HR to ensure that they   are well-trained and having appropriate experience in trade finance techniques, lobbying   skills, and business communication.- Initiate new trade finance-related products to ensure that trade financing activities   and other services offered to customers are effective in accordance with the approved   policy and complies with applicable laws and regulations.
Job Requirement: Skills/ Experiences- Bachelor’s Degree or MBA in Management, Finance and Banking, or related field.- At least 3- 5 years of experience in related areas.- Good team member and leader with ability to build up rapport with departments and business   units across the bank.- Result-oriented personality with motives to drive and achieve defined targets.- A strong desire to work in a team and deal with challenge.- Good organizational skill, time management, and team building.- High initiative, commitment, good communication and problem solving skills.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

position: Senior Staff of Corporate Development & TB Unit
Job Description: *Main Duties*- Initiate product papers/procedure/ guideline/workflow, do market survey regularly, and propose business requirements related to core banking system, digital platforms and other technological programs.- Prepare product proposal/memo, pricing list, market report, presentation slide and other relevant back-office tasks.- Propose key competition and value proposition of the bank’s corporate businesses to ensure excellence for customers through banking experiences.- Enhance quality of works through training by quality mentors internally and/or externally.- Build good relationship with relevant stakeholders including management, staff and business partners at all levels to ensure that the bank’s corporate business development working smoothly and having strong supportive from them.- Participate with relevant departments/offices to ensure that corporate products/services are complied with applicable laws and regulations.- Implement other tasks as assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement: Skills/Experiences- Bachelor’s Degree in Management, Finance and Banking, or related field.- Good team member and leader with ability to build up rapport with departments and business units across the bank.- Result-oriented personality with motives to drive and achieve defined targets.- A strong desire to work in a team and deal with challenge.- Good organizational skill, time management, and team building.- High initiative, commitment, good communication and problem-solving skills.
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023862111 hr@ftb.com.kh Phnom Penh Building No. 33 C-D, Tchecoslovaquie Blvd (169), Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 023862111

Job Description: Main Duties- Analyze the design of technical system and business models.- Utilize the IT data for business insights.- Collaborate with team member to understand the challenges and provide the appropriate   technology solution.- Able to work on tight schedule and deliver within the stipulated timeframe or SLA   agree/established with stakeholders and within approved budget allocated.- Assists in developing full-scale project plans and associated communication documents   adhering to SDLC guideline, Project & Quality Management Framework, Process & Compliance- Ensure IT related projects are updated and submitted to respective stakeholder timely- Accomplishes financial objectives by forecasting requirements, analyzing variances,  initiating corrective action and preparing/plan and IT budget.- Evaluates and balances the requirements/needs of multiple departments/divisions in   identifying the technical solution that will best meet the identified needs.- Conduct post implementation review for each project undertaken for further improvement- Participates in developing strategic plans for systems/applications development for the   FTB Bank.- Ensure all information related to the project are completed, are kept securely and data   is recorded and accurately. - Provides recommendations on new or enhanced systems, software, upgrades and   modifications.- Be a good minute taker of meetings are required for IT department, IT projects and IT   management meetings. - Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
Job Requirement: Job Requirements- Bachelor/Master in IT / Computer Science or related degree- Minimum 2 years working experience in banking environment related IT BA, IT programming /engineering or in IT project management, IT business analyst, including all aspects of process development and execution.- English writing and speaking proficiency is a must.- Sound knowledgeable of banking products and process- Strong critical thinking and analytical skills to create project analyst, project   requirement, proposals requirement documentations, presentations, create reports and   offer recommendation base on business requirement.- Ability to understand the team’s challenges and develop solutions.- The ability to manage multiple project from beginning to the completion.- Familiar with various types of project management and business analysis software.

Job Description: Main Duties- Support System( Switching & Card Management System)Working with Vendors to implement   project and resolve all system issues.- Keep Monitoring System performance make sure up and running 24/7.- Maintain Switching and Card Management System environment (DC/DR/Testing).- Participates in Switching & Card Payment Project to ensure system functionalities are   properly implemented by following business requirements.- Support with Card Schemes VISA, Master, UPI, CSS… to make sure transactions are working  smoothly 24/7 and a doubt to business requirement.- Develop, evaluate and implement new features of Card Payment system for improving card   products and Card Operation.- Develop System interface (API and ISO message)Prepare Manual, procedure and guideline of   Debit, Prepaid and Credit Card prepare monthly System Performance Report for   Managements and relevant teams.- Perform other tasks assigned by Manager.
