Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description: Position summary : This role has prime responsibility for growing our loan portfolio by determining the financial need and providing solutions to our clients. The position has wide-ranging responsibilities, including building a relationship with clients, analyzing the financial data, writing loan proposals/memos, and managing our growing loan portfolios.Main Duties: -Develop and generate sales opportunities with both new and existing customers-Promote the Bank’s products and services among target customers-Build and maintain a relationship with new and existing customers-Meet and collect information from customers for loan applications-Work with new and existing customers to understand their businesses and -determine options to support them-Process loan contract and other related legal documents-Response with customer complaints and take appropriate action to resolve them-Monitor and follow up to ensure a timely repayment-Operate in accordance with the Bank’s guidelines and policies, and in compliance with  laws and regulations.-Attend the Bank’s training program and continue self-development-Other duties as assigned by the Department Manager.

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

position: Staff, Book Keeping and Internal Payment Unit
Job Description: Main Duties- Handle internal payment process according to the request and demand expenditure on time   of the whole FTB Bank accurately, clearly and timely.- Assist in checking the supporting documents properly according to the set principles   before registration and pay to the supplier to the customer or to the staff.- Assist in controlling the expenses in accordance with the expenditure plan, monitor the   payment properly, adequately and on time to the recipient smoothly, without any missed   or delayed payment by any means.- Assist in checking the registration in the accounting system of all internal expenses,   advance expenses and accumulated expenses in accordance with the standard accounting   procedures of FTB Bank.- Assist in inspecting document and correct the accounting records that were missed, late   or inaccurate for the relevant managers or internal / external auditors to be clear and   sufficient.- Assist in managing the need for expenses according to the set time, such as expenses, - interest, rental expenses according to the contract, and cooperate to inform the   relevant parties about the expiration date of the contract accurately and timely.- Assist in preparing the monthly expense report or according to the needs of the manager   properly and timely.- Assist in Organizing procedures and study to find out the shortcomings of the work   process in the work to improve, solve and provide support and training of staff in the   team for effective and timely work.
Job Requirement: Skills/ Experiences• Bachelor degree in Accounting, Finance and Banking, or related field.• Fresh graduate are encourage to apply, having related experience will be prioritized. • Quick learner with innovative problem-solving abilities.• Willingness to learn and advance within the support team environment.• Good communication skills.
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023862111 hr@ftb.com.kh Phnom Penh Building No. 33 C-D, Tchecoslovaquie Blvd (169), Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 023862111

Job Description: Main Duties:- Developing Content for PR, articles, product descriptions, social media, and the bank's website.- Proofreading and quality control (QC) on content to ensure it is free of grammatical or factual errors and follows all brand editorial guidelines for consistency.- Editing and polishing existing content to improve readability.- Assisting the marketing team in developing content for advertising campaigns.- Conducting keyword research and using SEO best practices to increase traffic to the company website.- Creating persuasive headlines and body copy that will capture the attention of the target audience.- Identifying customers needs and recommending new content to address gaps in the company's current content.
Job Requirement: Skills/ Experience- Bachelor's Degree in communications, marketing, English, journalism, or related field.- Proven content writing or copywriting experience.- Professional, positive attitude with a strong work ethic and willingness to observe and learn.- A portfolio of published articles.-Excellent writing and editing skills.- The ability to handle multiple projects concurrently.- Effective communication skills.

Job Description: Main Duties: - Project management: Provide DBD various teams with strategy, methodologies, structures, skills and expertise, and tools to manage project more effectively. This would also include effective management of SIT, UAT, data migration, production pilot, and more satisfactory delivery of the project. - Vendors Management: To provide recommendation on vendor communication strategies, techniques, and tools to ensure support, solution, and delivery are to be made on time and effective. - Digital banking products/services and customer onboarding: Performs analysis of current digital banking products/services and recommends areas of improvement, innovation, design of new and comprehensive digital banking suite that covers payments, consumer onboarding, credit related products, self-service applications, voice banking services, and online mortgages, etc. furthermore, also suggests the best approach to deliver such banking suite via Omni-channels: mobile, in-branch app/device, ATM, internet, digital bank branch (kiosk terminal and other type of terminals the bank may introduce from in future). - Digital governance: to analyze current digital banking structures at all levels and recommend changes, enhancements, or introduce new structures together with governance models which include managing innovation. The implementation of recommended structures and digital governance models would enable better teams support for internal and external customers, culture changes, stimulate good communication, and digital mind shift throughout the Bank. - Technologies & innovation: Analysis and reckon on digital business enabling technologies (including Blockchain technology) to arouse innovation amongst the Bank employees, as well as help souring such technologies (including dealing and working with FinTech, IT services firms) as well as to give support for technology implementation. - Digital banking strategy: Analysis of businesses across the Bank, define, and recommends the most relevant digital banking strategy, objectives, and ambition for the bank to adapt to encourage digital transformation as well as digital business model that would inspire innovation and leverage businesses performance Bank wide. - DevOps and software development strategies: Analyze pieces of development work and software or applications in production to identify synergies that be used to enforce to DevOps strategy and thus make the two regimes go along with harmony. Apart from this, devise adaptable development methodologies for the Bank development teams to utilize and sustain their work that as a result could endure DevOps strategy. - Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC): Support the Bank development teams in production and implementation of technical guidelines for Software Development management and work in parallel with vendors (if any). - Certification of security implementation: Provide recommendation on deployment of security certificates in production software or applications and support the Bank in obtaining certification letter/certificate for such implementation. The said certification letter would help the Bank to prove its compliance with various to requirements when connected the systems for data exchange. Also, recommend the Bank teams on appropriate mechanisms to manage security certificates to ensure to retirement and renewals on time and without disruption.
Job Requirement: Job Requirements: - Bachelor or higher degree in application development or related fields- Ability to carry out effective communication with departments or units across the Bank- Excellent analytical, presentation, and report/document writing skills- Excellent English proficiency in listening, reading, and writing- At least has 3-year experience in software/digital application development- 2-year experience in implementation and deployment of digital applications/programs to the   markets- Good knowledge in card/digital payment industry and relevant field

Job Description: Main Job Responsibilities:- Manage to ensure all servers and hardware in Data Center are well managed and monitored, resource utilization, health check of Servers, Email system, File server, and other IT systems- Maintenance of AD, file sharing server, mail server, and other systems- Ensure that server security update and patches update is regularly checked and applied- Ensure that all bank’s servers run smoothly (24/7)- Maintain user/role management, perform regular review- Perform or delegate regular backup operations and implement appropriate processes for data protection, disaster recovery, and failover procedures- Responsible for server capacity, storage, and resource planning- Ensure that server infrastructure documentation is up-to-date- Other tasks assigned by the line manager.

Job Description: Main Duties: - To controls on physical cash management along with BMs and Senior Teller to ensure that   cash at branches and ATM are properly controlled and monitored to avoid frauds and   errors, while also work with the finance department on the ATM reconciliation and   investigations if irregularity arrived.- To perform day-end cash count operation with tellers to ensure that segregation of   duties is in place.- To ensure that the transactions performed by Tellers are properly verified and monitored   to be aligned with the matrix, guidelines and procedures in place by performing   necessary verifications on the transactions documents.- To be one of the key custodians of keys to vaults and ATMs and other important assets   such as loan collaterals, etc.,- To manage the filing and archiving process of the branch to ensure that those important   documents are properly stored and can be retrieved when needed.- To control branch stock level such as stationary, forms, etc., and manage branch utility   and security to ensure that branch operation is not disrupted.- Perform other duties as assigned by Supervisor/Manager.
Job Requirement: Job Requirements: - Bachelor Degree in Accounting, Finance and Banking or related field.- Minimum of one years’ experience related to the said position.- Good organizational and time management skills.- Knowledge of, or the ability to quickly learn how to use standard office equipment, such   as fax machines, modern phone systems, and copy machines.- A strong desire to work in a team oriented.- Computer literacy and English language proficiency.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. Job Description:
*JOB DESCRIPTION*
As a BDM in our Cambodia operation, you are expected to have a combination of strategizing, marketing, and sales know-how. Based in Phnom Penh, you will develop the market for our A2000ERP software products and services through creating marketing strategies, sales lead generation, to negotiating and closing deals.

1. You have to identify and exploit new business opportunities to bring in more revenue; by establishing
   - New market development
   - Partnership development
   - ERP Software sales in PP market, and/or 
   - Product study to meet the needs of Cambodian market

2. Reports to the Managing Director; manage a team of sales consultants to achieve our sales objective, manage major client accounts & deliver team targets

3. Identify market trends, customer needs and propose solutions and devise business strategies to meet the company's sales objectives.

4. Create business partner programs, establish channels and conducting business presentations both locally and regionally.
Job Requirement:
1. Business development experience in accounting & business software applications is a great advantage.
2. Dynamic and possess drive to excel.
3. Minimum Degree in Business Studies, Finance, Accountancy, Sales & Marketing or equivalent.
4. ERP software experience is a must.

* DESIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE*
Negotiation, Account Management, Presentation, Selling, Marketing, Sales Process, Strategy, B2B, Networking, Communication Skills, Business Development

* QUALIFICATION*
Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Master's Degree

Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEW• Assist Head of Procurement Unit in preparing annual procurement plan and/or revised procurement plan if necessary. • Prepare bidding documents for each category of procurement based on the sample bidding documents prescribed by Ministry of Economy and Finance. • Prepare and publish notice on bidding. • Sell or provide bidding documents to those who wish to take part in the bidding process. • Receive bidding requests and provide clarifications to bidders if there is any question related to the bidding. • Prepare and manage bidding requests including any relevant documents received properly and safely stored before opening the bidding proposals. • Provide support during bid opening event where bidding requests will be opened publicly with oversight from the Procurement Committee. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit in preparing report or minutes on the opening of bidding request, price consultation, quotes or price negotiation. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit in coordinating technical assessment on bidding requests. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit in preparing a notice on contract award to the winners bidding and copied to all losing bidders. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit in drafting the contract following the regulations and sample contract prescribed by Ministry of Economy and Finance. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit in following up with the implementation of the contract by cooperating with technical officers and other relevant officers. • Coordinate with finance to facilitate payment of the contract amount to suppliers, sub-contractors or consultants. • Assist Head of Procurement Unit to prepare quarterly, semester and annual reports on procurement undertakings. • Perform other duties related as assigned by Head of Procurement Unit.
Job Requirement: ** PERSON SPECIFICATION Knowledge & Experiences• A Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Management, Finance, Procurement, Logistics Management or a relevant field is a distinct advantage.• 3 to 4 years of progressively responsible experience in procurement.• Knowledge of the Public Procurement or World Bank procurement procedures is highly desirable.• Good working knowledge of MS Office application (Word, Excel), email and able to easily navigate the Internet.• Khmer native and fluency in spoken and written English is a plus.** Skills & Abilities• Able to uphold and respect procurement ethics and to conduct activities with integrity.• A team player who demonstrates patience, flexibility and honesty.• A self-starter, who is able to plan and manage his/her own work, takes initiative and strives to meet deadlines.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resources Department  010222019 / 017999255 jobs@villagephnompenh.com Phnom Penh #1159, National Road 2, Phum Preaek Ta Nu, Sangkat Chak Angrae Leu, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010222019 / 017999255

Job Description: អំពីក្រុមហ៊ុន ៖អឹបេន ហាប់ (ខេមបូឌា) ឯ.ក ជាក្រុមហ៊ុនគ្រប់គ្រងលើគម្រោងអគារសហកម្មសិទ្ធអឹបេន វីលិច ភ្នំពេញ និងការិយាល័យធ្វើការរួម ហ្វេកតូរី ភ្នំពេញ។ យើងកំពុងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកដូចខាងក្រោម៖១) សន្តិសុខ (មាន ៣ វេន)៖   - វេន B: ពីម៉ោង ២ ល្ងាច ដល់ ១០ យប់   - វេន D: ពីម៉ោង ៦ ព្រឹក ដល់ 6 ល្ងាច   - វេន E: ពីម៉ោង ៦ ល្ងាច ដល់ ៦ ព្រឹកអត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖-ទទួលបានប្រាក់ខែគោលសមរម្យ -ទទួលបានប្រាក់អតីតភាព-មានការតម្លើងប្រាក់ខែទៅតាមឆ្នាំ -មានកម្មវិធីជប់លៀងផ្សេងៗ-មើលការខុសត្រូវក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន-រក្សាសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ក្នុងខុនដូ-ត្រួតពិនិត្យការចេញចូល	-រក្សាសុវត្ថិភាព -និងមើលការខុសត្រូវលើទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិផ្សេងៗ	ការងារផ្សេងៗដែលដាក់ឲពីថ្នាក់លើ
Job Requirement: - មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18 ដល់ 50 ឆ្នាំ- ចេះអាននិងសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរបានខ្លះ- មានឬគ្មានបទពិសោធន៍អាចដាក់ពាក្យបាន- មានកាយសម្បទាសមរម្យ និងរឹងមាំ- មានអត្តចរិតស្មោះត្រង់ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងយកចិត្តទុកដាក់លើការងារ- មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និងរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់

Job Description:
•	Visit the factories and warehouses of our clients’ suppliers to perform on-site quality inspections. The inspection process includes a visual inspection, functional testing, packaging checks, and any other steps as detailed in respective procedures
•	Record your findings against our clients’ product quality checklists and reference samples
•	Write up inspection reports based on your findings, according to our reporting format Meet tight report deadlines regularly, as our promise to the client is to deliver reports on the same day as the inspection 
•	Receive comprehensive training in our best practices and industry requirements for Soft line/hardline inspections
Job Requirement:
•	Experience in quality management, especially in apparels Soft line products
•	Knowledge of AQL standards, as well as relevant safety and quality regulations
•	Practical experience with Softline industry
•	Good command of English (spoken and written) & Chinese (Optional)
•	Great attention to detail and strong professional ethics
Company Profile: We are a Apparel Trading Company who has been working with customers such as Abercrombie, Urban Outfitters, Polo Ralph, J Crew, LL Beans for the past 20 years. Besides Shanghai, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Indonesia, Philippines, we have recently set up office here in Phnom Penh, Cambodia.

Job Description: 1. Conduct new employee orientation and onboarding so that they can adjust to social and performance aspects of their jobs quickly and smoothly.2. Conduct and facilitate internal, external and refresher training for all VBL staff as need/require3. Execute learning and development needs assessment in order to provide the right learning solutions to individuals, department and the organization as a whole;4. Implement training plans and facilitate training course delivery in order to enable individuals and the organization to acquire the necessary knowledge, skills, and abilities;5. Assist with designing and developing measures of assessment, templates, and other courseware such as presentation slides, participant workbooks, facilitator’s guidebooks, etc.;6. Maintain accurate learning and development records of all employees in order to track and support their performance and career progress;7. Carry out training evaluation in order to measure the impact of learning and development programs rolled out;
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree in education, management, or any related fields.• Minimum 1—2 years of work experience in facilitating training and/or learning and development in food and beverage industry.• Experience designing for instructor-led training sessions, job aids or other printed materials (would be of great advantage).• Knowledge of adult learning, instructional design, business acumen, and process improvement principles; • Ability to use MS. Office (design software would be a plus).• Ability to use MS. Office (design software would be a plus).• Ability to negotiate and influence colleagues at all levels;• Demonstrated competencies in problem-solving, result-orientation, customer-focus, people and team orientation and human relations.

Job Description: Key responsibility   • Set up business portfolio and strategy for acquiring, retaining and up/cross selling.   • Identify potential new customers and Identify cross-selling opportunities.    • Monitor and ensure credit quality in portfolio including assess and manage account risk profile.   • Manage business relationship with KBank clients and offer the integrated financial solution under customer's needs understanding in order to enhance customer profitability.   • Co-analyze the customer's needs, associated risk and company status to develop the financial solution proposition under asset quality management.   • Coordinate with the related departments in marketing and servicing the customers.   • Perform the closely credit monitoring in compliance with the bank's policies or guidance.
Job Requirement: • Educational degree in Business Administration, Finance, Accounting or Economics   • Experience as Relationship Manager in SME, Large-corporate, wholesale banking, Microfinance, credit officer, corporate finance, sale and marketing are valuable   • Knowledge of industry analysis, financial instruments, credit and business analysis   • Excellent English, written and spoken; hard-working; organized; diligent and have leadership style
Contact Info: Contact Information Saranya Lertkittikosol HR Manager 6624706096 saranya.l@kasikornbank.com Phnom Penh #45, Sihanouk Blvd, Corner of Street 59,Chaktomuk, Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 6624706096

Job Description: Job Description:• Manage credit portfolios and strategy for acquiring, retaining, and up/cross selling. • Identify and approach potential new customers for financial support opportunities.• Understand customer’s business, financial needs, and propose the bank’s products and services as the solutions.• Analyze customer’s financials, associated risks and mitigations, and propose loan for credit underwriter’s approval.• Closely Monitor and ensure credit quality in portfolios in compliance with the bank’s policies.• Manage overall business relationship with the bank’s customers.• Coordinate with the related departments to provide support to customers.

Job Description:
• Represent the company for business relationship with business partners in purpose of generating sales performance and productivity. 
• Ensure the company’s branding, PR, and communication are working well to contribute with the company’s short-term and long-term strategies. 
• Handle sales target and responsibility including the sales pipelines, individual clients, SME clients, corporate clients, etc. 
• To be the product champion of the company and drive the strategy and customer-centric for result-orientation: Financial Lease, Lease for SME, Corporate Novated Lease, and Personal Loan. 
• Lead and achieve sales target and team goals. 
• Arrange budgeting to make sure the sales and business growth are aligned with satisfactory profits, brand image and reputation. 
• Ensure that the cost optimization is implemented.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Marketing, Communication, or Psychology. 
• At least 5 years in leadership level. 
• Understanding of the company’s financial sector. 
• Possess leadership and able to manage at Managerial level. 
• Be a Decisive and Adaptable Person. 
• Able to work cross-businesses in the group. 
• Only local candidate (Cambodian).
• Travel to all provinces in Cambodia. 
• Require to travel abroad for further meeting, training, and introduction with BSP Group.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  099667759/092888714 chhin.sun@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 099667759/092888714

Company Profile:
Borey Peng Huoth was founded in 2005 and becomes one of the most prominent Property Development companies in Cambodia today. With our vast expertise in the market, ambition to grow further and a constant drive for innovation, Borey Peng Huoth has been transformed to Borey Peng Huoth Group, which consists of Borey Peng Huoth Property Development, Borey Peng Huoth Construction, and Borey Peng Huoth Shopping Mall.  We have been extending our development projects to the most attractive locations in the Kingdom of Cambodia.

As a matter of fact, due to the growing and expanding operation, currently we are seeking for many qualified and talented candidates to fill the following vacant positions.

including variance analysis of business performance comparing with budget.• Coordinate with business unit heads/managers to build their annual budgets & forecasts to consolidate into one overall customers, tenants, vendors, suppliers, contractors, and consultants.

Job Description:
1.	Contact customers to collect outstanding payments through appropriate communication channels, such as phone calls, emails, and written correspondence.
2.	Collaborate with customers to understand reasons for delinquent payments and resolve any disputes or issues promptly.
3.	Review and analyze customer accounts regularly to identify overdue payments and initiate collection procedures.
4.	Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of all interactions, communication, and payment commitments made.
5.	Develop and execute strategies to enhance cash collection performance, ensuring compliance with company policies and procedures.
6.	Conduct research and investigate reasons for non-payment, including potential credit issues or billing discrepancies, and provide resolutions accordingly.
7.	Collaborate with the Accounts Receivable team to reconcile customer accounts and resolve outstanding payment discrepancies.
8.	Follow up on payment arrangements and negotiate suitable payment plans as required.
9.	Monitor assigned accounts receivable aging, prioritize collection efforts, and escalate high-risk accounts appropriately.
10.	Generate and disseminate regular reports on collection activities, including delinquent accounts, payment history, and collection status updates.
11.	Collaborate cross-functionally with Sales, Customer Service, and Finance departments to address any customer-related issues and optimize the collection process.
12.	Stay updated on industry trends, regulations, and best practices related to collections to ensure compliance and efficiency. 
13.	Other tasks assign by the supervisor/manager.
Job Requirement:
1.	Proven experience as a Cash Collector or in a similar customer-facing role, preferably in a fast-paced environment.
2.	Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build and maintain positive relationships with customers.
3.	Strong negotiation and problem-solving abilities to address customer concerns and delinquent accounts.
4.	Detail-oriented with exceptional organizational and time management skills to prioritize tasks effectively and meet deadlines.
5.	Proficient in using computer software applications, such as Microsoft Office Suite and accounting software, to accurately record and report collection activities.
6.	Knowledge of collection laws and regulations to ensure compliance during the collection process.
7.	Ability to work independently and in a team environment, displaying a high degree of self-motivation and accountability.
8.	Strong analytical skills to identify trends and patterns in collection activities, assisting in streamlining processes and improving overall collection performance.
9.	High level of integrity and professionalism when handling sensitive customer information.
10.	High school diploma required; additional certification or coursework in finance or accounting is a plus.

Benefits
-	13th Salary
-	Pchum Ben/ Khmer New Year Bonus based on company performance
-	Insurance: Accidental Insurance coverage 24Hours
-	Annual Leave
-	Sick Leave

Job Description:
Job​ description:
*HR Tasks:
-Support the company's strategic goals which may help drive the design, planning, and implementation of these programs and policies

-Good command of English

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402 Sangkat Tomnup teuk, Khan ChomkaMorn. phnom penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Process the new student placement test, invigilate, mark the test and contact the interviewer to conduct the interview.• Record and process meeting minutes and other documents for all departments when required.• Input students’ results into database system and commit to human-error-free work.• Maintaining student’s file and properly keep all documents including application forms, receipts and other necessary documents are kept safely, yet easily accessible when needed. • Move Aii students who have paid school fee for semester or year to the next term.• Ensure the staff and student ID cards are issued on time and record and report of ID card issuance including broken ID card for Administration Supervisor (AS). Frequently check with warehouse about ID card and ensure it must not run out of stock.• Be in charge of organizing events either inside or outside the organization/school. Make sure proper checklist of items used in each event are recorded and return back to stock when the event’s finished.• Conduct the student’s opinion survey of American Intercon School.• Conduct the student’s opinion survey of Aii Language Center. • Record and process meeting minutes and other documents for all departments when required.• Make sure new term preparation checklist is done at least one week for the term starts.• Make sure new term preparation checklist is done at least one week for the term starts. Drinking water, coffee, tea and other materials must be checked and report to Administration Supervisor.• Design for internal use.• And other assigned tasks.** Sub-Responsibilities:1. Maintain and record In-and-Out documents, and process In & Out documents to the relevant departments.2. Give reception and make of the Student Certification Letter such as; reference, transcripts, recommendation letter and other official letters.3. Create and update Aii class schedule by term.4. Check and update Office’s stationary and inventory to make sure that they are able to use or replace or lose or buy new.5. Check and update Office’s Fixed Asset to make sure that they have stayed at the same place or moved out.6. Maintaining student’s file and properly keep all documents including application forms, receipts and other necessary documents are kept safely, yet easily accessible when needed. 7. Ensuring the memo, poster, and announcement are posted on the bulletin board regularly.8. Stamping on documents, letter to parents, certificates and other official documents.9. Printing monthly attendance sheet for Aii at the end of the month.10. Design for internal use.11. And other assigned tasks.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor Degree in Management, Education or other related fields.• Administrative and Organizational Skills• Experienced in dealing with administrative affairs in school or education field• Be able to use office applications including Word, Excel, Power Point, and E-mail.• Be able to communicate with team and can complete work with tight timelines and multiple deadlines.**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងាររបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។

job title: គ្រូសេដ្ឋកិច្ច (ថ្នាក់ទី១១&១២)
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូសេដ្ឋកិច្ច (ថ្នាក់ទី១១&១២)
Job Description:
** Overall Purpose of the Role / គោលបំណងរួមនៃតួនាទី : 
លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូត្រូវបង្រៀនសិស្សានុសិស្សឱ្យទទួលបាននូវ ចំណេះសម្បទា បំណិនសម្បទា និងចរិយាសម្បទា ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ ស្របតាមនិយាមគរុកោសល្យ១០០%។

** Scope of Work / ទំហំការងារ :
ក្រៅពីការងារបង្រៀន និងរៀន លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូត្រូវមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់ក្នុងការអប់រំសិស្សានុសិស្សនូវចតុស្តម្ភនៃការអប់រំ ដូចជារៀនដើម្បីមានចំណេះដឹង រៀនដើម្បីមានចំណេះធ្វើ រៀនដើម្បីមានសីលធម៌រស់នៅល្អ និង រៀនដើម្បីចេះរួមរស់ជាមួយអ្នកដទៃ។
Job Requirement:
EDUCATION / ការសិក្សា :
- មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេស ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
- មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ។
- សញ្ញាបត្រដែលទទួលបានចុងក្រោយ : 

** KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE / ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធ:
- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms. Office, Internet/ E-mail ។ល។
- មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេស (ភាសាអង់គ្លេស...)។
- មានលទ្ធភាព/សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ ទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងទាមទារការគ្រប់គ្រងតិចតួចពីគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។
- មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ។
- មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំយ៉ាងតិច។

** KEY RESPONSIBILITIES / ការទទួលខុសត្រូវសំខាន់ៗ
១. ការងារគរុកោសល្យ។
២. ការអប់រំសីលធម៌។
៣. ការងាររដ្ឋបាល។
៤. ការចូលរួម។
៥. ទំនាក់ទំនង។

job title: គ្រូភាសាខ្មែរ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូភាសាខ្មែរ
Job Description: • ការងារគរុកោសល្យ។• ការអប់រំសីលធម៌។• ការងាររដ្ឋបាល។• ការចូលរួម។• ទំនាក់ទំនង។
Job Requirement: ការសិក្សា :• មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេស ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។• មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។ • ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍ :• មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងយ៉ាងតិចពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំ។  • មានចំណេះដឹងលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេសច្បាស់លាស់។• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ឬចំណេះដឹងបច្ចេកទេសដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា MS. OFFICE, INTERNET/ E-MAIL ។ល។• មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេសកាន់តែល្អ(សម្រាប់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូក្រៅពីភាសាអង់គ្លេស)។ • មានគុណវុឌ្ឍិ និងសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រាន់ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារដោយភាពម្ចាស់ការ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។ • មានសមត្ថភាពសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។• មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ។ • មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងមានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។*ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត និងមិនត្រូវបានជ្រើសរើសចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: Senior Staff, Financial Planning & Analysis Unit
position: Senior Staff, Financial Planning & Analysis Unit
Job Description: *Main Duties*- Prepare monthly NBC CAS Credit Reporting.- Prepare monthly NBC Capital Adequacy Ratio (“CAR”).- Prepare monthly CIFRS reports/dashboards.- Prepare monthly FS Analysis.- Prepare monthly Budget Utilization.- Prepare monthly CAPEX reporting/dashboard.- Prepare monthly Management report/dashboard.- Prepare monthly Loan rollforward report/dashboard.- Prepare monthly Cashflow Statement.- Assist in preparing Liquidity Stress-Testing- Assist in preparing Annual Financial Budget Planning.- Assist in preparing business strategies including market & competitor analysis.- Assist in preparing Annual Audited _ FS both Khmer & English.- Assist in preparing Annual Audited _ Letter of Representative Letter.- Assist in preparing annual Business Plan (Word, Excel, PDF).- Assist in preparing Financial Supplementary Report both Khmer & English.- Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement: *Skills/ Experiences*- Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance and Banking or related field.- A minimum of at least 2-3 years of experiences in banking sector.- Good computer literacy in Word and Advance Excel (Power BI is a plus).- Fluent in English both speaking & writing.- Able to work under pressure and tight deadlines.- High commitment with good critical thinking and problem-solving skill.- Good understanding of financial accounting principles and procedures
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023862111 hr@ftb.com.kh Phnom Penh Building No. 33 C-D, Tchecoslovaquie Blvd (169), Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 023862111

Job Description: *Main Duties*- Assist in preparing monthly NBC CAS Credit Reporting.- Assist in preparing monthly CIFRS reports/dashboards.- Assist in preparing monthly CAPEX reporting/dashboard.- Assist in preparing monthly Financial Statements by Branch report/dashboard.- Assist in preparing monthly performance report/Dashboard by Relationship Manager/Credit Officer.- Prepare monthly detailed BS & PL items reconciliation with T24 system.- Prepare monthly BS & PL allocation to each segment/division/department/office/branch.- Assist in reviewing monthly Cost Centre Bookkeeping.- Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement: *Skills/Experiences*- Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance and Banking or related field.- A minimum of at least 1 years of experiences in banking sector.- Good computer literacy in Word and Advance Excel (Power BI is a plus).- Fluent in English both speaking & writing.- Able to work under pressure and tight deadlines.- High commitment with good critical thinking and problem-solving skill.- Good understanding of financial accounting principles and procedures

Job Description: Main Duties- Implement the plans effectively with all the plans that submitted by the management to according the size of work, and lead the implementation to run smoothly, effectively, quality and quantity.- Comprehend the principles and procedures of the bank’s products, services and need to attend every training courses and meetings that related to Bank’s new products and services.- Comprehend the principles and procedures of the (KYC-Know Your Customer) and (AML-Anti Money Laundering)’s policy.- Promote Bank’s product and services to customer through appointment and direct customer contact.- Ability to have good communication with customer both inside and outside.- Prepare Prospect Customer Listing Report contact information.- Manage and prepare customer data, logs and customer reported for easy finding later.- Contact target customer or old customer for announce about product and services.- Prepare product sales report and manage customer contact list.- Willing to sale to achieve sales target.

company_name: SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE BANK OF CAMBODIA (SME)
Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEW• Ensure maintain branch performance including sustainable growth in loans, deposits, number of customers, productivity, revenue, and profitability• Proactively spot business opportunities, put action plans, and implement marketing activities to capture business and increase market share• Ensure key customers of the branch both loan and deposit are well-serviced and retained through an excellent retention strategy• Direction and supervision of the day-to-day banking operations to ensure that the branch is in compliance with the bank’s rules & regulations, policies & procedures, guidelines and instructions and make recommendations and provide feedback to management.• Proactively identify and address areas of customer dissatisfaction, following up and resolving any customer complaints.• Effectively coaches, trains, lead and empower the team to develop their skills, capacities, and achieve best performance and maintain an open, honest and satisfying teamwork environment.• Embrace, drive, and support changes to improve performance and provide better services/products to customers.• Identify potential process/service enhancements, escalate as appropriate and document suggestions.• Performs other duties and responsibilities as defined by Management.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree in banking or other related fields.• At least 5 years of experience in business/performance management and branch operations/administration.• Sound sales and negotiation skills.• sense of understanding about the economic environment and impact of country factors on customer’s business as well as the bank• Good organizational and time management skills• Possess high integrity and effective communication• Strong self-motivation and excellent interpersonal skills• Ability to lead and work effectively in a team environment
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, OCIC Street, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.  093768111

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 No 30, St. 432, Sangkat Toul Tum Poung I, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description: Job Announcement𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎 𝐂𝐨., 𝐋𝐭𝐝., the parent company of 𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎, 𝐓𝐄𝐍𝟏𝟏, 𝐆𝐀𝐓𝐎𝐍𝐈, 𝐑𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐞, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝟑𝟔𝟏° planning to extend across the country, is currently looking for a talented and potential candidate in the position of Senior Fashion Merchandiser.Job Title: Senior Fashion MerchandiserCategory: Fashion, Merchandising, PurchasingJob Summary: Planning and developing merchandising strategies. Analyzing sales figures, customers' reactions, and market trends to anticipate product needs and collaborating with designers, operations, warehouses, and suppliers to negotiate prices, quantities, and time scales.Merchandisers are not fashion designers. He/she stays close to the fashion world and uses their fashion sense and analytical mind to determine how much of each style to purchase and stock, negotiate with manufacturers, and suppliers, and work with fashion designers to determine emerging or existing trends.Job Description:•	Keep up with the latest Fashion trend and communicate regularly with fashion designers in order to blend fashion sense with quantitative analysis by looking at how products have performed in the past and forecast consumer demands for upcoming seasons•	Use fashion knowledge and trend analysis to decide how to purchase and stock a retail store. Decide which new styles to order, which items to reorder, the quantity of each item, and colors and sizes to stock•	Purchase and negotiate with manufacturers and designers to make sure items can be priced in a way that will sell and make a profit•	Determine how each store should be stocked based on store sales performance, different customer demographics, and store environment•	Prepare budget planning for monthly stock purchases for the upcoming season, and present it to management for approval•	Schedule timeline from production, to finish product and delivery to ensure on-time for the season•	Other tasks assigned by Merchandising Manager.
Job Requirement: Requirements:•	BA/BS degree in Fashion Design or related field•	2 years of experience in a product management role•	A strong ability in forecasting, analytical, negotiation, and communication skill•	Understand fashion trend and their demand•	English: usable for medium-professional setting•	Proficient in MS Office and Adobe Suites •	Ability to work independently•	Strong attention to detail*𝐎𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐛𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐭𝐬:• Annual Bonus• Employee Discount• Birthday Package• Other benefitsInterested candidates are invited to submit their updated CV, and cover letter to our email: hr@zandokh.com or 𝙏𝙀𝙇𝙀𝙂𝙍𝘼𝙈: 𝟎𝟖𝟏 𝟐𝟕 𝟓𝟑 𝟓𝟑Join us on Telegram for more job opportunities: https://t.me/zandocareer

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  010 656 242 sokhim.pek@onionev.com Phnom Penh HQ: , #93B, St590, Vllage13, Sangkat Boeng kok, Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010 656 242

We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.

Job Description:
•	Performs sales activities on major accounts and negotiates sales price in consultation with Operation Manager
•	Develop specific plans to ensure assessments of sales productivity
•	Coordinates proper property resources to ensure efficient and stable sales results 
•	Collaborates with Operation Manager to develop sales strategies to improve market share in all product lines
•	Collaborates with Operation Manager to establish and control budget for sales promotion and trade show expenses
•	Interacts with individuals outside the company, including, but not limited to clients, Convention Bureaus, local company Associations, Embassies, NGOs, Government Tourist offices, Airlines, Travel Agents, Tour Operators, competitors and other members of the local community
•	Build and maintain positive relationships with all tenants in order to exceed their needs
•	Anticipate guest needs, handle tenants enquire, and solve problems
•	Create a positive company image in every interaction with internal and external tenants 
•	Maintain a high level of product and service knowledge in order to explain and sell services and facilities to tenants
•	Maintain current company information to be able to provide information to tenants
Job Requirement:
•	Proven work experience as a Sales and Marketing Executive.
•	Knowledge of modern marketing techniques.
•	High-level communication and networking skills.
•	A passion for sales.
•	Understanding of commercial trends and marketing strategies.
•	Good project management skills.
Company Profile:
Since 2013, Naki Group has grown from a local real estate and property management firm into an investment firm focused on developing the Indo-China belt. With representation in Singapore and Seattle, the Group invests in our 3 key pillars of property development, realty services, and hospitality management.

As a developer, Naki Group has completed Silvertown Metropolitan, a 111-unit condominium in 2014, Woodland Residences, an 84-unit luxury villa gated community to be completed in 2022, and Agile Sky Residence, a 44-storey condominium to be completed in 2022.

As a property management firm, Naki Group have served Silvertown Metropolitan, Woodland Residences, Agile Showroom, TK Avenue Community Mall and The One Mall. In addition to managing medium to large projects, our property management services extend to those smaller shops who require janitorial, pest control and sanitization services.

As a hospitality services provider, Naki Group has maintained a high quality standards of stay to our tenants. From long stay to short stay, we ensure enjoyable accommodation coupled with services of convenience.

Now as a growing real estate company, Naki Group is determined to reach out to larger domestic and overseas projects. On a larger scale, investors both financial and expertise will play a large role in achieving the goal of higher and faster returns to our partners.

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន / មន្រ្តីឥណទានជាន់ខ្ពស់ Credit Officer & Senior Credit Officer
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន / មន្រ្តីឥណទានជាន់ខ្ពស់ Credit Officer & Senior Credit Officer
Job Description:
** មន្រ្តីឥណទាន / មន្រ្តីឥណទានជាន់ខ្ពស់
- ១០ នាក់ ការិយាល័យកណ្តាល រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ

** កាតព្វកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបាមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី ទៅដល់អតិថិជនសក្តានុពល
- ធ្វើការសិក្សា វិភាគ វាយតម្លៃលទ្ធភាពសង និងទ្រព្យដាក់ធានារបស់អតិថិជនឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ និងសំណើសុំឥណទាន ដើម្បីដាក់ជូននាយកសាខាឬគណៈកម្មាធិការឥណទានពិនិត្យ និងអនុម័ត
- ថែរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ជាមួយអតិថិជនដែលមានស្រាប់ និងស្វែងរក
អតិថិជនថ្មីបន្ថែម
- បញ្ចេញឥណទានទៅតាមផែនការ ដែលបានកំណត់ដោយនាយកសាខា
- ពង្រឹងគុណភាពនៃការប្រមូល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាយឺតយ៉ាវក្នុងការសងត្រឡប់ឥណទានមកវិញឲ្យបានទាន់ពេល
- បង្កើនទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរក្នុងតំបន់ ដែល ហ្វូតាបាកំពុងធ្វើប្រតិបត្តិការ និងសិក្សាអំពីគូប្រកួតប្រជែងក្នុងតំបន់ព្រមទាំងរៀបចំផែនការ ដើម្បីទទួលបានចំណែកទីផ្សារបន្ថែម
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែ ជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង

** គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី ផ្តល់ជូនបុគ្គលិកពេញសិទ្ធិនូវ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា៖
១. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងទៅតាមបទពិសោធន៍។
២. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ ១០០% ​នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៣. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ ១០០% នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៤. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសារ (ប្តី/ប្រពន្ធ និងកូន២នាក់)។
៥. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់ជីវិត ២៤ ម៉ោង។
៦. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចំណងដៃ អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍បុគ្គលិក។
៧. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់បុគ្គលិកក្នុងអត្រាការបា្រក់សមរម្យ។
៨. ការឈប់សម្រាកអនុលោមតាមច្បាប់ក្រសួងការងារ និងការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
៩. ផ្តល់ឯកសណ្ឋានការងារ។
១០. ផ្តល់ទូរស័ព្ទ និងស៊ីមកាត។
១១. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសំាង $៥០ក្នុង១ខែ។
១២. ប្រាក់ឈ្នួលម៉ូតូ $៨០ ក្នុង១ខែ​ សម្រាប់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន។
១៣. ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្ត ទៅមន្ត្រីដែលសម្រេចបានគ្រប់ផែនការ (Incentive)។
១៤​. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ និងសម្ភារៈប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងៗ​ តាមគោលការណ៍កំណត់របស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬជានិសិ្សតកំពុងសិក្សា ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ គ្រប់គ្រង គណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជូន អតិថិជនមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងអាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម
- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស​ អាចសរសេរ និងនិយាយបានល្អ
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Ms Office Word & Ms Excel
- ចេះបើកបរម៉ូតូ
- ផ្តល់អទិភាពដល់អ្នកដែលធ្លាប់បម្រើការងារ នៅភ្នំពេញនិងនៅខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ

** របៀបដាក់ពាក្យ៖ បេក្ខជន / បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍បំពេញការងារជាមួយ គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី សូមផ្ញើពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារ (CV និង Cover Letter) ជាមួយរូបថត (4x6) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីមុខតំណែង និងទីតាំងដែលចង់បម្រើការងារឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ និងយកមកដាក់នៅតាមការិយាល័យសាខារបស់ ហ្វូតាបា ឬអាចផ្ញើមកតាមរយៈ Email: ​recruitment@futabamfi.com.kh (នាយកដ្ឋានធនធានមនុស្ស)។
- សូមបញ្ជាក់ឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់អំពីប្រាក់បៀវត្សរំពឹងទុក។
- ឈប់ទទួលពាក្យត្រឹម៖ ថ្ងៃទី៣0 ខែកញ្ញា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ ម៉ោង ០៥:០០ ល្ងាច​ (អ្នកដាក់ពាក្យមុនត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្ត)
- សម្រាប់ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម៖
សូមទំនាក់ទំនងផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្ស ទូរស័ព្ទលេខៈ 070​​ 479 333 ឬចូលទៅកាន់គេហទំព័រៈ www.futabamfi.com.khឬ

job title: មន្ត្រីឌីហ្សាញ Graphic Designer
position: មន្ត្រីឌីហ្សាញ Graphic Designer
Job Description:
- បង្កើត និងច្នៃប្រឌិតខ្លឹមសារ ដើម្បីធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយទៅតាម​​តម្រូវការនៃ​ប្រភេទ​​អតិថិជនគោលដៅ និងអភិវឌ្ឍនូវយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តទីផ្សារ​បចេ្ចកវិទ្យា​​​របស់​គ្រឹះស្ថានឱ្យបានទាន់សម័យ។
- គ្រប់គ្រង រៀបចំ រចនា រាល់ឧបករណ៍ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ដូចជា របាយការណ៍សរុប ខិតប័ណ្ណផ្សព្វផ្សាយ នាមប័ណ្ណ ប្រតិទិន សៀវភៅកត់ត្រា និងសម្ភារៈផ្សព្វផ្សាយផ្សេងៗទៀត។
- ច្នៃប្រឌិត និងឌីហ្សាញសកម្មភាពទីផ្សាររបស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ដើម្បីផ្សព្វ​​ផ្សាយនៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយសង្គម អ៊ីម៉ែលហ្វេសបុក គេហទំព័រ...... ឱ្យកាន់តែទូលំទូលាយ ទូទាំងប្រទេស និងសកលលោក។​
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងប្រចាំខែក្នុងការត្រួតពិនិត្យ សម្ភារៈផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ដើម្បីធ្វើឱ្យប្រាកដថាគ្រប់គ្រាន់សម្រាប់ប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ខែ ឬឆ្នាំ។
- ទទួល និងឆ្លើយតប នៅពេលដែលអតិថិជនបានទាក់ទង​តាមទូរ​ស័ព្ទ អ៊ីម៉ែល និង/ឬបណ្តេញសង្គមផ្សេងៗ។
- សម្របសម្រួលជាមួយនាយកដ្ឋានផ្សេងៗ និងអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ដើម្បី​ធ្វើការផលិត​​សម្ភារៈ​ទីផ្សារ។
- ចាត់ចែង និងគ្រប់គ្រងសម្ភារៈទីផ្សារទៅតាមការស្នើសុំ។
- អនុវត្តតាមគោលការណ៍-នីតិវិធី គោលនយោបាយ និងសេចក្តីណែនាំរបស់ FUTABA។
- ការងារផ្សេងទៀត អាស្រ័យលើអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់​ចាត់ចែង។

គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី ផ្តល់ជូនបុគ្គលិកពេញសិទ្ធិនូវ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា៖
១. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងទៅតាមបទពិសោធន៍។
២. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ ១០០% ​នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៣. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ ១០០% នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៤. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសារ (ប្តី/ប្រពន្ធ និងកូន២នាក់)។
៥. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់ជីវិត ២៤ ម៉ោង។
៦. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចំណងដៃ អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍បុគ្គលិក។
៧. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់បុគ្គលិកក្នុងអត្រាការបា្រក់សមរម្យ។
៨. ការឈប់សម្រាកអនុលោមតាមច្បាប់ក្រសួងការងារ និងការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
៩. ផ្តល់ឯកសណ្ឋានការងារ។
១០. ផ្តល់ទូរស័ព្ទ និងស៊ីមកាត។
១១. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសំាង $៥០ក្នុង១ខែ។
១២. ប្រាក់ឈ្នួលម៉ូតូ $៨០ ក្នុង១ខែ​ សម្រាប់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន។
១៣. ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្ត ទៅមន្ត្រីដែលសម្រេចបានគ្រប់ផែនការ (Incentive)។
១៤​. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ និងសម្ភារៈប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងៗ​ តាមគោលការណ៍កំណត់របស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬជានិសិ្សតកំពុងសិក្សា ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ គ្រប់គ្រង
ស្ថាបត្យកម្ម និងឌីហ្សាញ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រ​ដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Ms Office Word, Ms Excel,​ Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketching/Drawing ឬ Auto CAD។
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ ឬចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងនឹងការ រចនា​អាគារ ឬផ្ទះល្វែង និងបោះពុម្ព​សម្ភារៈ​ទីផ្សារដូច​ជា ខិតប័ណ្ណ បដាផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងសម្ភារៈទីផ្សារផ្សេង​ទៀត។
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជូន អតិថិជន មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងអាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម។
- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស​ អាចសរសេរ និងនិយាយបានល្អ។
- ចេះបើកបរម៉ូតូ​ ឬ ឡាន។

** របៀបដាក់ពាក្យ៖ បេក្ខជន / បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍បំពេញការងារជាមួយ គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី សូមផ្ញើពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារ (CV និង Cover Letter) ជាមួយរូបថត (4x6) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីមុខតំណែង និងទីតាំងដែលចង់បម្រើការងារឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ និងយកមកដាក់នៅតាមការិយាល័យសាខារបស់ ហ្វូតាបា ឬអាចផ្ញើមកតាមរយៈ Email: ​recruitment@futabamfi.com.kh (នាយកដ្ឋានធនធានមនុស្ស)។
- សូមបញ្ជាក់ឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់អំពីប្រាក់បៀវត្សរំពឹងទុក។
- ឈប់ទទួលពាក្យត្រឹម៖ ថ្ងៃទី៣0 ខែកញ្ញា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ ម៉ោង ០៥:០០ ល្ងាច​ (អ្នកដាក់ពាក្យមុនត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្ត)
- សម្រាប់ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម៖

job title: មន្ត្រីឌីហ្សាញជាន់ខ្ពស់ (Senior Graphic Designer)
position: មន្ត្រីឌីហ្សាញជាន់ខ្ពស់ (Senior Graphic Designer)
Job Description:
- បង្កើត និងច្នៃប្រឌិតខ្លឹមសារ ដើម្បីធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយទៅតាម​​តម្រូវការនៃ​ប្រភេទ​​អតិថិជនគោលដៅ និងអភិវឌ្ឍនូវយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តទីផ្សារ​បចេ្ចកវិទ្យា​​​របស់​គ្រឹះស្ថានឱ្យបានទាន់សម័យ។
- គ្រប់គ្រង រៀបចំ រចនា រាល់ឧបករណ៍ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ដូចជា របាយការណ៍សរុប ខិតប័ណ្ណផ្សព្វផ្សាយ នាមប័ណ្ណ ប្រតិទិន សៀវភៅកត់ត្រា និងសម្ភារៈផ្សព្វផ្សាយផ្សេងៗទៀត។
- ច្នៃប្រឌិត និងឌីហ្សាញសកម្មភាពទីផ្សាររបស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ដើម្បីផ្សព្វ​​ផ្សាយនៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយសង្គម អ៊ីម៉ែលហ្វេសបុក គេហទំព័រ...... ឱ្យកាន់តែទូលំទូលាយ ទូទាំងប្រទេស និងសកលលោក។​
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងប្រចាំខែក្នុងការត្រួតពិនិត្យ សម្ភារៈផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ដើម្បីធ្វើឱ្យប្រាកដថាគ្រប់គ្រាន់សម្រាប់ប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ខែ ឬឆ្នាំ។
- ទទួល និងឆ្លើយតប នៅពេលដែលអតិថិជនបានទាក់ទង​តាមទូរ​ស័ព្ទ អ៊ីម៉ែល និង/ឬបណ្តេញសង្គមផ្សេងៗ។
- សម្របសម្រួលជាមួយនាយកដ្ឋានផ្សេងៗ និងអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ដើម្បី​ធ្វើការផលិត​​សម្ភារៈ​ទីផ្សារ។
- ចាត់ចែង និងគ្រប់គ្រងសម្ភារៈទីផ្សារទៅតាមការស្នើសុំ។
- អនុវត្តតាមគោលការណ៍-នីតិវិធី គោលនយោបាយ និងសេចក្តីណែនាំរបស់ FUTABA។
- ការងារផ្សេងទៀត អាស្រ័យលើអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់​ចាត់ចែង។

គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី ផ្តល់ជូនបុគ្គលិកពេញសិទ្ធិនូវ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា៖
១. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងទៅតាមបទពិសោធន៍។
២. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ ១០០% ​នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៣. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ ១០០% នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៤. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសារ (ប្តី/ប្រពន្ធ និងកូន២នាក់)។
៥. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់ជីវិត ២៤ ម៉ោង។
៦. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចំណងដៃ អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍បុគ្គលិក។
៧. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់បុគ្គលិកក្នុងអត្រាការបា្រក់សមរម្យ។
៨. ការឈប់សម្រាកអនុលោមតាមច្បាប់ក្រសួងការងារ និងការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
៩. ផ្តល់ឯកសណ្ឋានការងារ។
១០. ផ្តល់ទូរស័ព្ទ និងស៊ីមកាត។
១១. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសំាង $៥០ក្នុង១ខែ។
១២. ប្រាក់ឈ្នួលម៉ូតូ $៨០ ក្នុង១ខែ​ សម្រាប់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន។
១៣. ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្ត ទៅមន្ត្រីដែលសម្រេចបានគ្រប់ផែនការ (Incentive)។
១៤​. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ និងសម្ភារៈប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងៗ​ តាមគោលការណ៍កំណត់របស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬជានិសិ្សតកំពុងសិក្សា ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ គ្រប់គ្រង
ស្ថាបត្យកម្ម និងឌីហ្សាញ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រ​ដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Ms Office Word, Ms Excel,​ Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketching/Drawing ឬ Auto CAD។
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ ឬចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងនឹងការ រចនា​អាគារ ឬផ្ទះល្វែង និងបោះពុម្ព​សម្ភារៈ​ទីផ្សារដូច​ជា ខិតប័ណ្ណ បដាផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងសម្ភារៈទីផ្សារផ្សេង​ទៀត។
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជូន អតិថិជន មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងអាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម។
- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស​ អាចសរសេរ និងនិយាយបានល្អ។
- ចេះបើកបរម៉ូតូ​ ឬ ឡាន។

** របៀបដាក់ពាក្យ៖ បេក្ខជន / បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍បំពេញការងារជាមួយ គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី សូមផ្ញើពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារ (CV និង Cover Letter) ជាមួយរូបថត (4x6) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីមុខតំណែង និងទីតាំងដែលចង់បម្រើការងារឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ និងយកមកដាក់នៅតាមការិយាល័យសាខារបស់ ហ្វូតាបា ឬអាចផ្ញើមកតាមរយៈ Email: ​recruitment@futabamfi.com.kh (នាយកដ្ឋានធនធានមនុស្ស)។

- ឈប់ទទួលពាក្យត្រឹម៖ ថ្ងៃទី៣0 ខែកញ្ញា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ ម៉ោង ០៥:០០ ល្ងាច​ (អ្នកដាក់ពាក្យមុនត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្ត)

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement:
-Bachelor's associate or degree or relate to field.
- Basic English & Chinese is plus.
-At least two years experience in sales.
-Problem solving skills.
-Acknowledge at computer skill (Microsoft, outlook).
-high commitment 
-Support team when needed.
