Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Company Profile: Toyota (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. is a sole exclusive distributor for all TOYOTA vehicles, Genuine Parts and Quality Service in the Kingdom of Cambodia. With the endless and massive support from our manufacturer, we have always taken into consideration regarding the right selection of suitable products into Cambodian market. As a result, many different varieties of TOYOTA models have been introduced to satisfy our customer's needs and wants.

Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Company Profile:
Since 2013, Naki Group has grown from a local real estate and property management firm into an investment firm focused on developing the Indo-China belt. With representation in Singapore and Seattle, the Group invests in our 3 key pillars of property development, realty services, and hospitality management.

As a developer, Naki Group has completed Silvertown Metropolitan, a 111-unit condominium in 2014, Woodland Residences, an 84-unit luxury villa gated community to be completed in 2022, and Agile Sky Residence, a 44-storey condominium to be completed in 2022.

As a property management firm, Naki Group have served Silvertown Metropolitan, Woodland Residences, Agile Showroom, TK Avenue Community Mall and The One Mall. In addition to managing medium to large projects, our property management services extend to those smaller shops who require janitorial, pest control and sanitization services.

As a hospitality services provider, Naki Group has maintained a high quality standards of stay to our tenants. From long stay to short stay, we ensure enjoyable accommodation coupled with services of convenience.

Now as a growing real estate company, Naki Group is determined to reach out to larger domestic and overseas projects. On a larger scale, investors both financial and expertise will play a large role in achieving the goal of higher and faster returns to our partners.

Job Description:
•	Responsible for efficient purchasing of inventory, supplies, and capital equipment. Receives purchase requisitions and verifies for accuracy and authorizations
•	Prepares and issues purchase orders, determines and negotiates prices, delivery and credit terms, buys according to established company policies and procedures, maintains accurate purchase records
•	Responsible for evaluating, assessing and selecting vendors based on capabilities, performance and consistent quality. Evaluates and recommends new/substitute vendors, when necessary
•	Maintains rapport and good working relationships with vendors, keep accurate vendor records
•	Evaluates inventory reorder levels and quantity price breaks to determine most economical purchasing of inventory and supplies. Prepares monthly reports and reviews forecast of purchasing commitments with Superior
•	Expedites purchase orders as necessary and ensures delivery of purchased items for uninterrupted flow
•	Direct the allocation of materials, supplies, and finished products
•	Design strategies to minimize the cost or time required to move goods
•	Review the success of logistical functions identify areas for improvement
•	Lead a team of storage/warehousing personnel through process of counting and recording inventory
•	Responsible for actual inventory counts, must be knowledgeable about inventory items to be counted, the counting procedures used and location of all inventories
•	Identify items as coming from or belonging to customer, keep those items segregated from other materials and maintain control of customer inventory
•	Develop and maintain the master inventory list
•	Manages loading and unloading of all delivery trucks. Assures compliance with workplace safety procedures. Limits access to Stores/warehouses by unauthorized individuals
•	Receives and inspects external packaging of all incoming shipments. Notifies delivery personal of any apparent shipping damage and proceeds accordingly
•	Responsible for receiving and delivering goods from suppliers/vendors/customers as required, monitors carriers’ performance and tariff charges and determines best carriers for the most cost-effective and reliable delivery within established standards
•	Manage vehicles belong to the company by proper maintenance and up keeping 
•	Plan, recruit, train persons for purchase, warehouse, transportation and logistics 
•	Performs other purchasing or inventory control duties as necessary or as requested.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree majoring in business administration or accounting or equivalent - Master degree in relevant field will be preferred
•	At least five years’ experience in the Purchasing and warehouse field and at least 2 years in managerial positions
•	Proficient in all Microsoft Office applications
•	Good command of English
•	Procurement and negotiation skills 
•	Knowledge on Incoterms 
•	Aware of import and export procedures and documentation requirements 
•	Able to coordinate and motivate a team towards a common goal.

** Salary and Benefits
•	Competitive salary, which is negotiable, based on experiences and work duration;
•	Annual salary increment 
•	Annual incentive bonus
•	Annual staff party and trip
•	Seniority pay
•	Public insurance (NSSF)
•	Internal and external training of both soft and hard skills

Job Description:
•	Responsible to plan, organize, direct and evaluate all operation and maintenance functions. Is responsible for both the operations and administrative requirements of the Water Department. The Operations Manager will ensure proper operation of Water Treatment Plant and Distribution System, as well as the installation, maintenance and repair of all Water System Facilities. Utilizing subordinate staff in a coordinated effort prioritizes, assigns, reviews, evaluates and schedules all work. The Operations Manager is responsible to establish the culture, appearance and reliable function of well-maintained WTP facilities and equipment; and is the lead customer service person in the field. Should work under the administrative direction of the Director; cooperates and assists in planning, constructing and inspecting both self-constructed and contracted system improvements. The Operations Manager must communicate professionally and effectively verbally and in writing.

•	The Operations Manager is responsible for the administrative functions of the Water Department including: Operations employee safety program implementation and updates; management of staff including schedules, setting and enforcing performance standards and enforcing Company personnel policies including performance evaluation and related documentation; Compliance with water sampling schedules for water analysis; implementation of the maintenance plans, capital improvement plans and other programs; preparing and submitting required reports to the Director; preparing department budget and monitoring budget performance, and managing accounts payables/Receivables for the department. Operation Manager will attend and prepare for meetings on a routine basis and as assigned. Further, will operate on a rotating "On-Call" basis as needed or under emergency conditions or in the event of absences.
Essential Job Functions and Responsibilities:

1. Water Treatment Plant Operations
•	Establishes work priorities and sequence, assigns work and manages all operations work performance focusing on efficiency, work quality, cost, schedules and related customer service
•	Fully implements all maintenance plans and programs including equipment, buildings, premises and reports to management as required
•	Timely and accurate completion of all required management reports, including operation and maintenance reports
•	Timely compliance with all regulatory agency mandates, permit requirements, water sampling and analysis schedules and government mandated actions and programs
•	Implementation and update of the safety program
•	Coordinate and communicate operations activities with the Admin Supervisor on the appropriate personnel schedules
•	Manage field personnel including hiring, training and coaching, assisting in job description and personnel updates, monitor and conduct written performance evaluations, develop performance improvement plans, document performance concerns and recommend/provide documentation supporting disciplinary action, develop training and development plans.  

2.	Pipe laying/Installation (Projects)
•	Initiates conducting surveys within the Licensee areas feasible to lay water pipes with emphasis of the population in the area
•	Studying and understanding piping route designs and proper delegation to construction supervisors in the implementation of piping installation works.
•	Planning and preparing schedule for finishing work within deadlines
•	Ensuring pipe laying efficiency of the piping system
•	Allocating responsibilities to workers and usage of Equipment
•	Ensuring that the job progresses as per schedule
•	Must show good leadership skills while in the field Meeting with Technical team, in order to discuss plans and clarify installation process
•	Travel to the place of work and take note of workers attitude in accomplishing their tasks and usage of equipment
•	Implementing and ensuring safety measures in the place of work
•	Prepare estimates of the piping work
•	Document various stages of development of the project
•	May have to make regular presentations regarding the progress of work
•	May have to train subordinates.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelors in engineering in Mechanical/Chemical engineering/BS Chemical and other related courses is the most preferred degree for good prospects
•	Work experience as junior or assistant engineers is required with a minimum experience of 3 years’ experience of increasingly responsible in Water Treatment plant and distribution operations and maintenance experience, in lead supervisory responsibility
•	Must have a working knowledge of the use and application of office business software’s including Microsoft word and excel and other applications.

* Salary and Benefits
•	Competitive salary, which is negotiable, based on experiences and work duration;
•	Annual salary increment 
•	Annual incentive bonus
•	Annual staff party and trip
•	Seniority pays
•	Public insurance (NSSF)
•	Internal and external training of both soft and hard skills.

position: ជំនួយការជាងបាញ់ថ្នាំ (បុគ្គលិតហាត់ការ)
Job Description: 1.អនុវត្តតាមផែនការដែលប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ។ 2.មានការពន្យល់ អំពីនិតីវិធីក្នុងការរៀនបាញ់ថ្នាំរថយន្ត និងបិទស្ទិតគ័រលើជញ្ជាំងឡាន និងលើកញ្ចក់។3.រៀនស្តាប់ និងមើល ឆ្ងល់ច្រើន ហ៊ានសួរ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម ខិតខំ ប្រឹងប្រែង តស៊ូ អត់ធ្មត់ លះបង់ពេលវេលា។4.រៀនមើល និងរបៀកធ្វើពីមេជាង ឆាប លាង បៀក ដាក់ទឹកខាត អោយស្មើសាច់ និងត្រូវភ្លឺ។5.រៀនបិទក្រដាសក្រសែត កន្លែងដែលយើងមិនធ្វើកុំអោយសាចទឹកថ្នាំចំកន្លែងផ្សេងទៀត។6.រៀនស្គាល់ឈ្មោះឧបករណ៍សម្រាប់ បាញ់ថ្នាំរថយន្តនិងបិទស្ទិតគ័រមានអ្វីខ្លះ។7.រៀនដោះគ្រឿងរថយន្ត កង់ កៅអី បាត ជញ្ជាំងក្នុង ស៊ុមកញ្ចក់ បូឌា ទ្វា ដំបូល។8.រៀនបិទស្ទិតគ័រ លាត ស្តេះ  លើសាច់ដែក កញ្ចក់ ការ៉ូ ជញ្ជាំង តាមប្រភេទស្ទិតគ័រ។9.រៀនកាន់ម៉ូទ័រឆាប និងម៉ូទ័រប៉ូលា ក្របិតកាតអោយជាប់ និងស្និតដៃធ្វើអោយចំគោលដៅ។10.រៀនខាត និងបៀកអោយស្មើសាច់ជញ្ជាំង និងត្រូវភ្លឺជញ្ចាំង ទ្វារ និងដំបូង កាង បូឌា តាមប្រភេទរថយន្ត។11.រៀនលាយថ្នាំ និងកាវបៀក និងច្រកថ្នាំកុំអោយមានកម្ទេចថ្នាំកក។12.រៀនកាន់ក្បាលបាញ់ថ្នាំ និងតទុយោជាប់ជាមួយក្បាលបាញ់ថ្នាំ។13.រៀនដឹកពីរបៀបប្រើប្រាស់ម៉ាស៊ីនខ្យល់ ក្នុងការបិទ បើក។14.រៀនគោរពពេលវេលាម៉ោងបំពេញការងារនៅកន្លែងធ្វើការ។15.រៀនគោរពតួនាទីទៅតាមរចនាសម្ព័នការងារ និងអោយតំលៃបុគ្គលិត និងមេជាង។16.រៀនស្រលាញ់ឧបករណ៍រកក្រុមហ៊ុនដូច របស់ខ្លួនឯងក្នុងការងារថែមទាំ ទុកដាក់។17.រៀនដោយមានស្មារតីខ្ពស់ និងប្រុងប្រយត្ន័ជានិច្ច យកចិត្តទុក ដាក់បំផុត។18.រៀនដោយស្តាប់តាមបង្គាប់មេជាប់ប្រាប់ និងគត់ត្រាទុកក្នុងសៀវភៅកំណត់អោយដឹងថ្ងែក្រោម។19.រៀនដោយមានការឈ្លាសវៃ រហ័សរហួន ឆ្ងល់ និងសួរច្រើន ឆាប់ចាំនិងយល់ច្រើន ប៉ិនប្រសព្វ។20. ត្រូវប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវអត្តចរិតការងារមួយចំនួនដូចជា មានក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវៈ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការងារត្រូវធ្វើឱ្យទាន់ពេលកំណត់ ប្រើពាក្យសម្ដីឱ្យបានសមរម្យ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ហ្មត់ចត់     មិនលម្អៀង រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ រហ័សរហួន ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម មិនអូសបន្លាយ ឬកេងប្រវ័ញ្ចកិបកេងពេលវេលា ហាមគេចវេសការងារ មានចិត្តចេះសហការគ្នា ចេះសន្សំសំចៃ និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ និងត្រូវមើលបញ្ហា ឱ្យឃើញជាបញ្ហា។21.​ធ្វើការងារដោយគោរពទៅតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានចែង។22.ការចេញពីទីតាំងការងារដោយគ្មានការអនុញ្ញាត ពីប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកត្រូវបញ្ឈប់ពីការងារ។23.ត្រូវមានសៀវភៅ ឯកសារកត់ត្រា រាល់មានការប្រជុំ ឬពេលមានការងារពីថ្នាក់លើដាក់ឱ្យ។24.ពេលបំពេញការងារ ត្រូវមានសម្ភារបួនប្រភេទ សម្ភារការពារ សម្ភារការពារសុវត្ថិភាព សម្ភារធ្វើ និងសម្ភារសម្រាប់សម្អាត។
Job Requirement: - បទពិសោធន៍ធ្លាប់ធ្វើការងារអ្វីខ្លះពីមុនមក- អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់- មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ  និងការលះបង់ខ្ពស់- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ - មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ- មានចំណេះដឹងក្នុងការដឹកនាំក្រុម ចេះនិយាយ ចេះសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរបាន- សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ពេលបំពេញការងារ និងក្រោយពេលធ្វើរួច។- ការពារសុវត្តិភាពក្នុងពេលបំពេញការងារ។- ចេះសរសេរអក្សរ និងអានបានល្អ។- ការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៍តាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: Admin & HR Supervisor ( Kien Svay Branch )

Job Description: Job Title: Fashion MerchandiserCategory: Fashion, Merchandising, PurchasingJob Description:•	Keep up with the latest Fashion trend and communicate regularly with fashion designers in order to blend fashion sense with quantitative analysis by looking at how products have performed in the past and forecast consumer demands for upcoming seasons.•	Use fashion knowledge and trend analysis to decide how to purchase and stock a retail store. Decide which new styles to order, which items to reorder, the quantity of each item, and colors and sizes to stock.•	Assist in purchasing and negotiating with manufacturers and designers to make sure items can be priced in a way that will sell and make a profit.•	Determine how each store should be stocked based on store sales performance, different customer demographics, and store environment.•	Assist in preparing budget planning for monthly stock purchases for the upcoming season, and present it to management for approval.•	Schedule timeline from production, to finish product and delivery to ensure on-time for the season.

Job Description: i) តួនាទីដែរត្រូវធ្វើ1) ស្វែងរកប្រភពថ្មីៗពីទីផ្សារសម្រាប់ប្រាក់កម្ចីទិញម៉ូតូនិងផលិតផលផ្សេងទៀត។2) ត្រូវជួបជាមួយម្ចាស់ហាងម៉ូតូជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃដើម្បីពិភាក្សា ផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលប្រាក់កម្ចី។ ជំរុញការលក់ផលិតផលតាមរយះការបង់រំលោះ3) ពិភាក្សាអំពីផលិតផល....លក្ខណៈពិសេសនៃប្រាក់កម្ចីជាមួយអតិថិជន ព្រមទាំងផ្តល់គំនិត សំរាប់ពួកគាត់អំពីអត្ថប្រយោជន៍នៃប្រាក់កម្ចីពីក្រុមហ៊ុនរបស់យើងនិងលក់រាល់ផលិតផលបង់រំលោះរបស់យើង។4) ទាក់ទងទៅអតិថិជននិងពិភាក្សាដើម្បីស្វែងយល់ពីអំពីប្រាក់ចំណូល ៕ ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលឯកសារប្រាក់ចំនូលជាក់ស្តែង ហើយប្រាកដថាឯកសារទាំងអស់ពិតប្រាកដនិងត្រឹមត្រូវ។5) គ្រប់ឯកសារប្រាក់កម្ចីទាំងអស់ត្រូវបំពេញពាក្យស្នើសុំ រួចបញ្ចូនទៅប្រធានមន្រ្តីឥណទាន។ មន្រ្តីឥណទានត្រូវតែប្រាកដនិងធានាថាគ្រប់ព័ត៌មានទិន្នន័យដែរបានបញ្ចូនទៅនោះគឺគ្រប់គ្រាន់ពេញលេញ។6) ត្រូវតាមដានឯកសារ និង តាមដានពាក្យស្នើសុំកម្ចីនេះបានទទួលការយល់ព្រមឬបដិសេធពីប្រធាន។7) ត្រូវចុះពិនិត្យមើលផ្ទះនិងទីកន្លែងអាជីវកម្ម/ ហាង ព្រមទាំង យកឯកសារប្រាក់ចំណូល។8) ត្រូវបំពេញរាល់ឯកសារទាំងអស់ដោយផ្នែកតាមបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យ។9) រៀបចំឯកសារសម្រាប់ដំណើរអនុញ្ញាតការផ្តល់កម្ចីនេះ។10) ចូលរួមក្នុងការបង្កើតនូវទំរងនៃប្រាក់កម្ចី ហើយនិង ដំណើរការនីតិវិធីផ្សេងៗទៀតដែរពាក់ព័ន្ធ។11) រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ហើយផ្ញើទៅអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់
Job Requirement: ** គុណវុឌ្ឍិរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:1- ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅ និងមានអទិភាពសម្រាប់និស្សិតថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រគ្រប់ជំនាញ2- ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ 1ឆ្នាំ លើការងារឥណទាន 3- មានចំណេះដឹងដូចជា៖ លេខនព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាឱ្យមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអានស្តាប់ និងសរសេរបានខ្លះៗ4- មានប្រវត្តិ និងអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការងារជាមួយប្រជាជនក្រីក្រនៅតាមសហគមន៍5- មានប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ ចូលចិត្តធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម ជាមនុស្សឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងមានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ(  ​ខេត្ត្ដកំពង់សោម ខេត្តសៀម និង បន្ទាយមានជ័យ) ២៥០ ដុល្លារ
Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

Job Description:
• Plan and execute all website, SEO/SEM, marketing database, email social media and display advertising campaigns.
• Design, build and maintain our social media presence.
• Coordinate with Marketing Manager to update any PR, Advertising & Promotion Campaign to social media presence.
• Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns and assess against goals – KPIs:
• General Performance - Traffic, leads, Reach
• Channel Based - Website, social networks - Facebook, search engines
• Source based performance - Direct traffic, Organic search, referrals, email.
• Keep up-to-date with industry standards, research and good practice within community managements and social media through continuous research of trends in social media tools, trends, and applications in the sector.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor/Master Degree in Marketing or related field.
• At least 2 years of work experiences in digital marketing.
• Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform and motivate.
• Demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and/or display advertising campaigns.
• Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement.
• Good written and Spoken English is advantage

Job Description: KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES•	Organizes and facilitate monthly operational plan meetings and processes, consist of Product Development, cycle planning, demand planning, Operation Planning, Supply Planning, Financial Review and Business review and ensures data integrity, process productivity and effectiveness; and to deliver flawless execution of programs and activities•	Drives the annual company plan and long term strategy development processes to ensure company strategic planning effectiveness and sustainability•	Prepares and maintain guidelines and decks, spreadsheets, databases, project documents to make sure all information is well recorded and updated •	Reports on market trends, competitor strategy and performance analysis, the level of achievement of own Service, Product, Sales and Marketing strategy and plans to ensure all relevant management teams are fully informed at all times. •	Collates and analyses data from available systems, sales & services, marketing and financial reports, researches, trade audits and customer, account performance in order to identify markets, services, products, channels, customer clusters weaknesses and opportunities and account priorities; and evaluates their performances in order to provide recommendations and solutions to deliver company objectives.•	Develops, monitors and evaluates both customer and consumer promotions for the priority customer channels, clusters and key accounts on time and within budget in order to maximize the return on investment and ensure adequate levels of customer and consumer participation. Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

Job Description: i) តួនាទីដែរត្រូវធ្វើ1) ស្វែងរកប្រភពថ្មីៗពីទីផ្សារសម្រាប់ប្រាក់កម្ចីទិញម៉ូតូនិងផលិតផលផ្សេងទៀត។2) ត្រូវជួបជាមួយម្ចាស់ហាងម៉ូតូជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃដើម្បីពិភាក្សា ផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលប្រាក់កម្ចី។ ជំរុញការលក់ផលិតផលតាមរយះការបង់រំលោះ3) ពិភាក្សាអំពីផលិតផល....លក្ខណៈពិសេសនៃប្រាក់កម្ចីជាមួយអតិថិជន ព្រមទាំងផ្តល់គំនិត សំរាប់ពួកគាត់អំពីអត្ថប្រយោជន៍នៃប្រាក់កម្ចីពីក្រុមហ៊ុនរបស់យើងនិងលក់រាល់ផលិតផលបង់រំលោះរបស់យើង។4) ទាក់ទងទៅអតិថិជននិងពិភាក្សាដើម្បីស្វែងយល់ពីអំពីប្រាក់ចំណូល ៕ ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលឯកសារប្រាក់ចំនូលជាក់ស្តែង ហើយប្រាកដថាឯកសារទាំងអស់ពិតប្រាកដនិងត្រឹមត្រូវ។5) គ្រប់ឯកសារប្រាក់កម្ចីទាំងអស់ត្រូវបំពេញពាក្យស្នើសុំ រួចបញ្ចូនទៅប្រធានមន្រ្តីឥណទាន។ មន្រ្តីឥណទានត្រូវតែប្រាកដនិងធានាថាគ្រប់ព័ត៌មានទិន្នន័យដែរបានបញ្ចូនទៅនោះគឺគ្រប់គ្រាន់ពេញលេញ។6) ត្រូវតាមដានឯកសារ និង តាមដានពាក្យស្នើសុំកម្ចីនេះបានទទួលការយល់ព្រមឬបដិសេធពីប្រធាន។7) ត្រូវចុះពិនិត្យមើលផ្ទះនិងទីកន្លែងអាជីវកម្ម/ ហាង ព្រមទាំង យកឯកសារប្រាក់ចំណូល។8) ត្រូវបំពេញរាល់ឯកសារទាំងអស់ដោយផ្នែកតាមបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យ។9) រៀបចំឯកសារសម្រាប់ដំណើរអនុញ្ញាតការផ្តល់កម្ចីនេះ។10) ចូលរួមក្នុងការបង្កើតនូវទំរងនៃប្រាក់កម្ចី ហើយនិង ដំណើរការនីតិវិធីផ្សេងៗទៀតដែរពាក់ព័ន្ធ។11) រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ហើយផ្ញើទៅអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Organize and assist the meetings.• Write and review minutes and contents for meetings, speeches, announcements, letters and others.• Make sure the task list is up to date.• Follow up all tasks assigned to relevant departments and report the progresses and results.• Coordinate with relevant departments to make sure that decisions of management are well-implemented/achieved.• Assist in document reviews before approval.• Translate documents from English to Khmer and vice versa. • Assist on all aspects of communication, both internally and externally, including with media.• Assist the line managers, make sure s/he sends out response in timely manner.• Summarize brief report of external meeting.• Manage and monitor the Facebook pages, make sure that all contents, photos and comments from public are appropriate and up to date.• Manage and update relevant website contents.• Review contents of news and videos before releasing on public media.• Develop, review and update relevant policies for the company by working with relevant Senior Management and/or departments.• Organize workshop, conference, events, both internally and externally and working closely with Media team.• Other tasks assigned by Line Manager.
Job Requirement: • Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative.• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views.• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks.• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude.• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with social media.• Ability to understand and keep within a budget.• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English.• Strong administrative and organizational skills.• Presentation Skills.• Self-Confidence.• Having strong decision making.• Having administrative writing skills.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ONE BIG TREE ELECTRICAL SUPPLY CO., LTD.
Job Description:
Job Duty:
ភារកិច្ចការងារ
- Cash collection from own customers. 
- ប្រមូលប្រាក់ (Account Receivable) ពីអតិថិជននៅតំបន់របស់ខ្លួន។

- Planning and collection methods to adequately and timely to the company's target.
- រៀបចំផែនការ និងវិធីសាស្រ្តប្រមូលប្រាក់ឲ្យបានគ្រប់ចំនួន និងទាន់ពេលវេលាទៅតាមគោលដៅរបស់ ក្រុមហ៊ុន។

- Monitoring credit limit & term to customers regularly. 
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យតុល្យភាពរយៈពេល និងចំនួនជំពាក់ប្រាក់ដែលបានកំណត់អោយអតិថិជនជាប្រចាំ។

- Check all money & cheque note properly and keep it safe. 
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យក្រដាសប្រាក់ និងសែកឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវគ្រប់ចំនួន និងរក្សារទុកមានសុវត្ថិភាព។

- Prepare reports and other documents for collection to verify with customers and accounting.
រៀបចំរបាយការណ៏ និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗសំរាប់ការប្រមូលដើម្បីផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាមួយអតិថិជន និងគណនេយ្យ។ 

- Provide contact information problems arising from customer sales and parts.
- ទំនាក់ទំនងផ្តល់ពត៌មានរាល់បញ្ហាកើតឡើងក្នុងប្រតិបត្តិការពីអតិថិជនទៅផ្នែកលក់ និងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ។
Job Requirement: - BBA of Sales & marketing or Management.- កំរិតវប្បធម៌បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រង លក់ និងទីផ្សារ។- 1-years experienced with Sales & Collection.- ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៏១ឆ្នាំទាក់ទងនឹងការងារផ្នែកលក់ និងប្រមូលប្រាក់។ - English is fairly good.  - អាចទំនាក់ទំនង និងនិយាយភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន។- Computer literacy (MS. Word/Excel, Internet & E-mail, PowerPoint).- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័បាន- Must be honest, committed, responsible, good attitude & customer services mind set, be able to work as team work, and initiative in carrying out the work.- ត្រូវមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ប្តេជ្ញាចិត្ត ទទួលខុសត្រូវ អាកប្បកិរិយាល្អ និងផ្នត់គំនិតបំរើសេវាកម្មអតិថិជន ហើយ អាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម ព្រមទាំងមានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមក្នុងការអនុវត្តការងារ។ ** HOW TO APPLY: ការដាក់ពាក្យInterested candidates are requested to submit CVs with recent photo (4x6) and Cover Letter to e-mail: hr@obtelectric.com.បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ត្រូវបានស្នើសុំឲ្យដាក់ប្រវិត្តរូបការងារដោយភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងរូបថតទំហំ(4x6)និង Cover Letter ផ្ញើទៅកាន់អ៊ី-មែល  hr@obtelectic.com ។** We offer monthly high incentive packages and salary.ក្រុមហ៊ុនយើងខ្ញុំមានផ្តល់នូវប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តជារៀងរាល់ខែ និងប្រាក់ខែ.- E-mail	: hr@obtelectric.com-​ Telegram:  016 648 877 / 081 512 302

Job Description:
* Translation Functions
•	Reads through or listens to material in one language, ascertains understanding of the meaning and context of that material, and converts it into a second language, making sure to preserve the original meaning.
•	Proofread translated texts for grammar, spelling, and punctuation accuracy.
•	Consults with subject matter experts and end users to understand specialized concepts and translate them appropriately.
•	Refers to specialist online translation tools for additional assistance with translation.
•	Provides end users with translation estimates based on project length and level of complexity.
•	Follows up with end users to ensure satisfaction and understanding of translation provided.
•	Uses highly specialized translation software to encourage efficiency and consistency.
•	Edit content with an eye toward maintaining RNS document standards (e.g. font and structure)
•	Adheres to industry quality standards to ensure that all completed work follows legal and ethical obligations.
•	Translates a variety of documents including legal, technical, scientific, educational, and commercial materials.

* Administration Functions
•	Attend training in administrative practices and procedures or other courses as directed.
•	Adhere to all regulatory requirements for environmental performance.
•	Ensure company policies, processes and procedures are complied with.
•	Assist in the procure of goods and materials in accordance with operational requirements as per RNS policies and procedures and the RNS code of ethics.  
•	Prepare request for proposal and request for quotes (RFP/RFQ) evaluations and contract award recommendations where applicable.
•	Identify potential savings opportunities and take appropriate action.  Explore these ideas and complete feasibility study for the potential cost saving.
•	Maintain a record of cost savings made through the competitive procurement of goods and services.
•	Meet with end user departments on a weekly basis to understand current and future administrative requirements and issues. 
•	Assist in the tracking of all requisitions and purchase orders from placement to delivery and receipt.
•	Work with Logistics and Expediting Officers to ensure timely deliveries.
•	Assist in the updating all orders within the Company's ERP system.
•	Ensure that invoices are processed in accordance with procedure. 
•	Maintain professional records of purchase requisitions and orders.
•	Provide information and reports as required.
•	File all paperwork in accordance with Commercial policies.
•	Develop and maintain professional and productive relationships with internal customers and external suppliers.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in business administration or related field
•	Ability to read, write and communicate in English.
•	Good working familiarity with Microsoft Office.
•	Good interpersonal and Communication skills.
•	Ability to work as part of a team or alone unsupervised.

** Working Days
This is a permanent opportunity working roster will be 2 weeks on 1 week off OR 4 weeks on 2 weeks off and Candidates willing to live and work in the Site at Mondulkiri province.

** Salary and Benefit
•	Salary (Competitive)
•	Annual Salary increment…etc. 
•	Provide Accommodation and 3 meal per day 
•	Cover health/ accident 24 hr Insurance and NSSF 
•	Monthly/ Annual staff party
•	Internal and professional Training

Please feel free to contact us to get more a great job opportunity and achieve your dream. Interest applicants please sent your application and create a CV to the Human Resources Department.

Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet & Email;•	Useful in English and Khmer. Chinese or Vietnamese is preferable;•	Demonstrate strong leadership capability, strategic thinking, and facilitative management skills;•	Communication and presentation skills;•	Negotiation and follow-up skills;•	Excellent interpersonal and ability to deal with multiple tasks effectively and establish priorities;•	Management skills;•	Ability to build up networking;•	Be moral, responsible, honesty, and patient.

Job Description: KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES•	Organizes and facilitate monthly operational plan meetings and processes, consist of Product Development, cycle planning, demand planning, Operation Planning, Supply Planning, Financial Review and Business review and ensures data integrity, process productivity and effectiveness; and to deliver flawless execution of programs and activities•	Drives the annual company plan and long term strategy development processes to ensure company strategic planning effectiveness and sustainability•	Prepares and maintain guidelines and decks, spreadsheets, databases, project documents to make sure all information is well recorded and updated •	Reports on market trends, competitor strategy and performance analysis, the level of achievement of own Service, Product, Sales and Marketing strategy and plans to ensure all relevant management teams are fully informed at all times. •	Collates and analyses data from available systems, sales & services, marketing and financial reports, researches, trade audits and customer, account performance in order to identify markets, services, products, channels, customer clusters weaknesses and opportunities and account priorities; and evaluates their performances in order to provide recommendations and solutions to deliver company objectives.•	Develops, monitors and evaluates both customer and consumer promotions for the priority customer channels, clusters and key accounts on time and within budget in order to maximize the return on investment and ensure adequate levels of customer and consumer participation. Job Description:
- Call on policyholders to deliver and explain policy, to analyse insurance program and suggest the insurance products according to client’s business type.
- Interview the prospective clients to obtain data their financial resources and physical condition of the person or property to be insured, and discuss any existing coverage.
- Seek out new clients and develop clientele by networking to find new customers and generate lists of prospective clients and provide customer service after closed sale.
- Contact underwriter and submit sale worksheet to obtain quotation and deliver to clients immediately, and also maintaining records and handling policy renewal.
- Monitor insurance claims to ensure they are settled equitably and cooperate with claim department to provide documents is required.
- Develop marketing strategies to compete with other individuals or companies who sales insurance.
- To do research in new products and services, learn new skills, and receive technical assistance in developing new accounts.
- Any other tasks will be assigned by sale manager
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree in Sales and Marketing, business, economy, or related field; 
- Minimum 2 years experience in sale and marketing; insurance experience is plus;
- Ability and desired to sell with excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
- Work well in a team, independently and under pressure
- Be initiative, creative, commitment, and honest
- Negotiation, problem solving skills
- Good in English both written and spoken or other languages
- Pleasant personality, be flexible, positive attitude & open-minded
- Computer literate – MS. Word, Excel, Power Point, Internet and Email.

APPLICATION INFORMATION

CVI offers candidates a competitive package based on education and experiences. We provide personal development through ongoing training and coaching, opportunity for career growth and empowerment plus a wide range of benefits package to our employees such as: Annual Increment, 13th Month Salary, Bonus (annual performance, Khmer & Vietnamese New Year, Vietnamese & Cambodian Independent Day, CVI Establishment Anniversary, International New Year Day), Sale Incentive, Other Allowances (Food  & Telephone allowance), Uniform, 24-hour Personal Accident Coverage, Health Insurance and NSSF, and others.

For further information about us, please visit our website: www.cvi.com.kh

Interested candidates must submit your application, CVs, cover letter, not later than 30 September 2014 at 5:00 pm with job titles by address or via email at the contact information below. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for an interview.

Job Description:
- Developing and executing strategic plans to expand into
new international markets. Generate and develop profitable sales of the Company’s Products in the Sales Territory. Meet or exceed AFH’s sales quotas and other obligations.
- Managing relationships with existing distributors and
forging new partnerships.
- Generate current and historic sales reports. Create Sales
forecasts, analyzing sales data to identify trends and make data-driven decisions.
- Providing top-notch administrative support to ensure
smooth operations. Help Company with the prompt payment of customer invoices and resolving customer credits and disputed payments.
- Coordinating with the team at headquarters on various
initiatives and objectives.
- Regularly engaging with customers, understanding their
needs, and promoting our products. Present the Company’s presentation, products, and promotions completely and accurately to all existing and potential distributors and customers. Create sales materials.
- Handling contract negotiations with international
distributors and clients.
- Representing the organization at international events
and trade shows.
- Regularly reporting on sales performance and market
insights to senior leadership.
Job Requirement:
- Minimum of a bachelor’s degree in business, Marketing, or a related field
- 10+ years of experience in international sales, with a successful track record in start-ups, new products, and new territories
- International and regional experience, with a proven ability to work effectively across cultures and time zones.
- Strong understanding of global market trends and dynamics
- Confident and self-dependent, able to work independently and as part of a team
- Positive contributor, with a can-do attitude and willingness to learn
- Strategic and logical thinking, with the ability
to make sound business decisions
- Ability to push through challenges while remaining reasonable and level-headed
- Perseverance and persistence, with a strong work ethic and a commitment to achieving sales targets

Benefits
- General Work : Good benefit will offer to the successful candidate:
- Compete salary based on the market rate with international company.
- Allowance : breakfast, lunch, Private and Public Insurance …etc
- Health & wellness budget : we have activities, facilities, nurse, doctor, and budget to help associate stay healthy.
- Education : Company training, job training, budget, and time for associate to develop skill, English, and computer.
- Good working environment and company has maintained to achieve a lot of standards such as: SA8000, BRC, GMP, provide the information per your request

job title: មន្រ្តីជំនាញតាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃកាតព្វកិច្ចហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
position: មន្រ្តីជំនាញតាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃកាតព្វកិច្ចហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
Job Description:
 គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
• មានសញ្ញាបត្រចាប់ពីបរិញ្ញាបត្រឡើងទៅលើជំនាញសេដ្ឋកិច្ច, ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ, ស្ថិតិ ឬជំនាញពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗ
• មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ០២ ឆ្នាំពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃ ឬវិភាគ
• មានចំណេះដឹងពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
• មានឆន្ទៈ និងការបេ្តជ្ញាក្នុងការងារកែទម្រង់
• មានជំនាញក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់ និងវិភាគ Financial Model និង Economic Model  
• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Microsoft office និងប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីគ្រប់គ្រងស្ថិតិ
• មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ខ្ពស់នឹងសម្ពាធការងារ មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង និងអាចបំពេញការងារជាក្រុម, និង
• មានចំំណេះដឹងភាសាខ្មែរ និងអង់គ្លេសស្ទាត់ជំនាញ។
Job Requirement:
 ឯកសាភ្ជាប់
បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ៖
• ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter (ជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស) 
• សញ្ជាបត្របញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សាថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា 
• ភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប សម្រាប់ទាក់ទងសាកសួរពត៌មានដោយមាន (e-mail address, telephone or fax numbers)។ 

 ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃពុធ ៦កើត ខែភទ្របទ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី២០ ខែកញ្ញា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈ Email តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: 1. Financial Strategy and Planning:- Develop and execute the company's financial strategy in alignment with its overall business objectives.- Analyze financial data to provide insights and recommendations for optimizing financial performance.- Drive long-term financial planning, forecasting, and budgeting processes.2. Financial Reporting and Analysis:- Prepare and present accurate and timely financial reports to the executive team, board of directors, and stakeholders.- Conduct financial analysis to assess the company's financial health and make data-driven decisions.3. Risk Management and Corporate Governance:- Identify and assess financial risks that could impact the organization and develop strategies to mitigate them.- Ensure compliance with all financial regulations, accounting standards, and reporting requirements.- Ensure compliance with corporate governance requirements and ethical standards4. Capital Management:- Manage the allocation of capital resources to support strategic initiatives, investments, and growth opportunities.- Oversee fundraising efforts, including debt and equity financing, as well as managing relationships with banks, investors, and financial institutions.5. Strategic Planning and Execution:- Collaborate with other executives and department heads to develop and execute cross-functional strategic initiatives.- Evaluate and advise on potential mergers, acquisitions, partnerships, or divestitures.- Assess the financial impact of strategic decisions and provide recommendations to the board of directors.6. Investor Relations and Communication:- Maintain strong relationships with investors, analysts, and other stakeholders.- Represent the company to external parties, including financial institutions, regulatory bodies, and auditors.- Communicate the company's financial performance and strategy effectively to stakeholders.
Job Requirement: - At least a Master's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.- ACCA, CPA, or CFA is highly preferred.- Proven experience as a CFO or in a senior financial leadership role.- Strong understanding of financial planning, analysis, and reporting.- Excellent knowledge of financial regulations, tax laws, and compliance.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
- Exercise due professional care in performing audit work, including reviewing operation efficiency, measuring attainment of objectives, and making recommendations for cost reductions and earnings improvement
- Carry out both financial and operational audit process
- Carry out auditing process, verifying the compliance of policies and procedure of the firm’s operations
- Determine internal audit scope and develop annual plans
- Obtain, analyze and evaluate accounting documentation, previous reports, data, flowcharts etc.
- Prepare and present reports that reflect audit’s results and document process
- Act as an objective source of independent advice to ensure validity, legality and goal achievement
- Maintain open communication with management and audit committee
- Document process and prepare audit findings memorandum
- Protect against fraud and theft of the organization’s assets
- Ensure that the organization is complying with relevant laws and statutes
- Good teamwork and problem-solving skill.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in finance or Accounting or ACCA.
- Good English & Chinese is priority.
- Computer Literate (Microsoft office and quick book).
- Experience in auditing or Audit firm is advantage.
- Willing to travel and work in provinces.
- Fresh graduate and ACCA students are encouraged.

job title: Digital Marketing & Business Development Manager, @Female is Priority
position: Digital Marketing & Business Development Manager, @Female is Priority
Job Description:
Job Description:

1. Brainstorms new and creative growth strategies through digital marketing.
2. Identifies trends and insights and optimizes spend and performance based on the insights.
3. Utilize cross-functional approach to develop MAM/OCIC marketing plan and assess activity ROI.
4. Orchestrate successful promotional campaigns, including rebranding of all marketing materials and website development.
5. Create customer pipeline tracking tool from MAM/OCIC owned channels to increase personalized accountability, improve forecasting and track performance versus competition.
6. Analyzing data to identify opportunities for growth in existing markets or development of new markets
7. Develop and implementing strategies to attract new customers, increase brand awareness, and increase loyalty from existing customers
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement:

1. Strong verbal and written communication skills in Khmer and English are preferred
2. In-depth knowledge of various social media platforms, best practices, and website analytics
3. Solid understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus
4. Highly creative with excellent analytical abilities.
5. Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills.
6. Up-to-date on the latest trends and technologies in digital marketing.
7. Organized in campaign management and detail oriented.
8. Knowledge in social media marketing and CRM is a bonus.
9. Experience with complex data environments, analytics platforms such as Google Analytics is a bonus.

Job Description:
The Sales Associate is responsible for providing warm welcome, effective presentation and demonstration of products and with a high level of service to customers in order to satisfy their shopping needs and enhance their shopping experience.

RESPONSIBILITIES
• Achieve sales target as assigned by the Company
• Follow the company guideline and operational standard
• Replenish products on shelf and participate in stock count
• Maintain good housekeeping conditions in the store
• Maintain well-presented visual merchandise and displays
• Provide excellent customer service and product knowledge to customers
• Assist in opening and closing of the store
• Assist in cashiering duties when required
• Assist and support in-store marketing events
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENT
• Min. high school degree or higher in any field
• At least 1 year experience in fashion retail or service industry
• Pleasant, neat, warm and friendly personality
• Service-oriented with strong selling and customer service skills
• Strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
• Confident, honest, enthusiastic and a good team player
• Responsible, patient and motivated with positive work attitude

Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Aeon 3 and K-Mall N/A

Job Description:
•	Assist upper-level management, Head of CC, DCEO, Managing Director.
•	Analyze data, plan storage, improve process etc.
•	Control customs affairs and the import and export process of goods
•	Familiar with customs and logistics center entry and exit customs affairs and customer service.

•	Follow company direction by cooperating with Senior Manager.
•	Cooperate with all operation sections and the other sections.
•	Manage custom clearance section in Head Office and other office locatio.
•	Support to control work for clearance for PPSEZ and Sihanouk Ville, Poipet Border, Bavet Border, Phnom Penh Port, when Head of Department out of office or absent.
•	Sometime do packing list and authorization.
•	When operation have special commodity, will go to check information with customs & other ministries.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. Job Description: • Analyze investment opportunities to determine the potential return on investment and provide guidance to maximize financial performance.• Advises companies and teams on financial matters, including investment decisions in stocks and bonds.• Responsible for consolidating and analyzing financial data, taking into account the company’s goals and financial standing and presenting those results to the BoD.• Provide creative alternatives and recommendations to reduce costs and improve financial performance.• Develop financial models, conduct benchmarking and process analysis, conduct business studies on past, future, and comparative performance, and develop forecast models.• Identify trends, advise the company, and recommend actions to a senior financial analyst based on sound analysis.• Track and determine financial status by analyzing actual results in comparison with forecasts.• Consult with management to guide and influence long-term and strategic decision-making within the broadest scope.• Develop and track key performance metrics against the company’s strategic objectives.• Responsible for the fiscal management and oversight of the college’s partnerships within the Company.• Perform complex financial/budgetary projections, and analyses of actual activity to facilitate decision-making and planning.• Other tasks assigned by management.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Job Description: JOB SUMMARYManager, Marketing oversees all activities of Marketing department and report directly to the Chief Operating Officer. The Manager, Marketing provides marketing management and supports to the business in advancing overall marketing goals and objectives.S/he partners with various departments in maximizing Marketing performances, revenue, improving decision-making, and ultimately driving marketing effectiveness and efficiency across communication channels and customer segments. The Manager, Marketing must have strong brand and marketing management skills, communication skills, and has a hands-on approach in delivering results.JOB SCOPE: Develops and executes Marketing strategy and plan for all communication channels and touchpoints, ensuring that these are being effectively implemented in order to meet customer segments and channels requirements, Other scopes are inclusive of management of researches, brand development, management of media channels, marketing agency and ensuring effective resources, infrastructures, processes and systems of Marketing are ready for current and future business needs. KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES•	Leads the Marketing department, oversees all activities of Marketing team to ensuring proper execution of company plan to deliver objectives. •	Supervises Marketing personnel and ensures accurate execution of their duties. Acts as a mentor to key supervisors and talents to encourage their professional growth, and to ready them for the succession of higher positions in the future.•	Coordinates the creation of thematic Social Media contents and initiating content marketing campaigns to reach targets•	Builds the business proposal of partnerships for branding and acquisition through affiliate and short-term promotional events•	Optimizes existing growing channels and continuously tests new and crazy campaigns to uncover untapped acquisition•	Additionally, plays a leading role in the optimization of Marketing management systems and processes. Handles end to end projects efficiently and effectively.•	Spearhead the development and implementation of Annual and Seasonal Marketing strategy, plan and launch campaigns. •	Drives the development of Above-The-Line and Below-The-Line marketing programs to achieve maximum brand awareness, leverage brand imagery, brand visibility and acquisition within approved budget and timeline.•	Executes, monitors, tracks, optimizes and evaluates cycle activities and marketing campaigns to propose improvement plans and execution to deliver company plan objectives.•	Monitors, tracks, and analyses online marketing performance that is KPI driven (Knowledge and Experience in social paid, search marketing, and SEO are required)•	Works closely with other departments to deliver objectives as plan and foster strong team work spirit.•	Works closely across functions and with leadership team to drive Offline and Online Marketing initiatives•	Collaborates with relevant stakeholders in ensuring accurate representation and maintenance high level of business integrity in the industry by ensuring compliance with legislation and internal policy.•	Provides Marketing information and reports on performance to ensure that the Chief Operating Officer, Leadership Team and relevant team members are fully informed at all times and take appropriate response actions on a timely basis.•	Understands the market, where we can meet our potential target, acquires new customers, meet business and grow predefined KPIs•	Keeps the Marketing team abreast of changes in the industry inclusive of trade and marketing legislations, regulations and ensures that all Marketing transactions across the business are in legal compliance. •	Conducts research and identifies opportunities for business to continue raising the bar of performance.
Job Requirement: JOB REQUIREMENTSEducation:Bachelor’s degree in marketing, preferably Tourism and Hospitality Management. The equivalent of the same in practical experience is also acceptable. Experience:At least 5 years of working experience in relevant fieldsThe candidate will also be better suited with experience in travel industry.MS Office and Software:Possess good computer skill, being proficient in Digital Social Apps, Ms Excel, Ms Outlook, and PowerPoint, which will all be necessary for the effective performance of the creation of reports, proposals and recommendations.

Job Description: 1. Design Coordination - Collaborate with architects, engineers, and consultants to ensure MEP systems are integrated seamlessly into the building design. Provide guidance and supervision to ensure efficient and high-quality MEP installations.3. Quality Assurance - Implement and maintain quality control processes to ensure all MEP work meets industry standards and project specifications.4. Manage Vendor and Subcontractor - Manage relationships with MEP subcontractors and vendors. Oversee procurement of MEP materials and equipment.5. Compliance and Safety - Ensure all MEP work complies with local building codes, regulations, and safety standards. Implement safety protocols and procedures.6. Problem Solving - Proactively identify and resolve MEP-related issues or conflicts that may arise during the construction phase.7. Documentation and Reporting - Maintain accurate records of MEP project documentation, including drawings, change orders, and progress reports.
Job Requirement: 1. Bachelor's degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering or a related field.2. 8 years of experience in the relevant industry.3. Minimum [3-4] years of experience in MEP management, preferably in high-rise residential construction.4. Strong knowledge of MEP systems and design principles.5. Familiar with MEP inspection and T&C processes.6. Proven experience in coordinating MEP works on large-scale construction projects.7. Familiarity with fire, electrical and mechanical code, understanding of international code is a plus.8. Ability to work collaboratively in a dynamic construction environment.9. Good communication and leadership skills.
Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

company_name: Ministry Of Environment-ក្រសួងបរិស្ថាន
Job Description:
A project on Promoting Climate-resilient Livelihoods in Rice-based Communities in the Tonle Sap Region-GCP/CMB/045/LDF will be implemented in the five provinces around Tonle Sap Lake—Pursat, Battambang, Banteay Meanchey, Siem Reap, and Kampong Thom in Cambodia from 2023 to 2027. The project is funded by the Global Environment Facility (GEF) through the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO). The objective of this project is:  Rice based communities in the Tonle Sap region of Cambodia reduce their climate vulnerability and increase their resilience to climate change through an ecosystem-based, market-driven approach.

This five-year project will be delivered by the General Directorate of Local Community (GDLC) of the Ministry of Environment (MOE) and the General Directorate of Agriculture (GDA) of the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry, and Fisheries (MAFF). Technical and operational execution will be augmented by IRRI, WCS and other partners.  FAO will provide technical and administrative support.  The project activities will be guided by a Project Steering Committee (PSC) chaired by MAFF/GDA, advised by a Technical Advisory Group (TAG), and coordinated by a Project Management Unit (PMU) located in GDA of MAFF.

The project is looking for a qualified Operations Specialist to be based in Phnom Penh. 

Key Responsibilities:

Under the overall supervision of the GDLC’s Director General and in close collaboration with the International Lead Technical Advisor, Senior National Technical Advisor, relevant FAO Country Office team, other project partners and government counterparts, he/she will be responsible for providing capacity development support to the Operational Partners (OPs) including support /monitoring for the implementation of OPs Risk Mitigation Plan.

More specifically, he/she will: 

•	Leading the preparation of Requests for Funds and Financial Reports are in line with the approved AWP/Bs, the project’s Results Framework, and the conditions of the signed OPAs for eligibility of expenditures;
•	Coordinating the financial management, contracting, and day-to-day operations of the project activities.
•	Assisting the Project Management Unit (PMU) with consolidated monitoring of the project’s progress and associated clearances of progress reports.
•	Supporting the project’s Budget Holder (BH) and Independent Office of Evaluation (OED) as they respectively carry out the project midterm and final evaluations, including contacts with the OPs, logistics, travel, and other administrative matters.
•	Issuing the vacancy announcements, supporting the selection processes, and processing the contracts, payments, and payroll for consultants. 
•	Processing purchases, contracts, and other necessary inputs according to the approved AWP/B.
•	Providing necessary supports to FAO in monitoring and ensuring implementation of the agreed risk-mitigation and assurance plans, which include spot checks and audits.
•	Ensuring filing of supporting documentation for each financial transaction and provide such documentation for audits and review missions.
•	Undertake any other duties as required to ensure the successful delivery of the project outputs.
Job Requirement:
•	Advanced university degree (at least a Master's Degree) in management, finance and accounting, business administration and/or relevant subject.
•	At least 7 years of professional experience with strong technical background project management.
•	At least 5 years of professional experience of working in the field of project management with government agencies, I/NGOs and donor agencies and private sector. 
•	Professional training skills and a strong commitment to participatory processes.
•	Experience in the use of computers and office software packages for data analysis and technical reports.
•	Strong writing skills, including experience finance, procurement, administration and logistic arrangement.
•	Fluency in spoken and written English and Khmer. 
How to Apply?

The consultant will be selected in accordance with the Individual Consultant Selection (ICS) method set out with the Royal Government of Cambodia (RGC)’s Updated Standard Operating procedures (SOP) and Procurement Manual for externally financed project/programs (PM), promulgated through Sub-decree 181, dated December 2019.

In submitting their expressions of interest/application, the interested candidates are kindly requested to provide their updated curriculum vitae, indicating their personal and technical skills, academic qualifications, and experience in similar assignments, along with the details of at least three referees with contact information (email address, telephone or fax numbers).

Expression of Interest/application must be submitted to the address below by email or hard copy no later than September 22, 2023.

Job Description:
Job brief
We are looking for an HR Executive to manage our company’s recruiting, learning and development and employee performance programs.
HR Executive responsibilities include creating referral programs, updating HR policies and overseeing our hiring processes. To be successful in this role, you should have an extensive background in Human Resources departments and thorough knowledge of labor legislation.
Ultimately, you will make strategic decisions for our company so that we hire, develop and retain qualified employees.

Responsibilities
• Design compensation and benefits packages
• Implement performance review procedures (e.g. quarterly/annual and evaluations)
• Develop fair HR policies and ensure employees understand and comply with them
• Implement effective sourcing, screening and interviewing techniques
• Assess training needs and coordinate learning and development initiatives for all employees
• Monitor HR department’s budget
• Act as the point of contact regarding labour legislation issues
• Manage employees’ grievances
• Create and run referral bonus programs
• Review current HR technology and recommend more effective software 
• Measure employee retention and turnover rates
• Oversee daily operations of the HR department
Job Requirement:
• Proven work experience as an HR Officer / Executive or similar role
• Experience with full-cycle recruiting
• Good knowledge of labor legislation (particularly employment contracts, employee leaves and insurance)
• Good communication skills
• Tertiary education in Human Resources Management or relevant field

SECONDARY RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Assists in general office administration when require

EMPLOYEE BENEFITS:
• Competitive salary 
• Seniority pay
• 5% Severance pay
• Yearly increment 
• Meal allowance 
• NSSF insurance 24h
• PH & AL following Cambodia Labour Law

Job Description:
**The GIZ, Improving Social Protection and Health project, output 5, aims to improve laboratory capacities in the health sector for quality-assured diagnostics. One work package of activities supports 12 laboratory sites in Cambodia to strengthen the implementation of Quality Management Systems (QMS). Amongst the 12 sites, there is a wide range of capacities. For QMS implementation, various mentoring activities (on-site mentoring, virtual training and in-person workshops) contribute to success. In addition, QMS sustainability is more likely if we institutionalize a mentoring program. 
Thus, the management 4 health (m4h) and Integrated Quality Laboratory Services (IQLS) consortium, implementing this laboratory strengthening project, is recruiting an Assistant Laboratory mentor:
- To assist in a wide range of activities required to support the in-country m4h IQLS team.
- To support laboratory activities at the 12 QMS implementation sites.
- To support the logistic efforts required to implement the agreed work plan including QMS mentor workshops, regional on-site mentoring workshops and onsite mentoring.

**Tasks of the Assistant laboratory mentor 
Based on the established need to recruit an additional team member to support the m4h IQLS team, the Assistant laboratory mentor will have the following tasks:
- Support logistics for the QMS workshops, regional on-site mentoring workshops, and the on-site mentoring
- Support QMS mentors with regional/on-site mentoring to implement QMS at 12 sites.
- Support the development of QMS training materials.
- Assist, if required, with monitoring and reporting activities
- Other tasks as assigned by the supervisor.
Job Requirement:
**Qualification requirements for the Assistant laboratory mentor position
Recruitment for this position will be open following the staff selection process of m4h in accordance with GIZ procedures. A documentation of the selection will be submitted to GIZ ISPH with the recommended candidate for approval. The qualification requirements for this position are the following:

- Education/training: Bachelor’s in medical laboratory technology or equivalent 
- Languages: Knowledge of English (B1) in the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages; and Fluency in Khmer
- Understanding of the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) requirements for Quality Management Systems
- Professional experience: 3-5 years of experience working in a clinical medical laboratory.
- Specific professional experience: at least 12 months of experience in implementing Laboratory Quality Management Systems


**Applicants should answer to the Qualification requirements in a cover letter and submit along with CV and names and contact details for two referees, by the 18th of September 5pm.
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
Contact Info: Contact Information MS. Som Solida  089 666 015 som@iqls.net National Institute of Public Health 089 666 015

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Keo Bunthoeun  016 698 602 / 088 222 8261 bunthoeun.keo@rmagroup.net Phnom Penh #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 016 698 602 / 088 222 8261
