Office is highly desired, not mandatory for SUN system• Understanding logistics concepts• Familiarity with sourcing, vendor management and warehouse stock report and control• Solid judgement along with decision making skills;• Good oral and written both English and Khmer communication skills;• Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure and workload.• Good negotiation, Communication, and interpersonal skills and problem-solving skills;• Ability to Prioritize tasks**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារសូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 61 700 181How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: គ្រូក្រោមមត្តេយ្យសិក្សា
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូក្រោមមត្តេយ្យសិក្សា
Job Description: ១. សមត្ថភាពបច្ចេកទេសគរុកោសល្យក. ការងារគរុកោសល្យ(ការបង្រៀន)• គោរពម៉ោងពេលបង្រៀនឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់ និងជាប្រចាំ។• រៀបចំបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សាលម្អិតដែលខ្លួនបង្រៀន ឱ្យស្របតាមបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សាគោលរបស់ក្រសួងអប់រំ យុវជន និងកីឡា។                 • រៀបចំកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀនប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍(ត្រៀមមេរៀន)។• ផលិត និងប្រើប្រាស់នូវសម្ភារឧបទេស(ការបង្កើតដោយផ្ទាល់ដៃ ឬការទិញស្រាប់) ដែលទាក់ទងនឹងខ្លឹមសារ        មេរៀនឱ្យមានលក្ខណៈសម្បូរបែប ក្នុងដំណើរការបង្រៀនសិស្ស។• អនុវត្តន៍វិធីសាស្រ្តបង្រៀនតាមគោលវិធីសិស្សមជ្ឈមណ្ឌល។អនុវត្តន៍ និងដឹកនាំលើកម្មវិធីសិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវរបស់សិស្សខ. កិច្ចការគ្រប់គ្រងថ្នាក់• ត្រួតពិនិត្យឯកសណ្ឋាន កាតសិស្ស សក់ ក្រចកដៃ ផាត់មុខ និងវត្តមានសិស្សជាប្រចាំ រៀងរាល់ម៉ោងបង្រៀន។• ត្រួតពិនិត្យអនាម័យ សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ថ្នាក់រៀន និងតុកៅអីក្នុងថ្នាក់ (គ្មានការគូសវាស) ជាប្រចាំរៀងរាល់ម៉ោង            បង្រៀន។• ចូលរួមសន្សំសំចៃទឹកភ្លើង និងការប្រើប្រាស់វាំងននក្នុងម៉ោងបង្រៀន បត់បែនតាមស្ថានភាពជាក់ស្តែង។២. ការងាររដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់រៀន• គ្រប់គ្រង រៀបចំ ចងក្រង រក្សាទុក (Soft Coppy and Hard Coppy) សម្ភារឧបទេស សម្ភារសិក្សា កិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន មេរៀនសង្ខេប បំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សា និងស្នាដៃសិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវនានា (រួមទាំងសិស្ស ឬគ្រូខ្លួនឯង និងក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស)។ ល។• រៀបចំវិញ្ញាសា និងអត្រាកំណែប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី១ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី២  ឆមាសលើកទី១ និងឆមាសលើកទី២ ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងបច្ចេកទេស។• ចូលរួមជាគណៈកម្មការប្រឡង  គណៈមេប្រយោគ  អនុរក្ស តាមការចាត់តាំងពីចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក។• ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ប្រចាំត្រីមាសឱ្យចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកផ្ទាល់អំពីការអនុវត្តបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សា ឬដំណើរការនៃការបង្រៀន លទ្ធផលសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស (លទ្ធផលវិជ្ជាមាន និងចំណុចដែលត្រូវអភិវឌ្ឍន៍) តាមខែនីមួយៗ។• បញ្ចូលពិន្ទុប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស ឆមាស ក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធពិន្ទុ (System Scorring) និងផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ពិន្ទុជូនផ្នែកលេខាធិការ តាមកាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលសាលាបានកំណត់។៣. ការអប់រំសីលធម៌• ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលា សម្រាប់ផ្តល់នូវការអប់រំសីលធម៌ សុជីវធម៌ដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស។• នៅឱ្យកៀកជាមួយនឹងសិស្ស ដើម្បីក្តាប់យកព័ត៌មាន ក៏ដូចជាស្ថានភាពជាក់ស្តែង ព្រមទាំងបញ្ជូននូវព័ត៌មានទាំងឡាយណាដែលមានបញ្ហាទៅកាន់ផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីរកដំណោះស្រាយ និងជំនួយឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។• ធ្វើខ្លួនជាគំរូល្អទៅកាន់សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិករួមការងារ។៤. ការចូលរួមកម្មវិធីរបស់សាលា• មើលសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងវិន័យសិស្សនៅពេលចេញលេង និងកម្មវិធីផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលា តាមការចាត់តាំងដោយចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក។• ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពសាលាផ្សេងៗ ដូចជាការប្រកួតសមត្ថភាពសិស្ស កម្មវិធីប្រចាំឆ្នាំ...។• ចូលរួមដឹកនាំសិស្សចុះកម្មសិក្សា និងដំណើរទស្សនកិច្ចសិក្សា តាមការចាត់តាំងដោយចាងច្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក។• ជួបអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សជាមួយអ្នកប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ ចាងហ្វាង ចាងហ្វាងរងទទួលបន្ទុកស្តីពីការសិក្សា វិន័យ សីលធម៌ សុជីវធម៌របស់សិស្ស។៥. ទំនាក់ទំនងផ្សេងៗ• បង្កើតនូវទំនាក់ទំនងយ៉ាងជិតស្និទ្ធជាមួយសិស្ស ក្រុមការងារ ក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស ចាងហ្វាង ចាងហ្វាងរងទទួលបន្ទុក នាយក/នាយិកាចាងហ្វាង និងប្រធានសាលា។• រក្សាឱ្យបាននូវព័ត៌មានជាលក្ខណៈបុគ្គល និងព័ត៌មានរួមរបស់ស្ថាប័ន។• រក្សានូវទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយនឹងបុគ្គលិកនៅខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅផ្នែករបស់ខ្លួន។
Job Requirement: ការសិក្សា :• មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms. Office, Internet E-mail។ល។ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធៈ• មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនលើផ្នែកអប់រំយ៉ាងតិច៥ឆ្នាំ។  • មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងថ្នាក់រៀនលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយភាពឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវ      ខ្ពស់។ • មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ ឬសមត្ថភាពផ្សេងៗទៀតនៃការអប់រំ។ • មានស្មារតីជាក្រុមក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms. Office, Internet E-mail។ល។ • មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសលើផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេស។ • មានសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រង និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។ • មានសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រង និងធ្វើឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។• មានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនងប្រកបដោយវិជ្ជាជីវៈ។របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។*ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត និងមិនត្រូវបានជ្រើសរើសចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Assist the set-up process of the company & operations (operational processes, policies & procedures, Standard Operating Procedure’s, staff recruitment, training, selection of suppliers, local regulatory requirements..etc).- Develop & Execute the Business Plan/Budgets/Balanced Score Card.- Develop Sales & Marketing efforts (including new client prospecting, develop suitable proposals for new customers) for the company to achieve revenue growth.- Develop all key suppliers to ensure company performance targets are met.- Develop the key anchor client relationship through value added initiatives, innovative logistics solutions.- Provide guidance & direction for transportation solutions to customers & internal productivity/quality improvement projects.- Ensure compliance in Environment, Health and Safety, Financial, Systems & Controls- Set targets (covering all Balanced Score Card areas) & performance evaluation of same on regular basis ensuring continual improvement.- Motivate, Direct & Develop the team to achieve their goals & targets.- Contribute operations information and recommendations to strategic plans and reviews; prepare and complete action plans; implement production, productivity, quality and customer-service standards; resolve problems.- Develop, implement and review operational policies and procedures.- Develop and update standard operating procedures (SOP) for Intercon Transportation Service.- Ensure staff follows standard operating procedures for all operational functions.- Coordinates activities that affect operational decisions and business requirements.- Analyze data to inform operational decisions or activities. - Keep track of staffing requirements, hire and train new talent as needed to correspond with specific duties and skill sets.- Maintain safe and healthy work environment by establishing, following and enforcing standards and procedures; complying with legal regulations.- Plans, schedules, and reviews workload and manpower to make sure targets are being met on a cost-effective basis.- Work with the senior managements to determine values and mission, and plan for short and long-term goals.- Support employee communication with the management team.- Communicate customer issues with staff and devise ways of improving the customer experience, including resolving problems and complaints.- Manage work assignment and allocation for staff.- Prepare budget plan.- Monitor and control expense according to allotted budget.- Review daily and monthly sale and Sale return reports. - Ensure accurate and timely stock counts, carried out according to the operation procedure- Supervises and coordinates activities of staff concerned with ordering, receiving, storing, inventorying, issuing, and shipping material, and supplies in stockroom, or warehouse.- Plans layout of stockroom, warehouse, and other storage areas, considering turnover, size, weight, and related factors of items stored.- Reviews records for accuracy of information and compliance with established procedures, and to determine adequacy of stock levels.- Schedules work for special and periodic inventories.- Do round and conducts surprise stock count.- Other assigned tasks.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s or Master’s degree of Management/Business or related field.- Minimum of 6 years of professional work experience in the respective ﬁelds.- Knowledge of product selection, inventory control, and purchasing practices.- Experience in management, operations, and leadership.- Excellent organizational, analytical and problem-solving skills.- Ability to effectively communicate with all levels of the organization.- Ability to build consensus and relationships among managers, partners, and employees.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564For more information about other job opportunities, follow us below: https://t.me/mjqjobs

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).- Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.- Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.- Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.  - Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example. - Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.- Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).- Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.- Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use. - Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.- Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.- Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.- Contribute productively to the school as a whole.- Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.  - Organize learning materials and resources.- Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.- Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.- Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.- Follow and comply with teaching standards.- Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.- Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.- And other duties as assigned.

job title: គ្រូសេដ្ឋកិច្ច (ថ្នាក់ទី១១&១២)
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូសេដ្ឋកិច្ច (ថ្នាក់ទី១១&១២)
Job Description:
** Overall Purpose of the Role / គោលបំណងរួមនៃតួនាទី : 
លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូត្រូវបង្រៀនសិស្សានុសិស្សឱ្យទទួលបាននូវ ចំណេះសម្បទា បំណិនសម្បទា និងចរិយាសម្បទា ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ ស្របតាមនិយាមគរុកោសល្យ១០០%។

** Scope of Work / ទំហំការងារ :
ក្រៅពីការងារបង្រៀន និងរៀន លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូត្រូវមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់ក្នុងការអប់រំសិស្សានុសិស្សនូវចតុស្តម្ភនៃការអប់រំ ដូចជារៀនដើម្បីមានចំណេះដឹង រៀនដើម្បីមានចំណេះធ្វើ រៀនដើម្បីមានសីលធម៌រស់នៅល្អ និង រៀនដើម្បីចេះរួមរស់ជាមួយអ្នកដទៃ។
Job Requirement:
EDUCATION / ការសិក្សា :
- មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេស ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
- មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ។
- សញ្ញាបត្រដែលទទួលបានចុងក្រោយ : 

** KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE / ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធ:
- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms. Office, Internet/ E-mail ។ល។
- មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេស (ភាសាអង់គ្លេស...)។
- មានលទ្ធភាព/សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ ទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងទាមទារការគ្រប់គ្រងតិចតួចពីគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: ចាងហ្វាងរងមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ

Job Description: • ការងារគរុកោសល្យ• ការងាររដ្ឋបាល• ការងារគ្រប់គ្រង• ការងារទំនាក់ទំនង• ភាពជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ• លទ្ធផលដែលសម្រេចបាន• ការគិតវិភាគ• ភាពបត់បែន• ភាពអត់ធ្មត់• ការងារជាក្រុម• ការអភិវឌ្ឍ• ការចូលរួម
Job Requirement: • មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ លើមុខជំនាញអប់រំ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។  • មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។• ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធ:• មានបទពិសោធគ្រប់គ្រងលើផ្នែកអប់រំយ៉ាងតិច៥ឆ្នាំ។  • មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយភាពឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។ • មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ ឬសមត្ថភាពផ្សេងៗទៀតលើផ្នែកអប់រំ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ឬចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេសដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms. Offices, Internet, E-mail។ល។ • មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេស។  • មានសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រង និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស ឬបញ្ហាគ្រូ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រង និងធ្វើឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនៃផ្នែកអប់រំ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនងប្រកបដោយវិជ្ជាជីវៈ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពស្រាវជ្រាវក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគ្រូ ឬបុគ្គលិក។

job title: គ្រូសេដ្ឋកិច្ច (ថ្នាក់ទី១១&១២)
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូសេដ្ឋកិច្ច (ថ្នាក់ទី១១&១២)
Job Description:
** Overall Purpose of the Role / គោលបំណងរួមនៃតួនាទី : 
លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូត្រូវបង្រៀនសិស្សានុសិស្សឱ្យទទួលបាននូវ ចំណេះសម្បទា បំណិនសម្បទា និងចរិយាសម្បទា ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ ស្របតាមនិយាមគរុកោសល្យ១០០%។

** Scope of Work / ទំហំការងារ :
ក្រៅពីការងារបង្រៀន និងរៀន លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូត្រូវមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់ក្នុងការអប់រំសិស្សានុសិស្សនូវចតុស្តម្ភនៃការអប់រំ ដូចជារៀនដើម្បីមានចំណេះដឹង រៀនដើម្បីមានចំណេះធ្វើ រៀនដើម្បីមានសីលធម៌រស់នៅល្អ និង រៀនដើម្បីចេះរួមរស់ជាមួយអ្នកដទៃ។
Job Requirement:
EDUCATION / ការសិក្សា :
- មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេស ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
- មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ។
- សញ្ញាបត្រដែលទទួលបានចុងក្រោយ : 

** KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE / ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធ:
- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms. Office, Internet/ E-mail ។ល។
- មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេស (ភាសាអង់គ្លេស...)។
- មានលទ្ធភាព/សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ ទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងទាមទារការគ្រប់គ្រងតិចតួចពីគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។
- មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ។
- មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំយ៉ាងតិច។

** KEY RESPONSIBILITIES / ការទទួលខុសត្រូវសំខាន់ៗ
១. ការងារគរុកោសល្យ។
២. ការអប់រំសីលធម៌។
៣. ការងាររដ្ឋបាល។

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Report directly to Director of SOGO- Provide advising to students on all aspects of education abroad participation;- Program management and daily administration;- Develop and deliver orientations and related programming;- Implement best practices in his/her area of responsibility;- Supervise junior and/or student staff;- Establishes and maintains professional networks with related local, state, national, and international organizations and agencies; participates on committees and serves as liaison with other departments to provide information on available resources, programs, and/or services; attends professional conferences and training sessions.- Manages relationships and negotiates agreements with partner institutions and external education abroad vendors; develops and administers a variety of administrative documents which may include: requests for proposals, requests for quotes, service provider contracts, procedural guidelines, proposal applications, grants, and/or other related documents.- Manage functional area and program budgets.- Assist in developing and implementing plans and goals for SOGO- Work with the director to coordinate and supervise daily operations- Ensure compliance with regulations and internal policies- Monitor attainment of objectives- Undertake staffing responsibilities (hiring, training, evaluating etc.)- Assist in budgeting and monitoring expenses- Maintain scheduling of events and represent the company when needed- Create reports and submit them to the director or other executives- Fulfill duties as assigned by the director or the President
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s Degree in a related field.- Management experiences in education and related fields.- Excellent problem-solving skills, and ability to use initiative.- Ability to patiently work with people from various backgrounds, cultures, and religious views.- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks.- An approachable and friendly spirit, an easy-to-smile attitude, and a can-do attitude.- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficiency with social media.- Ability to understand and keep within a budget.- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English.- Strong administrative and organizational skills.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: School Counselor _ អ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាសាលា
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: School Counselor _ អ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាសាលា
Job Description:
• ជួបពិភាក្សា និងណែនាំសិស្សដែលមានបញ្ហាការសិក្សាខ្សោយ បញ្ហាចិត្តសាស្រ្ត បញ្ហាអាកប្បកិរិយា និងបញ្ហាវិន័យផ្សេងៗ។
• ជួបពិភាក្សាជាមួយមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សអំពីបញ្ហាការសិក្សា និងបញ្ហាវិន័យរបស់សិស្ស។
• សម្របសម្រួលរវាងសិស្ស និងគ្រូ រវាងមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល និងសាលា នៅពេលពួកគាត់មានការត្អូញត្អែរ ឬមានការតវ៉ាផ្សេងៗ។
• ធ្វើផែនការ និងយុទ្ធនាការផ្សេងៗដើម្បីតម្រង់ទិស និងពង្រឹងវិន័យដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស (អនុវត្ត តាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ)។ 
• សហការជាមួយគ្រូបន្ទុកថា្នក់ និងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ទក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។
• មើលសិស្សពេលចូលមកសាលា ចេញលេង និងចេញទៅផ្ទះ។
• ដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យតាមថ្នាក់ម្តងម្កាលពេលម៉ោងសិក្សា ដើម្បីមើលបញ្ហាសិស្ស និងគ្រូ។
• ចូលរួមប្រជុំនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
• ណាត់ជួបមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស។
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ទៅចាងហ្វាងដោយផ្ទាល់មាត់ជារៀងរាល់សប្តាហ៍។
Job Requirement: • បញ្ចប់សញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញាបត្រចិត្តវិទ្យា ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។  • មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ ឬបទពិសោធន៍ពាក់ព័ន្ធ យ៉ាងតិចពីរឆ្នាំ។• មានចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងនឹងដំណាក់កាលលូតលាស់របស់កុមារ និងជំទង់។ • មានចំណេះដឹង និងមានក្រមសីលធម៌ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាយោបល់។• ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រដូចជា Ms. Word, Ms. Excel, Power Point, Internet និង Email។• មានលក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ។• ចេះគោរពពេលវេលា ស្មោះត្រង់ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ចេះបត់បែន និងអាចទទួលយកចំណេះដឹងថ្មីៗ។• មានជំនាញសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានានា។• អាចនិយាយ និងសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ និងអាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន។• មានសមត្ថភាពវិភាគស្ថានភាពរបស់សិស្ស ដោយធ្វើផែនការ អនុវត្ត តាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ។• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើការងារ។• មានការចូលរួមសកម្មភាពជួយសង្គម និងវគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្តាលខ្លីៗ។មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងការផ្ដួចផ្ដើម។How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Responsible for Supporting and functioning of the Office of the Founder, Chairman and CEO and BoDs.• Helps manage the day-to-day tasks of OFCCEO and work in close collaboration with Secretary Team.• Assist Chief of Staff to develop any policy and SOP of OFCCEO and implement.• Assist Chief of Staff to set KPI to subordinates and monitor their works.• Work in close collaboration with Secretary Team to ensure all company’s important documents are filed properly.• Provide full administrative and secretarial support to the Founder, Chairman and CEO.• Assists in coordination the agenda of management meetings with Mr. Chairman. Make sure meeting material submitted in advance and all participants join the meeting on-time.• Taking minute of the meeting.• Attend the meeting on behalf of OFCCEO.• Monitoring and analyzing accounting data and produce financial reports.• Assist Chief of Staff to review documents submitted to OFCCEO.• Provide event management support as requested.• Organize Mr. Chairman’s and BoDs’s business trip.• Summary meeting minutes and reports.• Coordinate with relevant Departments and sister Companies on behalf of OFCCEO.• Ensure to fil all confidential information of company and Mr. Chairman.• Review and keep track on all financial report from Finance Department.• Performs routine review bookkeeping.• Review and check on all accounting voucher.• Prepare assets listing and depreciation schedule.• Close Month-End Accounting Record.• Quarterly Fixed Assets Confirmation.• Prepare Monthly Financial Statements.• Update fixed assets register and coding.• Monitor operation of QuickBooks and daily problem solving.• Month-end stock count all Inventories• Propose on adjustment entry and request for approval of Chief of Staff.• Create or update policy and procedures for internal control.• Team meeting and open discussion.• Responsible on monthly and year tax declaration and property tax.• Other tasks assigned by line manager and required by the company.
Job Requirement: • BA in Accounting or Business Administration• 3 to 5 years experiences in Accounting and/or Secretarial.• Accounting and QuickBooks is highly recommended.• Strong written and verbal communication skills• Good at problem solving• Enable to manage and supervise team• Working knowledge on QuickBooks and Microsoft Office (Word, Excel & PowerPoint)• Good in Office administration and time management How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Oversee the school campus.- Plan for and execute the continuous growth of the campus.   - Read and respond to teaching and non-teaching staff term report.- Monitor student, teaching and non-teaching staff opinion survey and result.- Prepare teaching schedule.- Monitor personnel management (staff details, staff requisition, CV shortlist, contract, timesheet check, leave check, monthly staff movement, salary addition and deduction, absence record, etc.)- Establish and maintain professional and cooperative working relationships with all stakeholders: parents, students, staff, neighbors, and partners.- Supervise school and public safety and school maintenance.- Supervises the maintenance of student records, including assessment results, test scores, discipline citations, and other documents.- Prepare and process field trip requests.- Maintain and update school website regularly.- Prepare and maintains purchase orders and other expense records; approve, and monitor expenditures and ensure expenditures are within budget allowances for the year.- Prepare necessary forms to hire, upgrade, terminate or authorize special payments to staff.- Recruit qualified and experienced teachers and staff. - Plans, assigns, trains, and evaluate classified staff in accordance with school standards, timelines, and procedures.- Plan the arrangements for school contests and events and community activities.- Act as liaison between school and other schools, the parents, outside agencies, and the public.- Develop, implement, and monitor work practices, systems, and methods that are effective, efficient, and consistent with school standards, policies, and procedures.- Prepare annual school calendar and plan the arrangements for school contests and events and community activities.- Promote and maintain a positive and effective school climate by ensuring that all interactions with staff, students, parents, and the public at large are prompt, efficient, helpful and friendly.- Seek out and participate in educational and professional development. - Recognize problems and impediment and report them promptly with solutions to the President- Monitor and analyze student performance assessment data preparing reports as needed for various special projects.- Perform other duties as assigned by Chairman and President- Read all comments from the student opinion survey about their teachers and the school as a whole. Take actions on those comments where and when applicable. - Read all comments or complaints sent by the Information Office. Solve them where and when applicable. - Update all handbooks regularly, usually termly, based on the changes of the policies. - Go and check each cafeteria twice per week in each building and write a report and then submit to the Office of the President every week. - Do the CBC round as schedule. -​ Get the P&L, CF, BS of each business and service units every month from Finance Department. Call for a meeting with those business and service units every month.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Provide guidance and counseling to students who need appropriate resources, 
• Service as a primary point of contact for the students,
• Organize new student orientation,
• Prepare and update the student handbook,
• Prepare informational materials for the students,
• Liaise with the Information Office and other departments to provide a comprehensive guide to the student.
• Authorize on the permission slip,
• Counsel the students academically and behaviorally,
• Seek for first aid training for the officers,
• Refer complaint or suggestion to relative departments,
• Be responsible for Lost and Found,
• Write annual report and submit on time,
• Provide sponsorship to repeaters,
• Other tasks will assigned by Line Manager
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree in  TESOL, or related field of education; Advanced degree preferred
• Three to five years of experience in a similar position
• Direct experience/knowledge of independent boarding schools preferred
• Knowledge of academic support functions
• Counseling and advising skills
• Management and supervisory skills
• Have excellent integrity and demonstrate good moral character  and initiative
• Strong interpersonal skills, including an enthusiastic, collaborative approach. 
• Must be able to work independently as well as part of the Academic Office team
• Strong organizational skill for multi-tasking and prioritizing responsibilities to manage competing deadlines
• Strong writing and communication skills"

** Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted within 7 working-day

job title: គ្រូគណិតវិទ្យា (មធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ)

position: គ្រូគណិតវិទ្យា (មធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ)
Job Description: • ការងារគរុកោសល្យ។• ការអប់រំសីលធម៌។• ការងាររដ្ឋបាល។• ការចូលរួម។• ទំនាក់ទំនង។
Job Requirement: ការសិក្សា :• មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេស ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។• មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។ • ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍ :• មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងយ៉ាងតិចពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំ។  • មានចំណេះដឹងលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេសច្បាស់លាស់។• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ឬចំណេះដឹងបច្ចេកទេសដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា MS. OFFICE, INTERNET/ E-MAIL ។ល។• មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេសកាន់តែល្អ(សម្រាប់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូក្រៅពីភាសាអង់គ្លេស)។ • មានគុណវុឌ្ឍិ និងសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រាន់ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារដោយភាពម្ចាស់ការ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។ • មានសមត្ថភាពសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។• មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ។ របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។*ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត និងមិនត្រូវបានជ្រើសរើសចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងមានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Provide inspiring and purposeful leadership for the staff, teachers and students.- Work in partnership with the Aii, staff and parents generating the beliefs and values that will underpin the school.- Continue to implement a Development Plan that will secure continuous school improvement.- Monitor and evaluate the performance of the school and respond and report to the management as required.- Ensure that management, finances, organization and administration of the school supports its vision and aims.- Ensure that school policies and practices take account of national, local and school requirements.- Monitor, evaluate and review the impact of policies, priorities and targets of the school in practice, and take action if necessary.- Ensure that all those involved in the school are committed to its aims, motivated to achieve them, and involved in meeting long, medium and short term objectives and targets which secure the educational success of the school.- Secure delivery of the highest possible standards of teaching and learning throughout the school.- Develop and maintain a focus on achievement, maximizing the potential and academic performance of all students against national and individual targets and aspirations.- Maintain effective assessment, recording and reporting systems of student progress and ensure these are used to challenge underperformance and drive improvement.- Build and maintain effective partnerships between school, students and parents to support learning.- Involve students, as appropriate, in the decision-making processes in the school by developing policies and practice that treat students as partners in the learning process.- Monitor, evaluate and review classroom practice and promote improvement strategies leading to raised standards.- Develop and implement a broad and relevant curriculum, which embraces the school’s specialisms, innovative approaches to teaching and learning, national initiatives and is at the forefront of best practice, to meet the needs of all students.- Ensure that educational provision and achievement for pupils with special needs are maximized through an appropriate mix of integrated and specialist needs provision.- Monitor and evaluate the curriculum for both quality and value for money.- Ensure that suitably challenging targets are set, including those for student attainment, progress, behavior and attendance.- Develop an ethos and structure for managing behavior, which enables each student to achieve their potential, including the management of pastoral care, student welfare and effective anti-bullying procedures.- Be outward facing, taking a strategic role in the development of new and emerging technologies to enhance and extend the learning experience of students and the pedagogical skills of staff, deploying technological resources effectively and efficiently in order to realize the aims of the school.- Create a culture of challenge, high expectations and support where all students can achieve success and be engaged in personalized learning, supported by a curriculum offer appropriate to their individual needs, aspirations and abilities.- Ensure a wide range of community-based, off-site and outdoor learning experiences are available.- To promote extracurricular activities in accordance with the educational aims of the school.- Supervise ESL Teachers and other staff.- Plan, allocate, support and evaluate work undertaken by groups, teams and individuals, ensuring clear delegation of tasks and devolution of responsibilities in a manner consistent with conditions of employment.- Implement and sustain effective systems for the management of staff performance, incorporating performance management and target setting.- Promote and monitor the continuing professional development of staff, conduct a workshop or sharing sessions to the teachers under supervision.

OFFICE, INTERNET/ E-MAIL ។ល។• មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេសកាន់តែល្អ(សម្រាប់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូក្រៅពីភាសាអង់គ្លេស)។ • មានគុណវុឌ្ឍិ និងសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រាន់ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារដោយភាពម្ចាស់ការ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។ • មានសមត្ថភាពសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។• មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ។ • មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងមានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។*ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត និងមិនត្រូវបានជ្រើសរើសចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Occasional work that may extend beyond the normal workday- Occasional operation of a vehicle under inclement weather conditions – Occasional interaction among unruly children/adults- Many situations that require hand motion, e.g., computer keyboard, typing, writing- Consistent requirements to sit, stand, walk, hear, see, read, speak, reach, stretch with hands and arms, crouch, kneel, climb and stoop- Consistent requirements to lift, carry, push, and pull various supplies and/or equipment up to a maximum of 25 kilos or more DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES- Directs the effective delivery and continuous improvement of business services of the MJQE Business Units- Develops maintenance and facilities goals and strategies to accomplish approved objectives within specified time lines- Develops short and long-range facility use plans; supervises new construction and renovation projects; ensures compliance with building codes and Disability accessibility standards- Schedules meetings with classified maintenance, custodial, grounds, food service, infrastructure technology, campuses-wide security, and other staff as needed; maintains effective communications to resolve problems and sustain progress- Prepares MJQE in meeting relevant ministries safety regulations/requirements- Works collaboratively with transportation department in assessing effective delivery of services- Participates as an active member of the MJQE Senior Management team- Co-reviewer of master facility plan with building owners (school presidents and school campus owners)- Assist in the development and coordination of the sections of the budget that pertain to custodial (In-house and Janitors), maintenance, infrastructure technology and food service personnel; reviews and analyzes composition and costs of the labor force- Confers with Presidents, Directors, Head Principals and relevant party heads to determine building needs based on budget variables and parameters; uses auditing processes to analyze structure and costs in relationship to conditions of the MJQE finances and local economy- Confers with Presidents, Directors, Head Principals and relevant party heads to determine building/facility needs based on variables such as, but not limited to, enrollment; budget parameters; students and staff needs; uses auditing processes to analyze building and facility costs- Manages cost-control/energy savings and/or other programs; prepares revenue and expense projections for school facilities (e.g., rental revenues/agreements/etc.)- Administers Board of Trustees and Senior Managements approved permanent improvement budget- Prepares competitive bid and quotes specifications, contracts with MJQE- Recommends and monitors performance of contractors/vendors with Procurement and relevant parties involved- Assist finance team with the management of the MJQE’s non-consumable asset- Manages non-school use of MJQE facilities (e.g., rental, scheduling, set-up, etc.)- Oversees effective maintenance and custodial services- Serves as the MJQE liaison to governmental regulatory agencies and monitors compliance with safety regulations and environmental laws- Work with insurance company on risk assessment- Periodically visits buildings at night to monitor custodial staff- Collaborates with maintenance, SPSD, and relevant department heads and to ensure building inspections are periodically completed and informs campus owners of results Performs building inspections with staff and informs principles of results- Works with all required teams on safety inspections- Administers employment testing procedures for classified applications; manages classified staff selection and orientation processes (Operational staff)
Job Requirement: 1. A Bachelor’s Degree or higher in business administration education or accounting preferred2. Experiences as an Operations Director or higher or experience within a school/college operations office preferred3. And/or Any additional qualifications, training or other credentials, as determined by the Senior ManagementsREQUIRED SKILLS AND ABILITIES1. Communication Skills: Must be able to read, analyze, and interpret information relevant to the position, including being able to speak effectively to small and large groups of people, and to communicate clearly and concisely both orally and in writing.2. Leadership Ability: Must be able to articulate the vision and mission for the company and provide appropriate direction, guidance, and management skills to achieve them.3. Mathematics Skills: Must have the ability to work with basic mathematical and computational concepts4. Reasoning Ability: Must be able to define problems, collect data, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions5. Technology Skills: Able to effectively use, as it applies to your specific job function, typical office applications and computer programs such as word processing, spreadsheets, and presentations; must be able to use email.PERSONAL QUALIFICATIONS1. Demonstrates enthusiasm and a sincere desire to aid and ensure the safety (SPSD & CCTV) of all2. Is able to accept constructive criticism/feedback3. Demonstrates professional tact and diplomacy with administrators, staff, teachers, students, parents and the diverse community4. Is conscientious and assumes responsibility for one’s own work performance5. Anticipates problems and unforeseen events and deals with them in an appropriate manner6. Demonstrates an ability to make the proper decisions when required7. Demonstrates loyalty to the administrative team8. Possesses high moral character and a good attendance record9. Promotes good social relationships as well as promoting good public relations by personal appearance, attitude and conversation10. Participates in appropriate professional organizations and their activities.11. Maintains a calm attitude and sense of control at all times12. Maintains a high level of ethical behavior and confidentiality of information.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • រៀបចំកិបកាសែតរៀងរាល់ព្រឹក នៅជាន់ផ្ទាល់ដី និងការរក្សាទុកទិន្នន័យ• បោសសម្អាត រៀបចំទុកដាក់សៀវភៅ តុ កៅអី ក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ របៀបរៀបរយ និងអនាម័យតាមដាន ដោះស្រាយ ត្រួតពិនិត្យការខ្ចីសៀវភៅយឺត ឬបាត់ និងការផាកពិន័យ• បោះត្រាក្នុងសៀវភៅ• បញ្ចូលកាតាឡុកសៀវភៅ• អ៊ុតក្របសៀវភៅ• គ្រប់គ្រងការខ្ចី និងសងសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• បញ្ចូលពាក្យសុំចូលជាសមាជិបណ្ណាល័យ បោះត្រា និងចុះហត្ថលេខា• ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលសិស្សពេលសិស្សចូលបណ្ណាល័យ និងការសម្របសម្រួលផ្សេងៗ• ថតរូបភាពសកម្មភាពសិស្សអានសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ស្រង់ស្ថិតិអ្នកចូលប្រើប្រាស់បណ្ណាល័យ និងកុំព្យូទ័រ ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• ធ្វើបញ្ជីរបាយការណ៍ខ្ចី-សងសៀវភៅ និងប្រាក់ផាកពិន័យ ទៅកាន់ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា កត់ត្រាកំណត់ហេតុអង្គប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្ថិតិអ្នកចូលប្រើប្រាស់បណ្ណាល័យ និងកុំព្យូទ័រ ប្រចាំខែ• បំពាក់សម្ភារផ្សេងៗ ឱ្យឯកសារ (បិទលេខកូដ សលាកប័ត្រខ្ចីសង Barcode ពាក្យកម្មសិទ្ធ និងស្លាកផ្សេងៗ)• ស្នើសុំសម្ភារដែលត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• រាប់ស្តុកសៀវភៅ• ចូលរួមកិច្ចប្រជុំគណៈកម្មការអគារប្រចាំខែ• ចងក្រងប្រវត្តិសកម្មភាពដែលមានក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ប្រគល់កាសែតទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបណ្ណសារដ្ឋាន (ចំពោះតាមសាខាប្រគល់ទៅផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល)• ស្រង់ឈ្មោះ និងធ្វើបញ្ជីបញ្ជីឈ្មោះសមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ចែកបណ្ណសរសើរដល់សមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• បង្កើតសកម្មភាពជម្រុញអំណាន និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពីបណ្ណាល័យ (យ៉ាងតិច៤សកម្មភាពក្នុង១ឆ្នាំ)• រៀបចំតុបតែងសោភ័ណភាពបណ្ណាល័យទៅតាមព្រឹត្តិការណ៍សកម្មភាពបណ្ណាល័យ និងបុណ្យប្រពៃណីជាតិ និងអន្តរជាតិ• ធ្វើបញ្ជីចំណងជើងសៀវភៅដែលត្រូវស្នើសុំទិញបន្ថែម• ចុះបញ្ជីសារពើភ័ណ្ឌសម្ភារ និងចុះបញ្ជីសៀវភៅចូល• ជួយការងារផ្នែកផ្សេងៗតាមការស្នើសុំជាក់ស្តែង• ទទួលការចុះអធិការកិច្ចរបស់ក្រសួង-មន្ទីរអប់រំ សម្រាប់ថ្នាក់បឋមសិក្សា មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ (សម្រាប់តែបណ្ណាល័យ សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង)
Job Requirement: • ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬវិញ្ញាបនបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ• ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាមុខវិជ្ជាជំនាញបណ្ណារក្ស និងបញ្ចប់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ• ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស• ទទួលបានវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ• មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារចាប់ពី១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងាររបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: គ្រូរូបវិទ្យា (មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ)
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូរូបវិទ្យា (មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ)
Job Description: • ការងារគរុកោសល្យ។• ការអប់រំសីលធម៌។• ការងាររដ្ឋបាល។• ការចូលរួម។• ទំនាក់ទំនង។
Job Requirement: ការសិក្សា :• មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេស ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។• មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។ • ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍ :• មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងយ៉ាងតិចពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំ។  • មានចំណេះដឹងលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេសច្បាស់លាស់។• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ឬចំណេះដឹងបច្ចេកទេសដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា MS. OFFICE, INTERNET/ E-MAIL ។ល។• មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេសកាន់តែល្អ(សម្រាប់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូក្រៅពីភាសាអង់គ្លេស)។ • មានគុណវុឌ្ឍិ និងសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រាន់ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារដោយភាពម្ចាស់ការ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។ • មានសមត្ថភាពសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។• មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ។ • មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងមានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។*ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត និងមិនត្រូវបានជ្រើសរើសចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Be responsible and accountable for setting and advancing the academic strategy of the Department in line with Faculty and the Aii Language Center strategic plans and direction.- Be an active member of the Faculty Executive Board and contribute to the overall leadership and management of the Faculty: it is expected that Deputy Campus Director will carry functional responsibility for specific agreed cross-cutting Faculty areas.- Develop and sustain appropriate structures for management, consultation, decision-making and communication with staff and students.- Promote and represent the center both internally and externallyResponsibility for Teaching & Students- Ensure the best possible student experience - Refresh and develop new programs in order to attract new students and markets.Responsibility for Research- Ensure the highest levels of quality, integrity and ethics in all research undertaken.- Create a dynamic and forward-looking research environment for both staff and students.- Create and exploit new opportunities for knowledge transfer activity in order to secure additional income streams and new areas of teaching and/or research.- Contribute to the center-wide initiatives in order to improve understanding and communication of this area.- Ensure that School HR policies and procedures are implemented.- Ensure that staff performance is managed appropriately and in a way that is consistent with the expectations of the Management & the Senate, and that fair workload allocation processes are in place- Ensure all staffs have access to the necessary support to enable them to contribute fully and develop their skills and experience.- Engender a culture of excellence, co-operation and respect both within and beyond the department.- Make effective use of all staffing resources and seek opportunities for collaboration and joint working with others beyond the department and beyond the Faculty.- Ensure students are included as appropriate in the various decisions making within the department.- Ensure a safe and healthy environment for both staff and students, and full compliance with health and safety requirements.- Supervise & work collaboratively with the head teachers.- Take responsibility for devolved budgets and comply with the centers financial regulations.- Manage income and expenditure in order to promote financial sustainability.- Ensure adherence by all Departmental members, with the Center Financial Regulations and other financial operating procedures and regulations.- Ensure that Center’s equipment/facilities under the department´s control are properly maintained and serviced as required.- Ensure all activities are carried out to the highest possible standards and put in place the necessary evaluation and monitoring procedures to ensure both compliance and improvement: such procedures will include teaching, research and management of all resources.- Comply with auditing, quality assurance and management procedures both internal and external development of Academic & Research- Develop and implement all short term and long term strategies and ensure consistency in same.- Assist management with accurate information as required for all campus associate activities and initiate decisions.- Determine and ensure effective maintenance on organized structure on campus.- Supervise effective working of all subordinates and provide business and managerial assistance to all and develop effective team.- Analyze all fiscal requirements for campus and execute strategies to achieve same.- Ensure adherence to all statutory and regulatory regulations.- Develop and implement various business plans on quarterly and monthly basis ensure effective working of everyday operations- Monitor all objectives and strategic goals for operations and finances and ensure achievement of same.Develop various new academic programs and provide modification to all current programs.- Administer all student recruitment.
Job Requirement: - Master degree in Education or related field- Management experiences in education and related fields- Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to understand and keep within a budget- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skills. How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.
• Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.
• Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.
• Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.
• Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.
• Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.
• Organize learning materials and resources.
• Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.
• Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.
• Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.
• Follow and comply with teaching standards.
• Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.
• Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent
• Master degree is a plus
• Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to employ technology
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។
បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 61 700 181

• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។
បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 61 700 181
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
•Perform routine examinations of patients
• Understand patients’ health conditions based on symptoms and tests
• Suggest treatments based on findings
• Give appropriate health service
• Set diagnosis based on medical expertise and knowledge.
• Access patient’s medical history
• Examine, analyze and interpret lab test results
• Provide different medical treatments, medications and drugs.
• Collaborate with team members
• Keep records of patients’ progress and history
• Adhere to laws, rules and regulations
• Refer patients to specialists if necessary.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Keep under review all corporate governance arrangements or developments which might impact the Company to ensure that the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trust are fully briefed on these matters and has regard to them when taking decisions.• Provide specialized advice and guidance to Executive and Non-Executive and Managements on all matters of governance, legality, risk, compliance and business conduct and will manage and reconcile conflicting views in relation to governance issues.• Ensure that the Executive and Non-Executive remains compliant with applicable standards of corporate governance and has the necessary infrastructure to support the governance rationale and governance framework.• Ensure that the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, Board’s and each of Trustees and each of their committees conduct their business in compliance with applicable legal and regulatory frameworks and associated codes of governance and practice, and in a manner which is otherwise appropriate for a public body.• Take corporate responsibility for the formulation and implementation of a framework for the development and management of legal and compliance procedural documents (policies, procedures, protocols and guidance) and to ensure its implementation.• Address any non-compliance with the applicable Codes of Conduct and Accountability.• Monitor the suitability and efficacy of risk management provisions and advise on improvements in support of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees ability to make quarterly (or monthly) and annual statements and returns to the Regulator.• Ensure good information flows within the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees and its committees and between senior management, non-executive directors and managements. • Ensure that the requisite types of governance information are made available, either on the company’s website or in documents circulated to stakeholders;• Ensure the preparation, publication, distribution and presentation of the annual report;• Make available, where appropriate, for public inspection:  o A copy of the current constitution, registrations  o A copy of the latest annual accounts and any report of the auditor on those accounts  o A copy of the latest annual report• Ensure that all returns and self-certifications required by monitor, the Independent Regulator, are submitted in full and on time.• Ensure that the company complies with its constitution and that amendments to it are drafted and incorporated in line with correct procedures;• Attend Executive Management Team meetings to ensure congruence between the business of the Executive Management Team.• Bring to the attention of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees any areas of unmanaged risk, or unique risks that are not otherwise addressed;• Ensure that appropriate arrangements are made for the planning and production of agendas, reports and the subsequent minutes for meetings of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Boar of Trustees. • Contribute to a range of corporate projects relating to business proposals and developments.Legal Service• Provide a comprehensive Legal Service to deal with legal issues including inquests, employment law, litigation, commercial and contract law, and other judicial processes such as the management of claims arising from clinical negligence, complaints, disciplinary procedures and where relevant, untoward incidents reports and external enquiries;• Manage in-house staff and external legal service contract and associated budgets.• Ensure that appropriate procedures and protocols in place for the management of requests for legal advice and instructions on behalf of the Company;• Establish and communicate procedures for Management to take legal advice if required;
Job Requirement: • Master’s Degree in Law, private law, and corporate law.• 5 years management experience.• Strong knowledge in commercial and business laws, civil code, civil procedure,legal statutes and legislations on construction, development, and land laws.• Khmer and English (other languages are an advantage).• Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel…• Hand-on legal practitioner.• Relational and People-centered.• Attention to Detail and Focus.• Trustworthy and Professional.• Committed and Loyal.• Highest level of Character and Integrity.• Strong leadership and management skills.

Job Description: • ត្រួតពិនិត្យសិស្សលើ ឯកសណ្ឋាន សក់​ ស្បែកជើង​ ការយឺត• Do round អគារ ពេលចេញលេង• ដោះស្រាយសិស្សមានបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗ• ការអប់រំសីលធម៌• ការងាររដ្ឋបាល• ការចូលរួម• ទំនាក់ទំនង
Job Requirement: • មានសញ្ញាបត្រលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេស​ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។• មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ។• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កំព្យូទ័រ​លើកម្មវិធីដូចជា​ Office​​, Internet/ E-mail ។ល។• មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេស​ (ភាសាអង់គ្លេស…)។• មានលទ្ធភាព/សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់​ការ ទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និង​ទាមទារ• ការគ្រប់គ្រងតិចតួចពីគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។• មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ។• មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងពីរឆ្នាំ​យ៉ាងតិច។
