job title: គ្រូកុំព្យូទ័រ - Computer Teacher
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូកុំព្យូទ័រ - Computer Teacher
Job Description: ១. សមត្ថភាពបច្ចេកទេសគរុកោសល្យក)- ការងារគរុកោសល្យ  (ការបង្រៀន)- គោរពម៉ោងពេលបង្រៀនឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់ និងជាប្រចាំ- បង្កើត និងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ជាប្រចាំលើបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សាគ្រប់កម្រិតដែលខ្លួនបង្រៀនឱ្យស្របតាមបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សាគោលរបស់សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង              - អនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យទៀងទាត់ និងជាប្រចាំលើការកសាង/ អភិវឌ្ឍន៍/កែសម្រួល លើកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ/ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍- ផលិត និងប្រើប្រាស់នូវសម្ភារឧបទេស (ការបង្កើតដោយផ្ទាល់ដៃ ឬការ ទិញស្រាប់) ដែលទាក់ទងនឹងខ្លឹមសារមេរៀនឱ្យមានលក្ខណៈសម្បូរបែបក្នុងដំណើរការបង្រៀនសិស្ស- អនុវត្តន៍វិធីសាស្រ្តបង្រៀនតាមគោលវិធី “សិស្សមជ្ឈមណ្ឌល”  - បង្រៀនទ្រឹសី្តតិច ហើយនាំសិស្សចូលបន្ទប់អនុវត្តន៍កុំព្យូទ័រឱ្យបានច្រើន- រៀបចំបង្កើតកម្រងសំណួរ ឬវិញ្ញាសា និងអត្រាកំណែ ប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី១ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី២  ឆមាសលើកទី១ និងឆមាសលើកទី២ ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព បច្ចេកទេស គន្លឹះ និងច្បាស់លាស់លើ ទម្ងន់ ប្រភេទនៃសំណួរ និងទម្រង់បែបបទនៃ វិញ្ញាសា- អនុវត្តន៍ការវាយតម្លៃប្រចាំខែ លើការសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស តាមរយៈគោលការណ៍៥០% លើសកម្មភាពសិក្សាក្នុងថ្នាក់ (កិច្ចការផ្ទះ ឬការ ស្រាវជ្រាវ២០%  សំណួរQUIZ ឬសំណួរផ្ទាល់មាត់ ឬពិនិត្យសៀវភៅ១០%  វិន័យ និងសីលធម៌១០% សកម្មភាពក្នុងថ្នាក់៥%  អវត្តមាន៥%)  និង៥០% លើការប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ  ប្រកបដោយភាពហ្មត់ចត់ តឹងរ៉ឹង និងម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ កម្រិតខ្ពស់បំផុត ធានាឱ្យបាននូវតម្លាភាព និង គុណភាពលើសមត្ថភាពពិតប្រាកដរបស់សិស្ស- តាមដានលើការសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស លើកទឹកចិត្ត  និងរិះរកគ្រប់មធ្យោបាយ     លើបច្ចេកទេសបង្រៀន ដើម្បីជួយដល់សិស្សដែលរៀនខ្សោយក្នុងថ្នាក់- សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវបន្ថែម លើវិធីសាស្រ្តល្អៗក្នុងការបង្រៀន និងបង្កើតនូវវប្បធម៌ចែករំលែកគ្នារាល់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារខ)- កិច្ចការគ្រប់គ្រងថ្នាក់- ត្រួតពិនិត្យសិស្សលើឯកសណ្ឋាន កាតសិស្ស សក់ ក្រចកដៃ ផាត់មុខ និងវត្តមានសិស្សជាប្រចាំ រៀងរាល់ម៉ោងបង្រៀន- ត្រួតពិនិត្យអនាម័យ សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ថ្នាក់រៀន និងតុកៅអីក្នុងថ្នាក់ (គ្មានការគូសវាស) ជាប្រចាំរៀងរាល់ម៉ោងបង្រៀន- ចូលរួមសន្សំសំចៃទឹកភ្លើង និងការប្រើប្រាស់វាំងននក្នុងម៉ោងបង្រៀន បទបែនតាមស្ថានភាពជាក់ស្តែង- ចូលរួម និងសហការការងារសិក្សាធិការរបស់សិស្សជាមួយការិយាល័យសិក្សា អ្នកប្រឹក្សាសាលា ចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក តាមនីតិវិធីការងារ និងបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងដែលមានចែង- ប្រតិបត្តិនូវការងារផ្សេងៗដែលកំណត់ដោយចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកគ)- ប្រជុំបច្ចេកទេសគរុកោសល្យ- ចូលរួមប្រជុំបច្ចេកទេស ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ឬប្រចាំខែ តាមក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស របស់ខ្លួនឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់ និងគោរពតាមនីតិវិធីការងារ ឬ/និង គោលការណ៍នៃការប្រជុំក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស- ចែករំលែកបទពិសោធន៍ សមត្ថភាព ផ្លាស់ប្តូរយោបល់ បង្ហាញហេតុផល/ ការយល់ឃើញ យ៉ាងសកម្មក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌពិភាក្សាដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍ គរុកោសល្យ។- មានរបាយការណ៍ និងកំណត់ហេតុប្រជុំបច្ចេកទេសត្រឹមត្រូវ និងរក្សាទុកក្នុង សៀវភៅរដ្ឋបាលគ្រូ២. ការអប់រំសីលធម៌- ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលាសម្រាប់ផ្តល់នូវការអប់រំសីលធម៌ដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស- នៅឱ្យកៀកជាមួយនឹងសិស្ស ដើម្បីក្តាប់យកព័ត៌មាន ក៏ដូចជា ស្ថានភាពជាក់ស្តែងរបស់សិស្ស ព្រមទាំងបញ្ជូននូវព័ត៌មានទាំងឡាយណា ដែលជាបញ្ហាទៅកាន់ផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីរកដំណោះស្រាយ  និងជំនួយឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា- ធ្វើខ្លួនជាគំរូល្អ ទៅកាន់សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិករួមការងារ- ផ្តល់ និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយនូវតម្លៃ និងសីលធម៌ដល់សិស្ស ដើម្បីឱ្យពួកគេអាច បញ្ចូលខ្លួន និងអភិវឌ្ឍខ្លួននៅក្នុងសង្គម៣. ការងាររដ្ឋបាល គ្រប់គ្រង រៀបចំ ចងក្រង រក្សាទុក (Soft Coppy or/and Hard Coppy) លើវិញ្ញាសា និងអត្រាកំណែប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស ឆមាស សម្ភារឧបទេស និងសម្ភារសិក្សា កិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន និងមេរៀនសង្ខេបបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សា ស្នាដៃសិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវនានា (រួមទាំងសិស្ស ឬគ្រូខ្លួនឯង និងក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស)- ចូលរួមជាគណៈកម្មការប្រឡង  គណៈមេប្រយោគ  អនុរក្ស តាមការតែងតាំង/ ចាត់តាំងពីចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក- ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែឱ្យចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកផ្ទាល់អំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ បំណែងចែក កម្មវិធីសិក្សា ឬដំណើរការនៃការបង្រៀន លទ្ធផលសិក្សា របស់សិស្ស (លទ្ធផលវិជ្ជាមាន និងចំណុចដែលត្រូវអភិវឌ្ឍ) តាមខែនីមួយ- បញ្ចូលពិន្ទុប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស ឆមាសក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធពិន្ទុ (DATA BASE) និងផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ពិន្ទុជូនផ្នែកលេខាធិការតាម កាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលសាលាបានកំណត់។- ប្រតិបត្តិនូវការងារផ្សេងៗដែលកំណត់ដោយចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក
Job Requirement: - មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការបង្រៀន Microsoft Office and Design - មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំយ៉ាងតិច- មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេស (ភាសាអង់គ្លេស…)- មានលទ្ធភាព/សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ ទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងទាមទារការគ្រប់គ្រងតិចតូចពីគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។- មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យរបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនងទូរស័ព្ទមកខាងយើងខ្ញុំតាមរយៈលេខ៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: • Perform routine examinations of patients.• Understand patients’ health conditions based on symptoms and tests.• Suggest treatments based on findings.• Give appropriate health service.• Set diagnosis based on medical expertise and knowledge.• Access patient’s medical history.• Examine, analyze and interpret lab test results. • Provide different medical treatments, medications and drugs.• Collaborate with team members.• Keep records of patients’ progress and history.• Adhere to laws, rules and regulations.• Refer patients to specialists if necessary.
Job Requirement: • Previous working experience as a doctor for 5 years• Doctor of medicine degree (MD)• Proficient at patient charting and knowledgeable in relevant charting computer programs.• Ability to multi-task efficiently and effectively.• Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with patients, medical staff, management and peers.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

job title: Thai Teacher - គ្រូបង្រៀនភាសាថៃ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Thai Teacher - គ្រូបង្រៀនភាសាថៃ
Job Description: - Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).- Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.- Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.- Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.  - Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example. - Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.- Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).- Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.- Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use. - Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.- Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.- Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.- Contribute productively to the school as a whole.- Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.  - Organize learning materials and resources.- Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.- Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.- Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.- Follow and comply with teaching standards.- Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.- Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.- And other duties as assigned.

Job Description:
• Sourcing from other sources, purchase goods and services and negotiate for best price and good term of payments
• Cooperate with Shops, Standard Company or wholesale for purchase
• Search for new suppliers, and competitors to compete with existing suppliers
• Prepare Debit note and Credit note
• Cooperate and build good relationship with relevant departments to identify the specific needs
• Make sure the purchased items matches with the requirement
• Manage Petty Cash and prepare expense report and credit daily in computer for Procurement Supervisor
• Make sure to check with stock keeper before ordering.
Job Requirement: • A bachelor degrees in Business Administration, Accounting or any other relevant fields• At least 1-2 years of work experiences in Procurement and sourcing• Familiar with Windows Live Mail and MS. Office is highly desired, not mandatoryfor SUN system• Understanding logistics concepts• Familiarity with sourcing, vendor management and warehouse stock report and control• Solid judgement along with decision making skills;• Good oral and written both English and Khmer communication skills;• Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure and workload.• Good negotiation, Communication, and interpersonal skills and problem solving skills;• Ability to Prioritize tasks• Experience in construction purchase is a must.**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារសូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Job Requirement: •	មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។ • ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍ :• មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងយ៉ាងតិចពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំ។  • មានចំណេះដឹងលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេសច្បាស់លាស់។• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ឬចំណេះដឹងបច្ចេកទេសដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា MS. OFFICE, INTERNET/ E-MAIL ។ល។• មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេសកាន់តែល្អ(សម្រាប់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូក្រៅពីភាសាអង់គ្លេស)។ • មានគុណវុឌ្ឍិ និងសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រាន់ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារដោយភាពម្ចាស់ការ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។ • មានសមត្ថភាពសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។• មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ។ • មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងមានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។បៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។* ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត នឹងមិនត្រូវបានដាក់បញ្ចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Process the new student placement test, invigilate, mark the test and contact the interviewer to conduct the interview.• Record and process meeting minutes and other documents for all departments when required.• Input students’ results into database system and commit to human-error-free work.• Maintaining student’s file and properly keep all documents including application forms, receipts and other necessary documents are kept safely, yet easily accessible when needed. • Move Aii students who have paid school fee for semester or year to the next term.• Ensure the staff and student ID cards are issued on time and record and report of ID card issuance including broken ID card for Administration Supervisor (AS). Frequently check with warehouse about ID card and ensure it must not run out of stock.• Be in charge of organizing events either inside or outside the organization/school. Make sure proper checklist of items used in each event are recorded and return back to stock when the event’s finished.• Conduct the student’s opinion survey of American Intercon School.• Conduct the student’s opinion survey of Aii Language Center. • Record and process meeting minutes and other documents for all departments when required.• Make sure new term preparation checklist is done at least one week for the term starts.• Make sure new term preparation checklist is done at least one week for the term starts. Drinking water, coffee, tea and other materials must be checked and report to Administration Supervisor.• Design for internal use.• And other assigned tasks.** Sub-Responsibilities:1. Maintain and record In-and-Out documents, and process In & Out documents to the relevant departments.2. Give reception and make of the Student Certification Letter such as; reference, transcripts, recommendation letter and other official letters.3. Create and update Aii class schedule by term.4. Check and update Office’s stationary and inventory to make sure that they are able to use or replace or lose or buy new.5. Check and update Office’s Fixed Asset to make sure that they have stayed at the same place or moved out.6. Maintaining student’s file and properly keep all documents including application forms, receipts and other necessary documents are kept safely, yet easily accessible when needed. 7. Ensuring the memo, poster, and announcement are posted on the bulletin board regularly.8. Stamping on documents, letter to parents, certificates and other official documents.9. Printing monthly attendance sheet for Aii at the end of the month.10. Design for internal use.11. And other assigned tasks.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor Degree in Management, Education or other related fields.• Administrative and Organizational Skills• Experienced in dealing with administrative affairs in school or education field• Be able to use office applications including Word, Excel, Power Point, and E-mail.• Be able to communicate with team and can complete work with tight timelines and multiple deadlines.**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងាររបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Perform regular annual exams on patient
• Analyze records, reports, test results, or examination information to diagnose medical condition of the patient
• Explain procedures and discuss test result or prescribed treatment with patients
• Collect, record, and maintain patient information such as medical histories, reports, and examination results
• Monitor patient over the course of pregnancies
• Treat infection of the cervix, ovaries and Fallopian tubes
• Identify cancerous growths within the reproductive system
• Refer patient to medical specialist or another practitioner when necessary
• Provide postnatal care to new mother
• Educated patients on practices that promote wellness and health and instructed on a measure to Detect any abnormality or aberration in the female body such as breast self-examination
Job Requirement:
• Associate Degree Nursing from Phnom Penh, Institution of Paramedical and Medical Science/Colleges in Environmental Science at Pannasastra University of Cambodia related to closely field
• 4 years of OB-GYN residency
• 2 years+ of practicing medicine in a hospital or private practice
• 2 years+ experience as an obstetric or abdominal ultrasound technician
• Proficient at patient charting and knowledgeable in relevant charting computer program

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - To supervise a station and ensure that standards are maintained at all times- To personally coach, train, and develop the F&B service team to ensure good food and beverage knowledge, perfect Sequence of service delivery, and our LIFE values- To ensure the smooth preparation of the restaurant side-stations, mise-en-place and table set-ups as per outlets and Rotana standards- To continuously collect feedback from guests and report it back to the Management- Work in close cooperation with the Kitchen and Stewarding as well as the Outlet Cashiers to ensure a smooth-running operation- Ensure the proper appearance and grooming of assigned Colleagues- Maintain a professional and friendly relationship with the Outlet patrons to ensure their well-being- Well versed and knowledgeable in the Outlet’s menu, promotional activities, and other relevant issues concerning at store- Contribute to meeting and maximizing the monthly revenue budget for the respective outlet- Operate in a safe and environmentally friendly way to protect guests and colleagues’ health and safety, as well as protect and conserve the environment- Comply with the hotel’s environmental, health, and safety policies and procedures- To report any issue within the outlets to Housekeeping, Engineering, or Security depending on its nature- To handle in a professional way wine that is rejected or corked and hand-over the same to the Restaurant Manager- To assist a guest or colleague that is feeling unwell- Operate in a safe and environmentally friendly way to protect guests and colleagues’ health and safety, as well as protect and conserve the environment
Job Requirement: - You should ideally have a diploma/degree in the hospitality field with a maximum of two years of experience in a similar role. You should be possessing a good knowledge of both written and spoken English and a wide familiarity with Micros would be desirable. Previous experiences in minor leadership and supervisory roles are a definite plus.- Understanding the SOP system in- Taking Responsibility- Recognizing Differences- Customer Focus- Customer Focus- Adaptability- TeamworkHow to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: ជាងអគ្គិសនី
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: ជាងអគ្គិសនី
Job Description: 1. ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែក ឬអនុប្រធានក្រុមលើការត្រួតពិនិត្យថែទំា ជួសជុលសម្ភារ ឧបករណ៍ គ្រឿងបរិក្ខារអគ្គិសនី និងរៀបចំប្រព័ន្ធថ្មីបន្ថែមតាមអគារនីមួយៗ ឱ្យស្របតាមស្តង់ដាបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស និងមានដំណើរការល្អ។2. ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ សិក្សា និងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។3. រៀបចំផែនការការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។4. រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារ នៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើជូនប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកផ្ទាល់ នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម (13. Maintenance Unit)។5. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណភាព។6. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។7. ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំភ្ជាប់ជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារ។8. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារ បើមានការបាត់បង់ ត្រូវសន្សុំសំចៃ។9. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងពីចាប់ផ្ដើមរហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។10. ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។11. បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗ ដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។12. ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃ្លាំងសម្ភារ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ។ 13. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ។14. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។ 15. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការអនុវត្តការងារតាមបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យការងារ (Checklist) នៅតាមអគារ។ 16. ទទួលការងារពីថ្នាក់លើ ។
Job Requirement: - បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឯកទេស អគ្គិសនី និងពាក់ព័ន្ធ- មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥០ឆ្នាំ។- មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល ០២ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។- ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់។- អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់។- មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។ - ធ្វើការងារដោយគោរពទៅតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានចែង។- ការចេញពីទីតាំងការងារដោយគ្មានការអនុញ្ញាត ពីប្រធានផ្នែកត្រូវបញ្ឈប់ពីការងារ។- ត្រូវមានសៀវភៅ ឬឯកសារកត់ត្រា រាល់មានការប្រជុំ ឬពេលមានការងារពីថ្នាក់លើដាក់ឱ្យ។- ពេលបំពេញការងារ ត្រូវមានសម្ភារបួនប្រភេទ សម្ភារការពារ សម្ភារការពារសុវត្ថិភាព សម្ភារធ្វើ និងសម្ភារសម្អាត។- ចេះចែករំលែករាល់ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ដែលបានទទួលទៅឱ្យបុគ្គលិកនៅក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់បានដឹង។- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។ - មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។- ការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៍អគ្គិសនីតាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស។- គុណភាពការជួសជុលប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង។- គុណភាព និងសោភ័ណភាពការដំឡើងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង។- ការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រអប់ភ្លើងឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវជាមួយខ្សែភ្លើង។- គុណភាព និងសោភ័ណភាពការរត់ប្រអប់ភ្លើង។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Lead, develop and communicate the commercial vision, strategy, and resource requirements to successfully launch of the MJQE and subsidiaries companies under the group.• Ensure the management of all financial aspects of the company and business under the group company including budgeting, forecasting, long-range planning and overall management and accountability of the P&L.• Maintain and improve the branding of MJQE and subsidiaries companies to be successfully launch the IPO for the stock market.• Provide commercial analysis and direction for the development and management of the product pipeline and ensure current and future products are fully aligned with the needs of markets.• Regularly interact with the Founder, Chairman and CEO and research and development team regarding a wide array of topics related to current and future commercial business.• Lead all commercial launch preparation activities including brand strategy, product positioning and messaging, pricing and market access strategy, sales force strategy and resource planning.• Collaborate with President to develop business objectives and development goals.• Oversee the planning and implementation of business plans of new markets.• Oversee the sales and marketing functions of the businesses to maximize returns and expand the business brands of MJQE and subsidiaries companies under the group.• Meetings with customers to deliver sales and conduct sales of company products and services.• Conduct market research to identify developments/changes in industry trends in order to make necessary adjustments.• Establish strategic partnership with other companies to leverage on their network.• Develop, review and update relevant policies of their own units.• Review current approach to business development and make changes where necessary.• Assign sales quota and target to business development team and sales/marketing units.• Ensure business processes and standards are in accordance with regulations and policies set by appropriate authorities.• Set and enforce customer service standards to ensure clients are satisfied with received products/services.• Conduct negotiations to determine contract terms and ensure profitable deals.• Work with school program developer to ensure the school program are matched with the market demand.• Oversee the interviewing, recruitment, and training of commercial team.• Represent President or the Founder, Chairman and CEO to attend event, workshop and conference as required.• Other tasks assigned by the Founder, Chairman and CEO.
Job Requirement: • Master's degree in business administration, sales or marketing, or related fields.• More than 10 years of commercial experience, including new product planning, marketing, market analysis, sales leadership experience.• A strategic/analytical and results-driven thinker. • Demonstrated success in building commercial department and successfully launching new products.• Extensive experience with developing and executing marketing strategies and tactics, field leadership, market research and analysis and business forecasting.• Ability to work effectively in a fast-moving dynamic environment.• A resourceful and creative problem solver who will ‘roll up their sleeves’ to get the job done.• Problem-solving, and decision-making skills.• Exceptional leadership and management skills.• Effective communication and negotiation skills.• Proficient in all Microsoft Office applications.• Detail-oriented and persuasive.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • In charge and prepare all the mise en place and food item such as meat seafood, vegetables, potatoes, dried store etc. as required for the daily operation of Central kitchen  and every store. • Assist their direct supervisor with consistency and quality of food preparation and presentation to maintain the Central standards.• Give their subordinates sufficient support and guidance to ensure that they can perform in a satisfactory manner.• Observe and learn to operate the variety of kitchen equipment as provided in the respective working area• Take responsibility of the proper storage of vegetable, dried store and meat products.• Attend daily briefings and monthly meeting if required.  • Cleaning and maintaining tools and equipment and ensuring displays and signage are accurate and attractive.• Weighing, packaging, pricing, and displaying products.• Keeping records, budgets, and inventory.• Performing quality inspections on meats and other products.• Negotiating and confirming orders with suppliers.• Adhering to food safety and sanitation controls.• Coordinating deliveries or order pickups.• Checking invoice and PO with supply and receiver. • Checking ordering and inventory of butcher and commissary.
Job Requirement: • Demi chef De-parties’ certificate. • Proven experience as Dime chef butcher. • Outstanding communication and leadership skills.• Up to date with culinary trends and optimized kitchen processes.• Has minimum 1 years of relevant experience as demi chef butcher and commissary in a Hotel/Restaurant or Central kitchen is a plus.• Expertise in butcher (Vegetable, Meat, poultry, seafood).• Food Safety and Hygiene.• Management, Leadership and Communication Skill. • Problem solving and Pressure handling.• Can work in fast pack environment.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: Job Announcement𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎 𝐂𝐨., 𝐋𝐭𝐝., the parent company of 𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎, 𝐓𝐄𝐍𝟏𝟏, 𝐆𝐀𝐓𝐎𝐍𝐈, 𝐑𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐞, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝟑𝟔𝟏° planning to extend across the country, is currently looking for a talented and potential candidate for the Senior Fashion Merchandiser position.Job Title: Senior Fashion MerchandiserCategory: Fashion, Merchandising, PurchasingJob Description:•	Support the implementation of key strategic priorities in line with the company and the Market Merchandising framework•	Reviewing fashion trends and seasonal changes in order to stay up to date on the latest styles•	Analyzing past sales data in order to identify which products are selling well or poorly based on sales performance, different customer demographics, and store environment so that adjustments can be made in future purchasing•	Set up & analyze key merchandising reports to understand the category performance in each store, to know which new styles to order, which items to reorder, the quantity of each item, and colors and sizes to stock•	Assist in preparing budget planning for monthly stock purchases for the upcoming season, and present it to management for approval•	Negotiating contracts with suppliers or distributors in order to purchase products at the best prices possible, to ensure that the purchased items can be priced in a way that will sell and make a profit•	Maintaining relationships with suppliers or distributors to ensure that they meet deadlines and provide high-quality products•	Coordinating shipping and delivery of goods from suppliers or distributors to each store•	Assist the team in planning OTB for stores•	Prepare reports for effective pre-season planning•	Coordinate with Store Managers for in-season activities•	Other tasks assigned by Operation Managers.
Job Requirement: Requirements:•	MS Office skills (Excel skills are essential)•	Understanding of Merchandise and Planning Management•	Ability to think strategically, synthesize complex data, and develop innovative solutions•	Structured, organized & process oriented•	Excellent attention to detail and analytical skillsAbility to work within a team environment𝐎𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐁𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐭𝐬:•	Annual bonus•	Public Holidays•	Annual Leave, Sick Leave, and Special Leave•	Annual Trip and Annual Staff Party•	Health Insurance•	Seniority•	Birthday packages•	Employee DiscountInterested candidates are invited to submit their updated CV, and cover letter to our email: hr@zandokh.com or 𝙏𝙀𝙇𝙀𝙂𝙍𝘼𝙈: 𝟎𝟖𝟏 𝟐𝟕 𝟓𝟑 𝟓𝟑Join us on Telegram for more job opportunities: https://t.me/zandocareer
Company Profile: Founded in early 2015, ZANDO is a Cambodian fashion retail company inspiring your passion of styles and making you experience the world of iconic fashion brands at the value of every buck.
Contact Info: Contact Information H.R Department  081275353 hr@zandokh.com Phnom Penh 𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎 𝐇𝐄𝐀𝐃 𝐎𝐅𝐅𝐈𝐂𝐄, The Point Building, 31 Mao Tse Toung Boulevard (245), 2nd Floor 081275353

job title: គ្រូថែទាំកុមារ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូថែទាំកុមារ
Job Description: - រៀបចំបញ្ជីឈ្មោះសិស្សប្រើប្រាស់សេវាកម្មចម្លងវេនសិក្សា និងទូដាក់សម្ភារសិស្ស (Locker)។- ផ្ញើចំនួនសិស្សជូនគណៈកម្មការកម្មវិធីចម្លងវេនសិក្សាជាប្រចាំខែ។- រៀបចំបែងចែកចំនួនសិស្សទៅតាមបន្ទប់នីមួយៗ។- រៀបចំកម្មវិធីចម្លងវេនសិក្សា (កម្មវិធីចូលបណ្ណាល័យ កុំព្យូទ័រ សោតទស្សន៍) និងរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍។- រៀបចំអនាម័យ និងថែរក្សាសម្ភារប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងបន្ទប់គេង។- សហការជាមួយផ្នែកអាហារដ្ឋានរៀបចំមុខម្ហូប។- គ្រប់គ្រងការប្រើប្រាស់ទូ Locker ទៅតាមចំនួនសិស្សដែលទទួលសេវាកម្ម។- ស្នើសុំជួសជុល ឬចម្លងសោនៅពេលបាត់ ឬខូច។- ស្នើចំនួនអាហារទៅផ្នែកអាហារដ្ឋានជាប្រចាំទៅតាមចំនួនសិស្សដែលត្រូវញុំា។- ពិនិត្យអវត្តមានសិស្សពេលញុំា និងពេលគេង។- រៀបចំការប្រជុំរៀងរាល់ពេលមុនចប់ Term។- រាល់ពេលមុនចប់ Term សហការជាមួយផ្នែកគណនេយ្យរៀបចំលិខិតចែកសិស្សបញ្ជាក់ពីការបង់ប្រាក់- ផ្ញើទិន្នន័យសិស្សរាល់ផុតសុពលភាពបង់ប្រាក់ទៅផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ។- ចូលរួមផ្សព្វផ្សាយរាល់ពេលដើមនៃឆមាសនីមួយៗតាមថ្នាក់ស្តីពីសេវាកម្មវិធីចម្លងវេនសិក្សា និងទូដាក់សម្ភារសិស្ស (Locker)។- រៀបចំទុកដាក់ឯកសារទៅតាមកន្លែងដែលបានរៀបចំ។- សហការជាមួយគណៈកម្មការនូវការងារដែលបានដាក់ជូន។
Job Requirement: - បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ- បញ្ចប់វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល Computer (Word Excel Power Point and email…)- ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាដ៏ល្អជាមួយសិស្ស និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល- បានទទួលការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលចិត្តសាស្រ្តកុមារ និងវិធីសាស្រ្តក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ញាជាមួយសិស្ស។- មានបទពិសោធធ្វើការជាមួយកុមារ- អាចប្រើប្រាស់ Computer (Word Excel Power Point and email…)- ជាមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយក្រុមការងារ និងជាមួយផ្នែកផ្សេងៗបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។* ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត នឹងមិនត្រូវបានដាក់បញ្ចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

position: គ្រូភាសាខ្មែរ (មធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ)
Job Description: •	ការងារគរុកោសល្យ។•	ការអប់រំសីលធម៌។•	ការងាររដ្ឋបាល។•	ការចូលរួម។•	ទំនាក់ទំនង។
Job Requirement: ការសិក្សា :• មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេស ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។• មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។ • ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍ :• មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងយ៉ាងតិចពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំ។  • មានចំណេះដឹងលើមុខវិជ្ជាឯកទេសច្បាស់លាស់។• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ឬចំណេះដឹងបច្ចេកទេសដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា MS. OFFICE, INTERNET/ E-MAIL ។ល។• មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេសកាន់តែល្អ(សម្រាប់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូក្រៅពីភាសាអង់គ្លេស)។ • មានគុណវុឌ្ឍិ និងសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រាន់ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារដោយភាពម្ចាស់ការ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។ • មានសមត្ថភាពសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។• មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ។ • មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងមានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។*ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត និងមិនត្រូវបានជ្រើសរើសចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។

Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. Competitive salary

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Develop, update and initiate procurement policy, procedures, guidelines, rules and regulations in order to implementing the professional procurement efficiency and transparent practices.
• Develop and execute a long-term strategy to facilitate improvements for Procurement Services.
• Lead procurement members for price negotiation with the request of credit term to suppliers who used to deal more often and lead to yearly contract if necessary, for common use.
• Solve general related-issues, if any, and advise/coach not only to procurement members but also others for the good practice, correction, prevention in next future with cost saving purpose (art of sharing for development and improvement for team and company).
• Designing strategies to response to the company’s strategic plan and budgeting.
• Review, reject, approve of PR, PO, Invoice, Advance payment and Request for payment.
• Review supplier evaluation form and issue purchase order.
• Amend the existing vender list to detail and sort for good supplier selection.
• Plan the budget for the whole year, develop the demand and supply for all campuses of Aii and AIS usages and conduct yearly contract with vender for large amount orders to obtain the low price.
• Update and improve the existing form to make sure that all necessary information is inputted to P.O, Supplier Evaluation Form, PO and Invoice of vender as well as develop new forms related with current practice of procurement department for internal and external usage.
• Re-arrange the workflow of warehouse to prevent being out of stock.
• Seek new and good suppliers to continue the business with cost saving purpose.
• Closely work with Finance Department for new system to implement (Sun System) and requesters.
• Supervise, manage, and lead the operation of procurement as professional input method.
• Regularly check various vendors/suppliers to obtain quotations of goods for best values with good quality.
• Frequently deal with suppliers to do price negotiation and discount.
• Regularly seek for new appropriate suppliers and update to suppliers list.
• Networking with wholesales and reputed suppliers to company.
• Review all expense reports of subordinates.
• Other tasks assigned by line manager and top management.
Job Requirement: • Master/bachelor’s degrees in Business Administration or any other relevant fields.• At least 5+ or more years of work experiences in Procurement.• Strong leadership capabilities.• Computer literacy especially MS Office.• Familiarity with sourcing and vendor management.• Solid judgement along with decision making skills.• Good oral and written both English and Khmer.• Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure and workload.• Ability to persuade vendor for creditable and cheque payment.• Must be high responsible for deadline requisition bases.• Good at negotiation, communication, interpersonal skills and problem-solving skills• Experience working with construction companies is an advantage.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

job title: បង្រៀនពេញម៉ោង Musculoskeletal & Cardiopulmonary
company_name: សាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រសុខាភិបាល (University of Health Sciences)
position: បង្រៀនពេញម៉ោង Musculoskeletal & Cardiopulmonary
Job Description:
១- លើមុខវិជ្ជា Musculoskeletal 
២- មុខវិជ្ជា Cadiopulmonary
-	ចូលរួមរៀបចំ និងធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពគម្រោងមេរៀន ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងស្របតាមសម្ថភាពគោល
-	បង្រៀនទ្រឹស្តី និងអនុវត្តត្រាប់
-	រៀបចំការ តាក់តែងការបង្រៀន តាមការណែនាំរបស់ ស.វ.ស
-	ចូលរួមក្នុងការវាយតម្លៃចំណេះដឹងនិស្សិត លើមុខវិជ្ជាដែលបានបង្រៀន
-	ចូលរួមក្នុងការវាយតម្លៃចំណេះដឹងនិស្សិត នៅកន្លែងចុះកម្មសិក្សាគ្លីនិក
-	ដឹកនាំការពិភាក្សា និងការស្រាវជ្រាវឯកសារថ្មីៗទាក់ទង នឹងមេរៀនដល់និស្សិត
-	បង្រៀនមុខវិជ្ជាខាងលើ តាមបែបអន្តរកម្ម ប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាពទៀងទាត់តាមពេលវេលា និងតម្លាភាព
-	ចូលរួមធ្វើផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល អនុវត្តបង្ហាញត្រាប់ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងមានលក្ខណៈគរុកោសល្យ
-	ចូលរួមតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ ស.ប.ថ.វ និង ស.វ.ស
-	ភារៈកិច្ចត្រូវបង្រៀនយ៉ាងតិច ១៦ម៉ោងក្នុង១សប្ដាហ៍។
Job Requirement:
-	មានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រ ព្យាបាលដោយចលនា
ឬ ខ្ពស់ជាង ដែលមានបទពិសោធន៍លើជំនាញព្យាបាលដោយចលនា
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ជំនាញវិជ្ជាជីវៈ ផ្នែកព្យាបាលដោយចលនាយ៉ាងតិចចំនួន ៣ឆ្នាំ នៅមន្ទីរពេទ្យ វិទ្យាស្ថាន មជ្ឈមណ្ឌលស្ដារ លទ្ធភាពពលកម្ម គ្លីនិកឯកជន និងគ្រឹះស្ថានសុខាភិបាលដទៃទៀត ដែលទទួលស្គាល់ដោយក្រសួងសុខាភិបាល និងក្រសួងសង្គមកិច្ច អតីតយុទ្ធជន និងយុវនីតិសម្បទា
-	បានទទួលការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ស្តីពីវិធីសាស្ត្របង្រៀន ដែល ទទួលស្គាល់ដោយសាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រសុខាភិបាល និងមានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនចំនួនយ៉ាងតិច ១ឆ្នាំ
-	មានក្រមសីលធម៌រស់នៅល្អ ថ្លៃថ្នូរ ស្លូតបូត គោរពគ្នាទៅវិញ ទៅមក និងគោរពវិន័យ ស.វ.ស បានល្អ
-	មានស្មារតីធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងមានអំណត់អត់ធន់
-	មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាបរទេស
-	ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Word, Excel, PowerPoint, WatApp,
Email Internet, Zoom, Google meet1 ។

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Assist the manager in preparing all Disclosures to the public via CSX’s Website and other platforms.- Assist in preparing the Quarterly and Yearly Reports.- Assist in response to questions and queries from the company’s shareholders and Public Investors.- Take part in support of Investor Relations on the company’s websites and other platforms.- Assist in preparing and analyzing critical ratios of the company. - Assisting in preparing and joining the company’s events to promote the company’s image- Other tasks assigned by the Manager.
Job Requirement: - Fresh Graduate or 4th-year student, Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance and Banking.- Highly motivated, Organized, Honest, Trustworthy, Flexible and Trainable.- English communication skills both written and verbal.- MS OFFICES – MS Word, PowerPoint, Excel, and Outlook.- Willing to learn new things and reliable.- Fast learning and self-researching.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
1.	Control Stock Main Store Room (MSR), and Work with FnB Team to Support Stock Movement from MSR to FnB and take care delivery.
2.	Check Stock Balance with actual counting to make sure stock never run out and expired.
3.	Complete all Stock Transfer, Adjustment, and Verifying in Vista vs QuickBooks and send report to Supervisor daily to double check. 
4.	Make Purchase for some stock items assigned by stock supervisor, and purchase cleaning supply for Cinema.
5.	Make Stock Request from LMG Warehouse to refill Stock MSR, and handle delivery,
6.	Follow up and deal with supplier for stock purchased and received, maintain proper recording in Vista and QB, sending complete documents to payment team.
7.	Maintain proper stock arrangement in MSR and cleaning when needed 
8.	Handle Petty Cash for Cinema, send daily report to Account team, make petty cash request and make sure there are cash available to support all department in cinema.
9.	Monthly Counting and closing Stock Report, Petty Cash Report, and Cleaning Supply Report.
10.	Daily verify Cashier Report part time
11.	Replace each other when one staff is day off (between Stock and AR)
12.	Other tasked directed by Stock Supervisor or Cinema Manager.
Job Requirement:
•	Degree in Accounting, Finance or related fields
•	Experience in accounting field is an advantage
•	English proficiency, Computer literate (Ms. Office)
•	Be flexible, dynamic, team work and ability to work under pressure
•	Must be active and outgoing, 
•	Must be honest

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Requirement:
-3rd year/fresh graduated are welcome to apply
-Able to use English and Ms. Office for daily work
-Able to work full time
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

Job Description:
JOB PURPOSE: 
The IT system engineer is responsible for the design, implementation, and maintenance of the company's IT infrastructure. This includes servers, system software, virtualization, backups, monitoring, and ensuring uptime. The IT system engineer will work with a team of IT professionals to ensure that the company's IT infrastructure is reliable, secure, and cost-effective.

JOB SCOPE:
IT system engineer is managing and monitoring all installed systems and infrastructure. He installs, configure, test, and maintain operating systems, application software and system management tools. He is responsible for ensuring that the servers are running smoothly, and that the system software is up to date. System Engineer also manage virtualization, backups, monitoring and ensuring uptime.
Support and troubleshoot problems.
Ensure uninterrupted operation of servers and system software

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES 
•	Design, implement, and maintain the company's IT infrastructure.
•	Work with a team of IT professionals to ensure that the company's IT infrastructure is reliable, secure, and cost-effective.
•	Monitor the company's IT infrastructure for performance and security issues.
•	Troubleshoot and resolve IT issues.
•	Provide technical support to users.
•	Stay up to date on the latest IT technologies.
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENT 
•	Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field.
•	3+ years of experience in IT systems engineering.
•	Strong knowledge of servers, system software, virtualization (VM Ware or others), backups, and monitoring.
•	Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
•	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
•	A qualified systems engineer will have a background in IT, computer systems engineering, and analysis.

JOIN WITH US:
1- Public holiday follows to labor law.                         4- On job training will be provided 
2- Challenge salary and benefit                                     5- Difference work experience and equal applicant opportunity 
3- Cooperative teamwork                                              6- Motivative and professional challenge.

Job Description:
JOB PURPOSE: 
The IT network engineer is responsible for the design, implementation, and maintenance of the company's computer networks. This includes designing and implementing network topologies, configuring network devices, and troubleshooting network issues. The IT network engineer will work with a team of IT professionals to ensure that the company's computer networks are reliable, secure, and cost-effective.

JOB SCOPE:
The job scope of an IT network engineer is to create IT networks for businesses. He uses his IT knowledge to develop company networks, coordinate with IT management and company department to identify network needs. He is designing, building, maintaining a reliable and secure company network. He is also assisting employees and other individuals on how to use the network effectively. Network engineer is responsible for designing and implementing new network solutions and/or improving the efficiency of current networks.
Ensure uninterrupted operation of network and networking software.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: 
• Design, implement and maintain network topologies and network solutions that meet the company's needs.
• Configure network devices, such as routers, switches, and firewalls, etc.
• Troubleshoot network issues and resolve problems.
• Monitor network performance and security. Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks.
• Ensure network security by implementing security measures, such as firewalls and intrusion detection systems.
• Provide technical support to users.
• Stay up to date on the latest network technologies by reading industry publications, attending conferences, and taking training courses.
• Work with a team of IT professionals to ensure that the company's IT network infrastructure is reliable, secure, and cost-effective.
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENT:
• Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field.
• 3+ years of experience in IT network engineering.
• Strong knowledge of network protocols, such as TCP/IP, DNS and DHCP, VPN, SSL, etc.
• Strong knowledge of network devices, such as routers, switches, and firewalls
• Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• A qualified network engineer will have a background in IT, networking systems engineering, and analysis.

JOIN WITH US:
1- Public holiday follows to labor law                                 4- On job training will be provided. 
2- Challenge salary and benefit                                            5- Difference work experience and equal applicant opportunity.
3- Cooperative teamwork                                                      6- Motivative and professional challenge.

Job Description: ** SME-Loan Officer (២០ នាក់)​ សាខាក្រុងសៀមរាប សាខាស្រុកសូទ្រនិគម សាខាស្រុកពួក ​សាខាក្រុងកំពង់ធំ សាខាស្រុកសន្ទុក ​សាខាក្រុងកំពង់ចាម សាខាស្រុកព្រែឈរ សាខាតាខ្មៅ សាខាស្អាង សាខាកំពង់ឆ្នាំ សាខាពាមរក៍ សាខាបន្ទាយមានជ័យ សាខាព្រៃឈរ សាខាការិយាល័យកណ្តាល សាខាកំពត​ ​សាខាច្រាំចំរេះ សាខាជ្រោយចង្វា សាខាពោធិសាត់1.	New Client on-board/Sales Engagement•	To achieve SME sales growth and targets as per plan.•	To manage and maintain relationship with partners to gain more loyalty.•	To proactively and timely provide feedback towards the partner’s inquiry and interest.•	Act as the liaison officer between potential and current borrowers and Chamroeun internal resources and/or business partners, for purposes of lead generation, client onboarding, reporting, referrals, coordination of non-financial services, and others as dictated by the agreements between Chamroeun and those business partners.2. To process loan assessment •	To fully perform the Loan assessment activities defined in the governed policy and other regulations.•	To gather necessary information for loan application and verify loan eligibility according to loan policy, including individual SME and corporate SME loans.•	To conduct home and business visit, launch CBC check to analyze business and repayment capacity of loan applicant.3. To promote Chamroeun’s SME loan products•	To identify the potential areas to promote Chamroeun’s SME loan products under own responsibilities based on branches’ targeted areas.•	To provide clear product orientation to target partners during promotion stage. •	To build the list of partner prospects after launching product promotion campaign.•	To follow up the prospects for providing supports and develop loan portfolio with high professional customer service.4. To perform loan collection and delinquency •	To manage the Aquaculture loan portfolio as well as other products under Chamroeun’s SME definition. •	To perform loan checkup to partners after loan disbursement.•	To monitor the daily loan repayment per day to ensure on time loan repayment from partners.•	To take notes of early warning signs for potential loan deterioration and make a list of partners with suitable action plans to reduce potential loan problems.•	To identify and analyze the main roots causing loan accounts to fall overdue and set recovery target, priority, and strategies to effectively solve those overdue loan accounts•	To analyze the root cause of loan delinquency and recommend strategies to solve problems and changes of relevant policies to reduce the potential loan deterioration matter.5. Regular report to line manager •	To report reasons of individual late loan account and solving status.•	To report all significant cases incurred at field.•	To examine and report about competitors.•	To summary the reasons of the partner drop-out** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍:- ចម្រើន ផ្តល់ជូននូវប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍សមរម្យ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ ប្រាក់ខែទី១៣ ឱកាសដំឡើងតួនាទី ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភជួលម៉ូតូ ថ្លៃសាំង កាតទូរស័ព្ទ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ចំពោះសុខភាព ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់​២៤ម៉ោង និងប្រាក់រង្វាន់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ​ - ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលអំពីជំនាញ ការរៀនសូត្រអំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារជាក់ស្តែង និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់អំពីបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
Job Requirement: -	Education – Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Banking and Finance, Marketing, Management, Economics, or related field.-	Experience – at least 2 years in credit operations-	Language – Can use the English language: listening, speaking, reading, and writing;-	Computer literacy/ tablet – MS office and MS Outlook-	Have a good interpersonal and communication skill, team work, independent, and result-oriented; -	Ability to work without supervision;-	Ability to solve the problem.-	Good collaboration in work.-	To complete all requirements per governed policy and guidelines.-	Be a Cambodia citizen and have a good background. -	Be high integrity, accountability, and commitment, and strongly passion towards with the poor and social mission.-	Be respectful.-	Demonstrate sound professional ethic.-	Full driving license.
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR HR Manager 010714813 kholel@chamroeun.com No.425, St. 271, Sangkat Tour Tom Pong II, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010714813

company_name: Zion International School of Phnom Penh
Company Profile:
ZISPP uses a UK-standards based curriculum with a values-based approach to academic, physical, emotional, and social development for its students. Our teachers are all highly qualified professional native speakers of English with a heart for children, a strong understanding of their needs, and a desire to be a guiding light to the future for each student. They understand well and are deeply committed to their roles as facilitators in bringing the International Primary Curriculum (IPC) to life in the classroom. 

Zion International School of Phnom Penh is an agency of the not-for-profit, NGO Cambodia Jobs Foundation located in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 

We believe that children learn by doing. They should be actively engaged in discovering, exploring, and doing in order to maximize opportunities for learning and growth

Job Description:
Role Introduction: 
To support the Regional Head of Finance South East Asia and local Business Units to ensure robust control and compliance of financial operations in Cambodia, in addition to conducting accounting and finance activities in line with established company policy. To provide analysis and recommendations to local port and department managers where required.

Key Responsibilities: 
Compliance – Legal, Taxation, Regulatory Reporting
- Ensure accurate and timely filing of tax returns, audits, declarations, applications / renewals of all required licenses and other financial-related matters to local authorities.
- Fully comply with all applicable laws and regulations, including maintenance of necessary accounting records as per local requirements including oversight of company / branch office registration.

Finance Business Partnering: 
- Provide Finance-related support to all country local departments.

Controls and Risk Assessment: 
- Ensure the company’s principle accounting policies are followed.
- Ensure proper authorisation of contracts and expenditures.
Partner with the Country, Port, and Department Managers to ensure completion of the Control Self-
- Assessment for risk management.
- Perform regular audits on finance processes.

Management and Financial Reporting: 
- Ensure timely and accurate recordings of revenue, expenses and balance sheet items in the general ledger.
- Ensure compilation of monthly and annual accounting schedules, bank reconciliations, and other general ledger reconciliations.

Cost Control: 
- Partner with country management and the Regional Finance Office to prepare budgets, forecasts, financial analysis, cost saving initiatives.

Credit Control: 
- Establish, maintain and comply with the company credit policy.
- Ensure that necessary security from Passenger & Cargo Agents is obtained and maintained.
- Perform annual credit reviews.
- Lead monthly debtors meetings with Cargo and Commercial Sales Teams.
- Review any default payments and ensure collection is pursued through IATA, bank guarantees, collection agencies, legal avenues.

Banking and Treasury: 
- Oversee the cash management process.
- Ensure the authorised signatory lists for local bank accounts are up-to-date.
- Develop and maintain external banking relationships.

Administration and Supplier Management: 
- Manage and maintain accurate local inventory and asset registers.
- Manage local supplier contracts.
- Participate in, or lead, local contract negotiations to help secure favourable finance terms, and to
manage third party contracts as required.
- Ensure vendor details and delegation of authority list is up-to-date in SAP at all times.

Business Support and Process Improvement: 
- Prepare business cases to be submitted to Regional or Head Office when required, and ensure proper corporate governance and monitoring of costs for major business projects.
- Review opportunities for process improvement and working efficiency.

People Development and Performance Management: 
- Lead, support and encourage own team to achieve success.
- Build a strong and motivated team.
- Supervise and mentor direct reports, encouraging effective collaboration.
- Demonstrate leadership and lead by example in accordance with Cathay’s core values.
- Maintain active and ongoing dialogue in relation to employee goals and individual performance.
Job Requirement:
Academic Qualifications: 
- Degree in Accounting or related discipline with sound accounting knowledge
- Post-graduate accounting qualification in Accounting (e.g. Chartered Accountant, Certified Practicing Accountant, Chartered Management Accountant, etc.) or related discipline

Knowledge, Skills, Training and Experience: 
- A minimum of four years’ experience in Finance / Accounting is essential
- Experience in the airline industry is an advantage
- Experience in SAP is an advantage
- Minimum of two years’ experience in leading a high performing team
- Sound understanding of Cambodia business practices
- A good team player with strong interpersonal skills and can interact with all levels within the organisation and region
- Demonstrable experience in improving current work practices and implementing new ideas
- Strong planning, problem-solving and organisational skills, and is able to prioritise and manage multiple tasks and deadlines
- Strong understanding of Cathay Pacific policies and procedures
- Superior written, oral communication, negotiation and presentation skills
- Demonstrates cultural sensitivity and diplomacy
- Leads, adapts and embraces constant change
