job title: Assistant to the Founder, Chairman and CEO
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Assistant to the Founder, Chairman and CEO
Job Description: - Work with Presidents and executive teams to ensure the visions and missions of Aii Language Center and American Intercon School are met. - Work closely with Presidents and executive team to coordinate and execute marketing, sales, and operational strategies and activities to meet the company’s business plan and objectives.-  Initiate in solving issues of Aii Language Center and American Intercon School by working with Presidents and executive team by providing fully support as needed.  - Work closely with Presidents and executive team to evaluate the efficiency of applied policies and procedures according to Company’s objectives and business plan. - Work closely with Presidents, operations management team, and other cross-departments to ensure goal alignment and execution on all initiatives to achieve Company’s goals.- Analyze the key issues and risk assessment of Aii Language Center and American Intercon School  and come up with recommendation on the area to improve to propose to Presidents and Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Assist Founder, Chairman, and CEO in setting and reviewing KPIs of Aii and AIS and assess the effectiveness of performance based on the KPIs set.- Review policies and procedures as well as all proposals of Presidents of the assigned department before submitting to Founder, Chairman, and CEO.- Make sure that to-do list assigned by the Founder, Chairman and CEO is up to date and follow up with the tasks from HoDs as needed.- Provide advisory to all stakeholders in the to do list to ensure all tasks assigned to Senior Management and relevant departments and report the results to The Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Coordinate with relevant departments to make sure that decisions of the Founder, Chairman and CEO and Senior Management are well-implemented/achieved.- Keep the confidentiality of all information relevant to the Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Assist the Founder, Chairman and CEO in all meetings.- Write and review minutes and contents for meetings, speeches or others required assigned by the Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Assist the two schools Aii Language Center and American Intercon school by working closely and cooperatively with the Presidents of the two schools to ensure smooth operations. - Coordinate with relevant departments to make sure that decisions of the Founder, Chairman and CEO and Senior Management are well-implemented/achieved.- Oversee Mengly J. Quach Foundation and provide advisory as well as support to Head of Department ensure the efficiency and effectiveness are delivered. - Manage TT Japanese Chestnut to ensure business plan and objectives are met. - Act as a first point of contact: dealing with correspondence/suggestions/emails. - Respond to public inquiries to meet the Founder, Chairman and CEO. - Organize and maintain the Founder, Chairman and CEO’s diary and making appointments on a daily/weekly basis to discuss issues, problems, business operations and other matters. - Be part of the meeting with the business unit and/or department/office under your supervision/coordination.- Be part of the interview of Management level with the Founder, Chairman and CEO. - Be part of the interview of management level with Academic teams. - Read the meeting minutes and report/update to the Founder, Chairman and CEO. - Make preparation for committee meetings. - Read and listen to Telegram Groups under your supervision/coordination. - Read the meeting minutes and report/update to the Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Read monthly/annual report and report/update to the Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Do round at each campus.- Relay the message from the Founder, Chairman and CEO to the business unit and/or department/office under your supervision.- Follow up with each business unit and/or department/office under your supervision/coordination about the assigned tasks.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor of education, management and related disciplines. - At least 5 years of working experience in education, management or related experience. - Educational management and planning - Good at problem solving skills.- Very good communication skills in English and Khmer- Multi-Tasking ability.- Time Management and organizational skills.- Computer literacy.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: Facilities Supervisor oversees the operations of 5 sections as follows:1. Safety services- Oversee school and public safety:- Thieves and robbery.- Drug abuse and trafficking.- All weapons ban.- Suspects.- Sexual harassment.- Falling objects.- Unsafe places such wet place, electric shocks, flammable liquid and objects …- First aids. - Fire safety preventions.- Elevator safety.- Broken electric switch and sockets. - Emergency exits.- Expired products.- Unsafe food and drinks brought in.- Student safety indoor and outdoor events.2. Cleaning services- Manage sanitation and hygiene within the school premises:- Manage and allocate janitors to clean required places.- Plan tasks for janitors daily, weekly, monthly, and termly.- Evaluate janitors’ task quality.- Receive and give feedback from/ to all stakeholders.- Make sure all required places are properly cleaned.- Manage and update cleaning equipment and liquid.- Clearly train staff about how to use cleaning equipment and liquid.- Clearly inform staff about all side effects from cleaning liquid.- Request trainings for staff if needed.3.	Office of in-house staff- Manage in-house staff nighttime, Sundays, and holidays.- Ensure safety and sanitation on Sundays and holiday.- Prepare standby list for Sundays and holiday.- Do the spot-check on Sundays and holiday.- Orientate new comers.- Ensure all staff have enough materials for their daily uses.- Arrange at least two staff standing by at one place.- Arrange staff to stand by at any unsafe places and new places.- Regularly have meetings with staff to remind existing policy and inform new ones.- Received requests, issues, and challenges and solves and reply them timely.- Listen to their reports in group telegram and check if their reports are true.- Make sure staff really do round the ending operation time and make a report.- Make sure all electric equipment and water supply are off.- Do regular communication with staff to make them feel warm.4. Maintenance services- Manage maintenance staff to make sure they really do their jobs:- Make sure all light damages are properly and timely repaired.- Make sure maintenance staff do round up and down to see if there are damages in the building.- Make sure maintenance staff regularly check and maintain electric equipment such as ACs, generators, electric boxes, water supply system, water tanks, drainage system, …- Make sure maintenance staff regularly check and maintain doors, windows, white boards, picture frames, roofs, ceilings, walls, …- Receive request forms from the requesters and arrange tasks for maintenance staff accordingly.- Request technical staff to help if the damages beyond maintenance staff ability.- Follow all assigned tasks till it is completed.- Update request list and do the monthly report.- Update all issues occurred to Campus Director and Head Principal.- Involve in studying projects when outside technicians needed.- Receive daily report from maintenance staff.- Prepare monthly report to Head of department, Director and Head Principal.- Control stock with proper stock in-out report.- Checks completed work by vendors and contractors.- Recommends maintenance, mechanical, electrical, and facility design modifications.- Manages and reviews service contracts.5. Housekeeping services- Manage Housekeeper to do his/ her job effectively:- Make the school premises green and fragrant.- Decorate plants and flowers attractively.- Make a planting garden where necessary.- Work with security and janitors to maintain and water the plants properly.- Plant flower in accordance with different seasons.- Make a proper deep cleaning schedule.- Make a proper pest control and disinfection schedule.- Prepare monthly report to Head of department, Director and Head Principal.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor/Master's Degree in Management or closely related fields.- Knowledge of School Safety.- Knowledge of Occupational Health and Safety (OHS).- Knowledge and experience in organizational effectiveness and operations management.- Knowledge of human resource principles and practices.- Knowledge of foreign languages – English is preferable. - The ability to work with people from all backgrounds.- Time management skills including being able to handle a complex, varied workload.- Information technology skills.- Good presentation skills.- Stress management skills.- Communication skills.- Decision making.- Problem-solving.- Leadership.- Teamworking.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Job Requirement: •	Good attitude and energy level•	Good communication•	Good in analyze •	Good in management skill•	Fluency English •	Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build relationships with stakeholders, including staff, board members, external partners and donors.•	Previous experience working with development and fundraising programs to increase donor contributions and funding sources.•	Proficiency in Windows, including MS Word, EXCEL and PowerPoint; fund-raising data management systems knowledge helpful.•	Ability to learn new software (Doodle polls and Director’s Desk board portal)•	Ability to work independently and with professional discretion.•	Excellent writing, editing, grammatical, organizational, and research skills.•	Ability to work with a broad range of people including major donors, Board members, foundation staff, colleagues of the president/CEO and staff, others•	Knowledge of other languages and international customs is an asset; knowledge of French or Spanish is helpful.•	Excellent management, time-management, and problem-solving skills.
Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

job title: Car Driver/អ្នកបើកបរឡាន (HQ)
position: Car Driver/អ្នកបើកបរឡាន (HQ)
Job Description: តួនាទី និងភារកិច្ចរបស់អ្នកបើកបរឡាន ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការដឹកជញ្ជួន រួមទាំងទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ដោយធានាថារាល់ការធ្វើដំណើរទាំងអស់ត្រូវតែមានសុវត្ថិភាព ទាន់ពេលវេលា រីករាយ និងដល់ទីតាំងតាមកាលវេលា ។I. ការពិពណ៌នាការងារ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ- គោរពពេលវេលា ម៉ោងបម្រើការងារ- ធ្វើការងារដោយមានការទទួលខុសត្រូវ និងភាពប្រុងប្រយ័ត្នបំផុត- ត្រូវចេះគោរព និយាយស្តីល្អជាមួយថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ បុគ្គលិកនិយោជិត និងភ្ញៀវ- ជួសជួសឡានពេលខូចតាមផ្លូវ- ធ្វើកំណត់ត្រាធ្វើដំណើរជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ- ថែរក្សាទាំងក្នុង និងក្រៅយានយន្តរបស់ខ្លួន និងមានអនាម័យជានិច្ច- ការងារអាចបត់បែនតាមនកាលទេសៈ- មានការងារផ្សេងៗទៀត រៀបចំដោយប្រធានផ្នែក ។II. លក្ខណៈ​ពិសេស​ផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន- ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស (អាចនិយាយ និងស្ដាប់បានគួរសម)- ប័ណ្ណបើកបរប្រភេទ(ខ២) ឡើង
Job Requirement: III. តម្រូវការការងារ- អាកប្បកិរិយាឆ្លាតវៃ និងរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់- កាយសម្បទាមាំមួន សុខភាពល្អ ស្មារតីល្អ- ស្គាល់ផ្លូវទាំងក្នុងក្រុង និងខេត្ត- ត្រូវស្គាល់ភូមិសាស្រ្តរាជធានីភ្នំពេញ និងបណ្តាខេត្តនានា ហើយអាចបើកបរដល់ពាក់កណ្តាលយប់(ម្តងម្កាល)- មានប័ណ្ណបើកបរស្របច្បាប់ ដែលចេញពីក្រសួងសាធារណៈការ និងដឹកជញ្ជូន- មានចំណេះដឹងចំពោះច្បាប់ចរាចរ និងស្លាកសញ្ញាចរាចរណ៍IV. ពត៌មាន​បន្ថែម- លេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬលេខTelegram : 061 555 933 / 085 555 194 - អ៉ីម៉ែល : hr@circlekcambodia.com or Cc to​​ : csinath@circlekcambodia.com

job title: Tourism Intellectual Property Event Assistant Manager
company_name: Belt Road Capital Management (Cambodia) Co., Ltd
position: Tourism Intellectual Property Event Assistant Manager
Job Description: - Coordinating and overseeing all event functions according to outlined instructions					- Works with Event Manager, Suppliers, Agencies, and departments to continuously develop the implementation of standards of event presentations and services					- Ensures proper inventory management by reviewing stock, timely ordering of items, proper receival & storage, maintenance and handling of all inventories					- Ability to think clearly, multitask, analyse and resolve problems, while exercising good judgment					- Establishing and review budget to minimise costs					- Participating in regular meetings, trainings					- Assist with the preparation of proposal, weekly, month-end reports					- Assists in coordinating and directing the activities of personnel assigned to the H&T Department; reviews and evaluates employees’ performance; assists in selection of new employees. 					- Assists in the generation and distribution of promotional marketing material using various advertising media and makes cost effective media buys to promote Bay Of Lights					- Assists in the preparation and monitoring of events budgets; helps secure funds and other resources and assists in controlling expenditures					- Attends conferences, seminars, workshops, etc., as appropriate, to enhance and maintain knowledge of trends and developments in the field of hospitality & tourism development; attends professional, civic, and social gatherings, as appropriate, to represent and promote interests of Canaopy Sands and to collect information pertinent to advancement of interests of the company					- Assists with internal and external communications for the event department
Job Requirement: - Presentation Skill	- Able to work long and irregular hours	- Demonstrate ability to work independently, trustworthy, and collaboratively	- Ability to manage multiple priorities	- Strong organization, communication, report writing	- Knowledge of the principles, practices and procedures of event planning and assisting with public events that will generate interest and revenue for the company	Solid computer skills, including MS Office	- Ability to supervise subordinate personnel	- Ability to deal with people beyond giving and receiving instructions	- Must be adaptable to performing under varying levels of stress
Company Profile: Belt Road Capital Management (BRCM) is a private equity investment manager focused on the Greater Mekong Sub-Region. Working closely with IT department to manage all the technical issues and with related departments to ensure all tasks completed within project timeline and provide effective and efficient results.

Company Profile: AEON Specialized Bank (Cambodia) Plc established in Cambodia since October 2011 by Japanese leading retail finance company name AEON Financial Service. Job Description:
•Achieve growth and hit sales targets by successfully managing the sales team.
•Design and implement a strategic business plan that expands the company’s customer base and ensures its strong presence.
•Own recruiting, objectives setting, coaching and performance monitoring of sales representatives.
•Build and promote strong, long-lasting customer relationships by partnering with them and understanding their needs.
•Develop a sales strategy to achieve organizational sales goals and revenues.
•Set individual sales targets with sales team.
•Ensure the sales team have the necessary resources to perform properly.
•Monitor the achievement of sales objectives by the sales team.
•Provide feedback, support and coaching to the sales team.
•Plan and direct sales team training
•Assist with the development of sales presentations and proposals.
•Develop promotional ideas and material for management take consider and approve for sale volume hit company target.
•Take initiative for hit sales volume close deal
•Organization and planning
•any task as assigned by line manager/CEO.
Job Requirement:
•At least 2 years of experience as a Sale supervision. 
•Degree of Marketing or any related field.
•Strong communication skills.
•Good in innovative creative.
•Understanding customer needs.
•Strong result orientation and problem-solving skills.

Company Profile: AEON Specialized Bank (Cambodia) Plc established in Cambodia since October 2011 by Japanese leading retail finance company name AEON Financial Service. Nature of our business is to provide the retail finance for wide range of individual customer. Especially, we are well known as pioneer of providing the installment service for people purchasing the consumer products without any collateral, which is very new service in Cambodia but popular in other countries. Our Vision is: In Japan and the rest of Asia, our management philosophy is to “Support customer’s life styles and enable each individual to maximize future opportunities through effective use of credit”.

Job Description:
• Ensure the IT service delivery team can handle Desktops, Laptops, Notebook and printers are working at all-time not
to interrupt business operations. Provide IT support within and other departments.
• Maintain IT equipment and software inventory.
• Ensure all IT assets have an accurate record in the system and physical count.
• Ensure that all software provided to the end-user runs as standard software.
• Report to the IT manager for any problems with process workflow.
• Cover some IT manager’s duties and responsibilities when he/she is not in the office.
• Able to manage or arrange teammates to be on-site support 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
• Ensure that the IT knowledge is enhanced for better ideas in order to improve services to users.
• To carry out any other duties and responsibilities as assigned by the IT Manager
Job Requirement:
• Minimum 03-05 years relevant experience in computer helpdesk and at least 1 year as supervisor
• Bachelor’s degree in IT or computer science.
• Experience in IT Helpdesk or IT Support as a role core supervisor
• Advanced skills on PC / Laptop, Windows, MS Office, and Anti-Virus are necessary. AD, File Server management, and IT Support system as required.
• Good Microsoft Office (Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
• Good English communication skill.
• Excellent Khmer communication skill.

Job Description:
• Assisting Marketing Manager in the formulation of strategies to build a lasting digital connection with consumers.
• Planning and monitoring the ongoing company presence on social media ((Tiktok, Facebook etc.).
• Launching optimized online advertisements to increase company and brand awareness.
• Planning and monitoring the ongoing company presence on social media Launch optimized online adverts through
Google Adwords, Facebook etc. to increase company and brand awareness.
• Be actively involved in SEO efforts (keyword, image optimization etc.).
• Preparing online newsletters and promotional emails and organize their distribution through various channels.
• Providing creative ideas for content marketing.
• Working with Digital Development & IT to update website.
• Collaborating with designers to improve user experience.
• Measuring performance of digital marketing efforts using a variety of Web analytics tools (Google Analytics,
WebTrends etc.).
• Acquiring insight in online marketing trends and keeping strategies up-to-date.
• Maintaining partnerships with media agencies and vendors.
• Supporting HR department on social media posting and press release on CSR activities.
• Perform any other tasks as assigned by line manager.

* Meetings & Others
• Attend meetings as required.
• Participate in learning & development activities.
• Participate in company events when and where required.
• Set yearly goals & KPIs and participate yearly performance review.
• Obtain regular coaching & mentoring from direct supervisor and HoD.

• A minimum of 3 years’ experience in similar role in large scale and premium properties service or hospitality.
• Experience with B2C social media, Google Adwords and email campaigns and SEO/SEM
• Bachelor or associate degree in business management, economics or marketing.
• Desire to work with people of diverse backgrounds, cultures, and perspective.
• Entrepreneurial mindset and the ability to be flexible and responsive to changing priorities.
• Skills and experience in creative content writing.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Good Microsoft Office (Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint). 
• Good English communication skill.
• Excellent Khmer communication skill.
• Diplomacy and client interaction skills.
• Understanding of building operations, defect spotting.
• Ability to multi-task.
• Pro-active management style.
• Ability to achieve a win/win outcome for all parties.

Job Description:
We are looking for a marketing supervisor who will work closely with all of our academic and non-academic teams to support our admissions and brand awareness objectives. Within the school an individual who works within the wider Vattanac Group framework to ensure excellence in marketing and communications. We are looking for an individual who has an interest in developing knowledge and supporting our academic teams in the field of marketing and to understand the nature of marketing The King School as a Premium Plus heritage brand.

* Responsibilities:
• Responsible for designing and implementing a marketing plan that aligns with the school mission to achieve the school enrolment goal.
• Working closely with the admissions team, as well as all school leadership, to monitor and shape the school brand in the Phnom Penh community.
• Work closely with colleagues, to ensure the marketing content creation, distribution and follow up.
• Undertake training and staff development as appropriate to the nature of the post.
• Ensure the use and security of data, including images, is compliant with the school operations.
• Comply with the School Safeguarding Policy.
• Serve as the custodian of The King brand by guiding communications to assist departments and divisions in setting up templates and formats for new initiatives, and programs so that the look and feel represents King.
•  Develop and execute short- and long-term marketing plans, including, but not limited to, digital marketing, public relations, special events, advertising, and other promotional strategies that support The King chool.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree in marketing and/or communications or equivalent/relevant degree
• Excellent knowledge of all marketing content creation tools and the ability to match content creation to the brand
• Ability to intelligently strategize both marketing (for admissions) and broader strategies around brand awareness, with the focus on the former.
• Excellent skills in managing digital and online platforms together with social media campaigns that fit the profile of the school.
• Excellent English, particularly in verbal communication skills
• Be honest, trustworthy, respectful, and helpful;
• Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to work effectively with a wide range of constituencies in a diverse community.
• Strong analytical, problem solving, time management and organizational skills.
• Willingness to work irregular hours and on weekends, as reasonably required
• Establish and foster relationships with Phnom Penh businesses and corporations.
• Recognize that should not be limited to the assigned responsibilities. Therefore, this position description is designed to outline primary duties, qualifications and job scope. It is the expectation of the School, that each employee will offer his/her services wherever and whenever necessary to ensure the success of our organization.

Job Description:
* Summary of Job Scope
Marketing Manager oversees the full functioning of the department. Major responsibilities include planning, supervision and implementation of all marketing, communication and branding strategy. The portfolio covers real estate, F&B and other business units.

* Key Responsibilities
* Overall
• Proposed and execute all marketing, communication and branding strategy for all real estate portfolio, F&B and
relevant business units.
• Proposed and manage marketing, communication and branding budget.
• Lead, guide and monitor staff performance and ensure the staff perform and complete their task.
* Marketing
• Plan and organize events to promote our projects especially Vattanac Capital, F&B and related business.
• Plan and execute campaign to drive traffic to our mall and Vattanac Capital Lifestyle Park.
• Plan and implement advertising campaigns to promote our projects especially Vattanac Capital, F&B and related
business. Including both above the line and below the line.
• Manage and update all our project media platforms including app, website and social media.
• Prepare and get approval for marketing budget.
• Monthly report of marketing activities and annual review presentation.
• Seek third party Partnership for our marketing activities.
• Concept, Design, production and monitoring of marketing collaterals (both online and offline).
• Support leasing in reaching out to sales channels.
• Manage all visual advertising platform within all projects including LED screens, Digital Screens, Signages, E-standing and so on.
• Collaborate and work with Vattanac Golf, Vattanac Investment Lifestyle, KVL and other related company on joint
marketing effort.
* Communication & Branding
• Propose and execute communication and branding strategy for company.
• Support HR for internal communication strategy with staff.
• Support relevant departments on their visual and communication tools.
• Propose and support F&B and other business units in their branding and communication strategy.
• Support HR and admin in all CSR, company events and staff activities in terms of design and artwork production.
• Responsible for the decoration of all our projects and including F&B outlets.
• Propose communication and branding budget.
• Propose and execute corporate branding strategy to promote Vattanac Properties as a choice of partners and employer.
* Others
• Provide leadership to marketing team members.
• Set up weekly meetings for discussion.
• Work with operation and engineer team on the look and feel of the buildings.
Job Requirement:
• A minimum of 8 years’ experience in Marketing within property service, F&B and related industries.
• Minimum 5 years as Head of Department.
• A Master’s or bachelor’s degree in communication, business administration or related fields.
• Good communication skill in English.
• Excellent Khmer writing.
• Strategic skills.
• Organization skills.
• Creative skills.
• Facilitation and presentation skills.
• Advanced IT skill in using Internet, Email, Ms. World, Excel, Power Point and Power Point Presentation.
• Advanced level of English communication skills.
• Chinese is a bonus.
• Good interpersonal skill.
• Good understanding about and adaptability to workplace culture and expectations.
• Pro-activeness in thinking and taking actions.
• Understanding of current employment law and the ability to learn and follow new amendments.
• Attention to details.

job title: មន្ត្រីគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ (Junior Application System Administrator)
position: មន្ត្រីគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ (Junior Application System Administrator)
Job Description:
ធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែង ដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដាអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្ត ជំហានបន្ទាប់ទៀត។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ (អ.គ.ហ.) ជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមាន មុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារគោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួល ការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។ 
ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព សក្ដិសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ. មានត្រូវការជ្រើសរើស មន្ត្រីគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ ចំនួន០២រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖

	គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច៣ឆ្នាំ នៅលើផ្នែកអភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធ និង សរសេរកម្មវិធី 
•	មានចំណេះដឹងទូលំទូលាយលើផ្នែកភាសា PHP, .Net (C#, Visual Basic), Java, SQL, Python
•	មានចំណេះដឹង និង អាចអភិវឌ្ឍដោយប្រើប្រាស់  SQL Server, MySQL និង Oracle 
•	មានចំណេះដឹង និង បទពិសោធន៍ទៅលើការអភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធនៃប្រព័ន្ធ ERP មានអាទិភាពខ្ពស់
•	មានការច្នៃប្រឌិត និង ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបានរហ័ស
•	ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេសសមរម្យ
•	មានបទពិសោធន៏ចាប់ពី៣ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
•	ត្រូវមានឆន្ទៈ និង មនសិការក្នុងការបំពេញការងារជូនស្ថាប័នរដ្ឋ និង បម្រើការបានយូរអង្វែង
•	ត្រូវមានការព្យាយាម និង តស៊ូបំពេញការងារក្រោមលក្ខខណ្ឌពិបាក និង មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និង ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់
•	បេក្ខជន ត្រូវមានអាយុមិនលើសពី ៣០ ឆ្នាំ ។
Job Requirement:
 ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការធ្វើតេស្តសមត្ថភាពលើការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណកម្មាធិការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ 

	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹម ថ្ងៃពុធ ១៣កើត ខែភទ្របទ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី២៧ខែកញ្ញា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ (Online) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។

ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។
 ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម
សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE ។

ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ

Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Office  077 359 949 hr@pfm.gov.kh Street 92, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 077 359 949

job title: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងមូលដ្ឋានទិន្នន័យ
position: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងមូលដ្ឋានទិន្នន័យ
Job Description:
ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែង ដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដាអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្ត ជំហានបន្ទាប់ទៀត។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ (អ.គ.ហ.) ជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារគោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួល ការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។ 

ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព សក្ដិសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ. មានត្រូវការជ្រើសរើស មន្ត្រីផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងមូលដ្ឋានទិន្នន័យ ចំនួន០១រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖
	គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
•	មានចំណេះដឹងខាងវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រកុំព្យូទ័រ ឬជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច១ឆ្នាំ ទាក់ទងទៅនឹងការគ្រប់គ្រងកម្មវិធីមូលដ្ឋានទិន្នន័យ
•	មានចំណេះដឹងល្អខាងផ្នែកប្រព័ន្ធមូលដ្ឋានទិន្នន័យ ដូចជា Oracle Database, SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, ...   
•	មានចំណេះដឹងល្អទាក់ទងនឹងការងាររបស់ក្រុមការងារ DBA ដូចជា Backup & Recovery, Cluster Architecture, Data Mirror or Replicate, Tuning, Patching, Security, Migration, Upgrading...
•	មានចំណេះដឹងអាចប្រើប្រាស់ប្រព័ន្ធប្រតិបត្តិការ Linux, Linux Distribution, Unix, Unix Distribution
•	មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ មានការច្នៃប្រឌិត និង ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបានរហ័ស អាចទទួលរាល់សម្ពាធក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ
•	ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេសសមរម្យ
•	ត្រូវមានឆន្ទៈ និង មនសិការក្នុងការបំពេញការងារជូនស្ថាប័នរដ្ឋ និង មានសីលធម៌ក្នុងការរស់នៅល្អ
•	ត្រូវមានការព្យាយាម និងតស៊ូបំពេញការងារក្រោមលក្ខខណ្ឌពិបាក និង មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និងម៉ឺងម៉ាត់
•	បេក្ខជន មានអាយុមិនលើសពី ៣០ ឆ្នាំ។

	ឯកសាភ្ជាប់
បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ៖
•	ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter (ជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស) 
•	សញ្ញាបត្របញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សាថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា 
•	ភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប 

	ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការធ្វើតេស្តសមត្ថភាពលើការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណកម្មាធិការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។
Job Requirement:
	ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការធ្វើតេស្តសមត្ថភាពលើការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណកម្មាធិការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ 
	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមពុធ ១៣កើត ខែភទ្របទ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី២៧ ខែកញ្ញា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ (Online) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។

	ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម
សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE

ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ	
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “ក” ជាន់ទី៣
ទូរស័ព្ទទាក់ទង : 077 359 949 /អ៊ីមែល: hr@pfm.gov.kh
Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Office  077 359 949 hr@pfm.gov.kh Street 92, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 077 359 949

job title: មន្ត្រីជាន់ខ្ពស់គ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ (Senior Application System Administrator)
position: មន្ត្រីជាន់ខ្ពស់គ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ (Senior Application System Administrator)
Job Description:
ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែង ដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដាអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្ត ជំហានបន្ទាប់ទៀត។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ     (អ.គ.ហ.) ជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមាន មុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារគោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួល ការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។ 
ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព សក្ដិសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ. មានត្រូវការជ្រើសរើស មន្ត្រីជាន់ខ្ពស់គ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ ចំនួន០១រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖

	គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
•	មានចំណេះដឹងខាងវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រកុំព្យូទ័រ ឬ ជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច៣ឆ្នាំ នៅក្នុងផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ 
•	មានចំណេះដឹងប្រើប្រាស់បានទាក់ទងនឹងប្រព័ន្ធប្រតិបត្តិការ Linux និង Unix
•	មានចំណេះដឹងមូលដ្ឋានផ្នែកប្រព័ន្ធមូលដ្ឋានទិន្នន័យ ដូចជា Oracle Database, SQL Server, MySQL
•	មានចំណេះដឹង និង បទពិសោធន៍ទៅលើការគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេនៃប្រព័ន្ធ ERP មានអាទិភាពខ្ពស់
•	មានការច្នៃប្រឌិត និង ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបានរហ័ស
•	ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេសសមរម្យ
•	ត្រូវមានឆន្ទៈ និង មនសិការក្នុងការបំពេញការងារជូនស្ថាប័នរដ្ឋ និង មានសីលធម៌ក្នុងការរស់នៅល្អ
•	ត្រូវមានការព្យាយាម និង តស៊ូបំពេញការងារក្រោមលក្ខខណ្ឌពិបាក និង មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និង ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់
•	បេក្ខជន ត្រូវមានអាយុមិនលើសពី ៣០ ឆ្នាំ ។

	ឯកសាភ្ជាប់
បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ៖
•	ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter (ជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស) 
•	សញ្ញាបត្របញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សាថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា 
•	ភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប
Job Requirement:
	ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការធ្វើតេស្តសមត្ថភាពលើការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណកម្មាធិការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ 
	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃពុធ ១៣កើត ខែភទ្របទ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី២៧ខែកញ្ញា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ (Online) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។

 ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម
សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE ។
ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកលេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬតាមអស័យដ្ឋានដូចខាងក្រោម៖
ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “គ” ជាន់ទី៧
ទូរស័ព្ទទាក់ទង : 077 359 949/ អ៊ីមែល: hr@pfm.gov.kh
Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។

Job Requirement: ល័ក្ខខ័ណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស 				• បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រគណនេយ្យ។• បទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ10ឆ្នាំ ។• អង់គ្លេស & កុំព្យូទ័រ។ (Excel)• អាទិភាពសំរាប់អ្នកអាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាកូរ៉េ។Job requirements: • Get bachelor degree in accounting. • Experience 5 years in accounting Managerial role.• English & Computer skill (Excel).• Able to use Korean is more prefer.***អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ដែលទទួលបាន• ប្រាក់រង្វាន់សំរាប់ពិធីបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ។• ប្រាក់រង្វាន់សំរាប់ពិធីបុណ្យភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ។• ប្រាក់បំណាច់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។• ប្រាក់ចូលនិវត្តន៍។• ការឈប់សំរាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ការឈប់សំរាកពេលមានជំងឺ ការឈប់សំរាកលំហែមាតុភាព ការឈប់សំរាកព្រឹត្តិការណ៍គ្រួសារជាដើម។• មានការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់អំឡុងពេលបំរើការងារ។• មានផ្តល់អាហារពេលព្រឹក និងអាហារថ្ងៃត្រង់។• ដំណើរកំសាន្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំ…។***Employee Benefit:• Khmer New Year Bonus• Thanks Giving’s day bonus• Annual Profit bonus• Retired Salary• Annual Leave, Sick Leave, Pregnant Leave, Family event leave and etc.• NSSF including Medical insurance, Industrial accident insurance.• 39$ Food Allowance based on working days .• Dormitory support, Yearly travel …Contact Information:Company’s Name	: CAMKO BROTHERS CO.LTDLocation	: Khan Sen Sok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.Working time	: 8:00AM~5:00PM (Monday~Friday)                  8:00AM~3:00PM (Saturday)Mobile		: 023 231 881 / 070 231 883Email		: job@camkobrothers.com

Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   023 231 881 /070 231 883 (Telegram) job@camkobrothers.com Phnom Penh  023 231 881 /070 231 883 (Telegram)

Job Description: - Ensure the prompt and efficient preparation and service in all food areas to the company’s standard and to the client’s satisfaction.   - Ensure the site budget is met and exceeded and that all company audits & documentation are all trained to the required standard. - Provide the most cost-effective catering service which offers the users quality and choice. - Promote healthy eating, wellbeing, and employee satisfaction. Job Description:
** Reporting Line: IT Manager

** Key Responsibilities:
- Provide general IT assistance to support the NAMOS Version upgrade to all stations
- Provide Technical support on checking Network/ cabling
- Provide maintenance of computers and printers, when needed, and other IT equipment to ensure that they are working well
- Provide maintenance assistance to employees
- Other tasks may be assigned by IT Manager
Job Requirement:
- Educational background: A freshly graduated student of Computer Science, Information Technology or others related field is encouraged to apply
- Skill: Good proficiency of English for both writing and speaking. Knowledge of IT helpdesk, IT hardware and software maintenance and troubleshooting
- Knowledge: MS Office, Internet and Email proficiency
- Willing to learn, honest and be able to work under pressure
- Language: Good proficiency of English for both writing and speaking.
- Period of intern: 6 months up to 1year

** Applications should be submitted via sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com or to our Head Office, ANINA Building 6th Floor, No 240, St. 271, B.P600, 12351 Phnom Penh, Cambodia
Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.
Company Profile:
TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. (previously called TOTAL Cambodge) is an affiliate of TotalEnergies, a broad energy company that produces and markets energies on a global scale: oil and biofuels, natural gas and green gases, renewables and electricity. Our 105,000 employees are committed to energy that is ever more affordable, clean, reliable and accessible to as many people as possible. Active in more than 130 countries, TotalEnergies puts sustainable development in all its dimensions at the heart of its projects and operations to contribute to the well-being of people. 

TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been officially operating in Cambodia since 1993. Throughout the country, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been involved in marketing various energy and lubricants products and services to its customers in both the private and public sectors. We offer a wide range of products through more than 100 service stations with over 52 Bonjour Shops, Industrial fuels, Aviation fuels and lubricants. Through the TotalEnergies Card, customers are offered a convenient way to make and manage fuel purchases. Other services offered include used oil analysis, tank installations and bulk deliveries to many of our Commercial customers.

In view of supporting its growth in Cambodia, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.  is looking for a talented and motivated candidate for the position as follow:


Applications should be submitted via email: sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com *Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms Lypy LY   sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com ANINA Building 6th Floor, No 240, St 271, Beoung Tumpun, Meanchey, Phnom Penh – CAMBODIA

position: Assistant to the Founder, Chairman and CEO

Work closely with Presidents and executive team to evaluate the efficiency of applied policies and procedures according to Company’s objectives and business plan. - Work closely with Presidents, operations management team, and other cross-departments to ensure goal alignment and execution on all initiatives to achieve Company’s goals.- Analyze the key issues and risk assessment of Aii Language Center and American Intercon School  and come up with recommendation on the area to improve to propose to Presidents and Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Assist Founder, Chairman, and CEO in setting and reviewing KPIs of Aii and AIS and assess the effectiveness of performance based on the KPIs set.- Review policies and procedures as well as all proposals of Presidents of the assigned department before submitting to Founder, Chairman, and CEO.- Make sure that to-do list assigned by the Founder, Chairman and CEO is up to date and follow up with the tasks from HoDs as needed.- Provide advisory to all stakeholders in the to do list to ensure all tasks assigned to Senior Management and relevant departments and report the results to The Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Coordinate with relevant departments to make sure that decisions of the Founder, Chairman and CEO and Senior Management are well-implemented/achieved.- Keep the confidentiality of all information relevant to the Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Assist the Founder, Chairman and CEO in all meetings.- Write and review minutes and contents for meetings, speeches or others required assigned by the Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Assist the two schools Aii Language Center and American Intercon school by working closely and cooperatively with the Presidents of the two schools to ensure smooth operations. - Coordinate with relevant departments to make sure that decisions of the Founder, Chairman and CEO and Senior Management are well-implemented/achieved.- Oversee Mengly J. Quach Foundation and provide advisory as well as support to Head of Department ensure the efficiency and effectiveness are delivered. - Manage TT Japanese Chestnut to ensure business plan and objectives are met. - Act as a first point of contact: dealing with correspondence/suggestions/emails. - Respond to public inquiries to meet the Founder, Chairman and CEO. - Organize and maintain the Founder, Chairman and CEO’s diary and making appointments on a daily/weekly basis to discuss issues, problems, business operations and other matters. - Be part of the meeting with the business unit and/or department/office under your supervision/coordination.- Be part of the interview of Management level with the Founder, Chairman and CEO. - Be part of the interview of management level with Academic teams. - Read the meeting minutes and report/update to the Founder, Chairman and CEO. - Make preparation for committee meetings. - Read and listen to Telegram Groups under your supervision/coordination. - Read the meeting minutes and report/update to the Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Read monthly/annual report and report/update to the Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Do round at each campus.- Relay the message from the Founder, Chairman and CEO to the business unit and/or department/office under your supervision.- Follow up with each business unit and/or department/office under your supervision/coordination about the assigned tasks.- Read and understand of all company’s policies.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor of Education, management-related disciplines. - At least 5 years of working experience in education, management or related experience. - Educational management and planning - Good at problem-solving skills.- Very good communication skills in English and Khmer- Multi-tasking ability.- Time Management and organizational skills.- Computer literacy.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939
Contact Information HR HR Manager 017710742 digacambodia@gmail.com #33E0, St.125, Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7Makara, Phnom Penh. 017710742

Job Description: - Presenting / developing ideas and writing content for social media for long-form and short-form formats for different audiences for various channel.					- Write stories, scripts, and captions for video content, as well as social media content, 					Produce digital content including video stories and infographics. 					- Research, plan, write and edit high-quality content that "wows" the targeted audiences with unique ideas and story angles across multiple channels and platforms.					- Liaise with external contacts, and meetups to produce interviews or exclusive stories.					Able to do the translation from English content to Khmer content and vice versa. 					- Ensure the copywriting / scriptwriting are met according to the schedule.					- Able to prioritize and manage multiple projects deadline simultaneously. 					Partner closely with the internal team to ensure content publishing parameters are met and maintained.					- In-depth knowledge of current trends in TikTok and other social media including Facebook, YouTube and Instagram videos.					- Ability to work well under pressure managing multiple projects simultaneously with deadlines.					- Proficiency of English and Khmer is a must.					- Able to utilize AI tools to churn out storyboard and storytelling.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description: •	Pernod Ricard Cambodge commercial ambition includes the focused development of the On Trade channel where the Group’s brands must be heavily promoted and activated to engage various target consumers. The On Trade channel is key in facilitating consumer recruitment and conversion into the Pernod Ricard portfolio of Premium brands, ensuring sustainable growth of the Group in this market. •	Reporting to the Head of Sales, the incumbent will be responsible for delivering brand objectives both quantitatively (volume and profit) and qualitatively (visibility, activation, consumer engagement) for all contracted outlets. He/She will review performance of the PR CAM universe of outlets and recommend appropriate commercial strategy to his/her Manager: revisit all investments, define commercial strategy and plans that enable to block competitors on our leading categories and catch up market share over competitors on growth relay categories.•	The incumbent is responsible drive sales to Key Wholesalers who will distribute authorized PR CAM products to Contracted Outlets. He/She will also have the responsibility to drive Key Wholesalers to expand PR CAM business in non-contracted outlets serviced by Key Wholesalers, aka opening new outlets. The incumbent will build solid business plans (sales forecasts, A&P forecasts and marketing plans) with each Key Customer.•	The incumbent will coach and manage a team of  1 direct report (Sales Executives) across all On-Trade channels: TOT, HEB, LEB, RES, and NC. He/She will also have to establish credibility to coach and manage sales teams, supervisors, managers of on trade Customers who support the depletion of PR CAM products.•	The incumbent will be responsible for specified net sales targets and/or key brand volumes across the On Trade Channel to be disclosed during on-boarding, with the understanding to grow sales year on year.•	Aside from managing the on trade team, the incumbent will also directly manage all Customers under the following channels:o	International Hotels/Resortso	Any Customers under Regional or Global partnership arrangement with the GroupKey Missions include but are not limited to:•	Key Accountability to drive volume, net sales and CM, as well as to manage A&P funds.•	Manage sales in Contracted Outlets in order to develop profitable business for PR CAM•	Drive major PRS Brand Activations•	Manage wholesalers in a professional manner through designing and implement business plans by wholesaler: sales and A&P forecasts, usage of their marketing funds, monthly brand activation calendars, training and coaching of their salesforce
Job Requirement: Job Requirements:•	Degree holder with formal business qualifications or equivalent•	Minimum 7 years working experience in sales•	Experience in liquor, luxury or FMCG industry is a plus•	Computer literate Proficient in Excel and PowerPoint •	Excellent command of spoken and written English, Chines is a plusPersonal and behavioral skills:•	Excellent critical thinking and analytical skills•	Organized and strong result orientation •	Entrepreneurial mindset and proactive with strong time-management skills•	Energetic and outgoing personality who enjoys the night life •	A team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills•	Excellent record of leading high performing teams•	Sociable and can easily build professional relationships with new Internal and External customers
Company Profile:
Pernod Ricard is the second-largest premium wines & spirits group, operating in over 86 affiliates and producing the widest international product portfolio in the industry with top brands such Absolut Vodka, Martell Cognac, Mumm Champagne, The Glenlivet, and Chivas Regal whisky among others. Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. imports and distributes products from the Group portfolio into the Cambodian market.
 
BACKGROUND
Pernod Ricard SA was created in 1975 through the link-up of the two largest French anise-based spirits companies: Pernod, which was founded in 1805, and Ricard, founded by Paul Ricard in 1932. Strategic M&A over the past three decades have vaulted Pernod Ricard into one of the top-tier international Wines & Spirits organizations in the world. In July 2017, Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. was launched locally, and marked the start of Pernod Ricard’s operations in Cambodia.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chan Ratha HR Manager 017666909 hrcam@pernod-ricard.com Phnom Penh Unit 2201 & 2202, Amass Central Tower, 22 floor, House No 176, Street 63, Corner 282 at Village 6, Sangkat Boeng Keng Kang Mouy 12302, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 017666909

Job Description: •	Reporting to the Regional Sales Manager and being based in the assigned province, the incumbent will be responsible for optimizing sales, distribution, brand visibilities and activation in TOFT, MOFT and On Trade channel. •	The incumbent is responsible drive sales to Key Wholesalers who will distribute authorized PR CAM products to drinks shop, liquor shop, supermarkets, contracted Outlets and so on. He/She will also have the responsibility to drive Key Wholesalers to expand PR CAM business in non-contracted outlets serviced by Key Wholesalers. •	The incumbent will liaise with line manger, MOFT and On Trade team to propose activation and engagement with customers (Liquor shops, Supermarket, Hotels, KTV, Club, Restaurants etc) to drive consumer experience with the Group’s brands and to achieve sales volumes/distribution target. Key Missions include but are not limited to:•	Mandatory monthly visit 150-200 outlets to develop strong customer relationship, to promot great drink brands of the Group, to penetrate new outlets, and to deploy strategic brand activation/event. •	Collaboration with related department and commercial team to ensure commercial directions are implemented efficiently and effectively. •	Submitting and presenting monthly report on good performing and underperforming outlets to make sure the assigned provinces/outlet types are performing.
Job Requirement: Job Requirements :–	Degree holder with formal business qualifications or equivalent–	Minimum 4 years working experience in sales–	Experience in liquor, luxury or FMCG industry is a plus–	Computer literate Proficient in Excel and PowerPoint –	Excellent command of spoken and written EnglishPersonal and behavioral skills :–	Excellent critical thinking and analytical skills–	Organised and strong result orientation –	Entrepreneurial mindset and proactive with strong time-management skills–	Energetic and outgoing personality who enjoys the night life –	A team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills–	Excellent record of leading high performing teams–	Sociable and can easily build professional relationships with new Internal and External customers

Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. imports and distributes products from the Group portfolio into the Cambodian market.

Job Description:
	Tracking payments to internal and external stakeholders
	Prepare accounts payable and receivable both tenant and stakeholders
	Assist in the preparation of financial reports such as financial statements and budget performance
	Process payments made with cash, checks or credit cards
	Take over petty cash fund operation day by day
	Issue invoice for claim from tenant for monthly utilities fee
	Review all cash collection from cashier and others
	Follow up all accounts receivable to Clients
	Ensure that all vouchers are entered timely into QuickBooks so that financial reports can be compiled on time. 
	Assist to Accounting Manager for preparing monthly financial report
Job Requirement:
	Bachelor’s degree in accounting or finance required
	Must have at least 1 or more years of experience in accounting or finance field
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and QuickBooks
	Demonstrate excellent organizational skills, communication skills, and problem-solving skills
	Good in English; knowledge of other languages is a plus
	Reliable with ability to multi-task and work well under pressure
Company Profile:
Since 2013, Naki Group has grown from a local real estate and property management firm into an investment firm focused on developing the Indo-China belt. With representation in Singapore and Seattle, the Group invests in our 3 key pillars of property development, realty services, and hospitality management.

As a developer, Naki Group has completed Silvertown Metropolitan, a 111-unit condominium in 2014, Woodland Residences, an 84-unit luxury villa gated community to be completed in 2022, and Agile Sky Residence, a 44-storey condominium to be completed in 2022.

As a property management firm, Naki Group have served Silvertown Metropolitan, Woodland Residences, Agile Showroom, TK Avenue Community Mall and The One Mall. In addition to managing medium to large projects, our property management services extend to those smaller shops who require janitorial, pest control and sanitization services.

As a hospitality services provider, Naki Group has maintained a high quality standards of stay to our tenants. From long stay to short stay, we ensure enjoyable accommodation coupled with services of convenience.

Now as a growing real estate company, Naki Group is determined to reach out to larger domestic and overseas projects. On a larger scale, investors both financial and expertise will play a large role in achieving the goal of higher and faster returns to our partners.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resource   081 990 959 hr@nakigroup.com Koh Pich, Diamond Twin Tower, 22nd Floor, Sopheak Mongkol Rd, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 081 990 959

Job Description:
• Develop an understanding of our client’s businesses
• Support the planning, execution and completion of audit and assurance engagements in
compliance to applicable and approved financial reporting and auditing standards
• Interact with our clients for collection of all the necessary data / information, set-up and
maintenance of audit files, preparation of audit working papers and deliverables
• Clearly and accurately document the execution of specific audit procedures as defined by
the audit objectives and planned audit approach
• Recognize potential audit issues or unusual relationships from basic analysis of the
financial statements and to communicate all findings and deficiencies to relevant more
senior members of the audit team
• Ensure and monitor that assigned work is completed on time with high audit quality
• Participate in developing a positive learning culture, open to coaching/mentoring
programs, and support initiatives for professional and personal development of one’s self
and also others
• Comply to Baker Tilly’s policies and adapt to the audit team’s culture and traditions
Job Requirement:
• With bachelor’s degree or a final year student in Accounting, Finance or a related field; with a professional qualification i.e. ICAEW, ACCA, CPA Australia or pass at least the fundamental levels of professional qualification will be added as an advantage
• For Experienced Associates, a minimum of 1 to 2 years of work experience in any audit
firm; an experience with any of the Big4 firms is an advantage
• With advance writing and verbal communication skills in English; proficiency in Mandarin
is an advantage
• Experience in auditing banking and financial institutions, and other specialized industries
is an advantage
• Able to work with minimum supervision in a team-oriented environment
Company Profile: Baker Tilly Cambodia ranks among the largest accountancy firms in Cambodia, and is an independent member firm of Baker Tilly International which is currently ranks among Top 10 largest accountancy networks in the world with approximately 41,234 staffs in 145 countries/territories.We provide a full range of professional services which include audit & assurance, taxation, forensics & investigation, corporate recovery & restructuring and insolvency management.Baker Tilly Cambodia is:- A member firm of Kampuchea Institute of Certified Public Accountants and Auditors (KICPAA)- A licensed audit firm approved by Accounting and Auditing Regulator of Cambodia (ACAR)- An accredited audit firm licensed by Securities & Exchange Regulator of Cambodia (SERC)- A licensed tax agent approved by Cambodian General Department of Taxation (GDT)- An accredited audit firm licensed by National Bank of Cambodia (NBC) for Banking and Financial InstitutionsBaker Tilly Cambodia is recognized as Approved Employer in Cambodia by ACCA, who holds Trainee Development approval at Platinum level as well as Professional Development approval. Job Description:
• Develop an understanding of our client’s businesses
• Lead the planning, execution and completion of audit and assurance engagements in
compliance to applicable and approved financial reporting and auditing standards in
close collaboration with the senior members of the audit team
• Interact with our clients for collection of all the necessary data / information, set-up and
maintenance of audit files, preparation and finalization of audit working papers and
deliverables

defined by the audit objectives and planned audit approach

financial statements and to communicate all findings and deficiencies to relevant more
senior members of the audit team

anticipate and identify risk and escalate issues as appropriate to the relevant more
senior members of the audit team and to present the findings to our clients and their
stakeholders

stakeholders, to execute complex audit and assurance procedures, to lead and
supervise engagement team members on fieldwork

completed on time with high audit quality
• Create a positive learning culture, open to coaching/mentoring programs, endeavor to
support and train the junior members of the audit team, and support initiatives for
professional and personal development of one’s self and also others
• Comply to Baker Tilly’s policies and adapt to the audit team’s culture and traditions

qualification i.e. ICAEW, ACCA, CPA Australia or pass at least fundamental levels of
professional qualification is an advantage
• Minimum of 2 to 3 years of work experience in any audit firm; an experience with any of

• With advance writing and verbal communication skills in English; proficiency in Mandarin

Job Description:
•	Manage all core HR departmental areas, including payroll, employee relations, HR admin, learning and development, internal recruitment, employee engagement, and maintaining and improving HR systems. 
•	Provide advice and direction where needed to the HR team on work priorities, budget and staff resources, strategic, policy, organization and staff management issues.
•	Current regulation compliance, including accepted professional standards, policies and procedures and legislation (including legislation on data protection, the Equality Act and health and safety).  
•	Manage the implementation of employment policies. 
•	Ensure employment law, HR policy, best practice and workforce development are applied.
•	Ensure the onboarding process is handled in a professional manner to expedite the settling in period.
•	Manage the execution of the HR Strategy to ensure achievement of the objectives.
•	Support HR staff to ensure that all relevant professional standards are met. 
•	Continuously improve engagement and welfare activities, maximising productivity, devolving HR responsibilities to line managers and building leadership capability.  Identify HR trends so that attention can be directed to key issues and resources.

•	Regularly coach, mentor, and support colleagues to identify individual strengths and development needs
•	Ensure employee training requirements are well managed and monitored. 
•	Manage the training and development plans and ensure they are of a high standard. 
•	Conduct annual remuneration and benefit surveys and reviews. 
•	Determine relevant Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for incentive schemes.
•	Manage the diversity, equality, and inclusion values and practices within the company.
•	Enabled all team members to access appropriate guidance and information to manage their workload.

•	Manage the allocation of HR budgets.
•	Ensure internal HR communications, including any issues, initiatives and programmes are well planned, coordinated, relevant, timely and adhere to the company’s values. 
•	Make sure that company values and approach are utilised to strengthen the organisational culture.
•	Demonstrate the company values, championing the leadership behaviour framework.
