Job Description:
The CTO shall be responsible for all technical activities for this growing infrastructure based telecom operator and data center service provider.
Responsibilities will include directing all new service development, network planning and engineering and implementation/build-out, operations management, network and service performance assurance, managing the ICT portfolio in line with business requirements and overall support of business development activities on a global scale.
	Oversee all technology aspects of the company.
	Direct the teams in new product and service development, Network Planning, Engineering and Implementation, including infrastructure build out to new regions globally and service delivery to customer locations, Solutions Development to address a growing set of telecom and data center service needs, Business development and Technical Sales support and Global Operations including managing the delivery of end-to-end services over the organization's international network, terrestrial networks in several countries, IP/MPLS footprint, partner networks and data center with technology from leading global OEMs.
	Establish the company’s technology roadmap in line with market needs and global technology trends, assist in development of the business plan and lead all aspects of its implementation.
	Work with other department heads, especially Sales and Marketing to plan and advise on technologies and services to meet evolving market needs that enhance revenue.
-	Roll out new telecom and data center services and deploy effective resources to support in company and by leading Corporate customers.
-	Build relationships especially on C-level with customers and global partners that result in superior solutions and deeper loyalty and adoption of the company's solutions.
-	Ensure world class network and data center operations and management to deliver the required service levels to customers.
-	Ensure overall network security, reliability and resilience and disaster recovery planning.
-	Manage supplier business relationships and/or partnerships across the operating countries to sustain and grow the company’s business.
-	Direct the IT team and ensure alignment of IT with overall business requirements.
-	Lead the company’s continued investment in infrastructure to drive growth including future domestic and international network builds and evolution of network and data center services, capacity planning and optimization taking into account technology trends
-	Actively manage the department’s budget and ensure effective use of the company’s resources on technology investments to grow the business.
-	Grow the capacity of the company’s technical staff to lead the technology services innovation curve.
Job Requirement:

Job Description:

Content Creative Supervisor is responsible in developing the storyline, writing script and coordinate of video shooting.

•	Proficiency in using Photoshop, and Illustrator;
•	Be able travel to site and work for flexible schedule;
•	Fluent in written and spoken English.

Content Creative Supervisor is based at Head Office of Borey Peng Huoth, Graphic Design department.

Job Description:
- Learn, operate, and maintain IP network delivering IP data
- Provide IP network support of new and existing services and features.
- Support second and third tier escalations for all operational outages in IP network.
- Troubleshoot IP network problems quickly and help provide sound engineering solutions by maintaining deep knowledge of MAT, topology, and up-to-date configuration details.
- Document engineering solutions in accordance to in-house standards including but not limiting to the following documents: Detailed Engineering Requirements, Detailed Reference Design, and Detailed Integration Test Plan documents.
- Conduct high-quality and comprehensive LAB tests to prove viability of proposed engineering solutions.
- On-Call 24x7 rotation
- Other tasks assign by management
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Math degree or equivalent work experience.
- In depth understanding of IP networking including routing protocols (eBGP, iBGP, OSPF, IS-IS)
- Knowledge of IP network QoS technology (Queuing, and Traffic Policing).
- Knowledge of IP network security support including Firewalls and NAT implementations.
- Knowledge of Mikrotik Cloud router, Cisco routers and switches, Cisco ASA Firewalls.
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or relevant.
- Good time management and result oriented.
- Honest, good communication, strong commitment, good decision making
- Non-nepotism, high moral, diligent.

** Salary and Benefit			
- Salary: Negotiate    
- Working times: 8:00am–12:00 pm & 1:00pm – 17:00pm    
- 18 days of annual leave    
- NSSF & Medical insurance & Accident insurance    
- 13th month salary    
- Commission base on performance

Job Description:
People Leadership:
• Effective performance management of all direct reports, focusing on behavioral change that will both inspire and motivate individuals to deliver results.
• Responsible for the quality of maintenance work carried out by all indirect employees
• Develop a behavioral safety culture and promote a safe working environment by ensuring full compliance with Carlsberg SH&E and LOTO policy process.
• Recruit, lead, motivate and develop a flexible and agile multi-disciplined maintenance team.
• Carry out leadership led process confirmations, maximizing the opportunity to coach and engage teams during the process.
• Actively support other members of the Senior Management Team
Budgeting & Improvements:
• Prepare, gain approval for and manage annual maintenance budgets
• Prepare, gain approval for and manage annual utilities budgets
• Review maintenance practices, successes & failures with the objective of constantly moving the improvement of cost and performance.
• Analyze and review utilities consumption with the aim of constantly improving supply and operational consumption
• Actively participate in the site/country long term development plan (LDP) formation
• Identify and prepare capital projects for approval and in line with the LDP, which improve operational efficiencies and product profitability.
• Support and where required take the role in managing material and non-material waste and loss reduction, with cross-functional teams.
• Encourage and actively support standardized problem-solving methodologies, including Gemba Kaizen, RCA & EWO activities, to resolve day-to-day and chronic problems.
Performance:
• Prioritize maintenance and utility focus areas
• Ensure clear focus and communication of initiatives that relate to overall business and site targets, through effective policy deployment
• Ensure sufficient resource is allocated to key initiatives (internal or external)
• Drive correct target percentage compliance of autonomous/preventative maintenance through maintenance and operational teams.
• Utilize machine reliability measures of MTBF / MTTR for effective maintenance approaches with defined machine criticality view.
• Sets and communicate clear targets for team
• Ensure utilities consumption targets are part of each operational team targets and that operational teams have a concrete plan to improve
• Review performance through a structured MCRS and PMS system
• Be discipline in terms of meeting attendance and management of these meetings
• Ensure meeting TORs are agreed and adhered to and the plans and action logs are always reviewed according to schedule
Job Requirement:
Professional qualification and competencies:

1. Significant experience and understanding of managing maintenance and utilities KPI and the functional levers relating to people, cost, quality, and service
2. Significant experience and understanding of managing maintenance and utilities within a brewing and packaging environment.
3. In depth knowledge of regulatory requirements relating to Utilities.
4. Committed to Lean TPM and acts as role model in order to achieve organizational objectives through sustainable continuous improvements.
5. High level of Carlsberg leadership competencies:
• Driving for Results
• Customer/Consumer Focus
• Passion and integrity
• Analytical thinking
• Cross-team interacting and

Minimum Qualification Requirement:
1. Qualified to degree level or equivalent in Engineering, Maintenance and/or Utilities or have significant experience and a proven long-term record of managing maintenance and utilities with an FMCG company
2. Knowledge and experience of applying Lean TPM philosophies, tools, and techniques.
3. Knowledge of key

Job Description:
• Overseeing the daily activities of the accounting department and ensuring that all major projects, month-end, and year-end reports are completed accurately and on time,
• Evaluation, developing, and improving department controls, systems, and procedures that increase accuracy and efficiency,
• Maintaining accurate and complete financial records and participating in audits or reconciliations, as needed, and reviewing matters of the financial statements,
• Maintaining and controlling all accounting listing,
• Assist in managing relevant tax matters and facilitate tax audits,
• Ensure effective internal control in compliance with Company’s policies and local statutory requirements,
• Preparation of necessary documents related to accounting matters for the Insurance Regulator of Cambodia, the Insurance Association of Cambodia, the General Department of Taxation, related party reporting, etc. 
• Perform ad-hoc analysis and assignments as required, 
• Other tasks assigned by Senior Manager.
Job Requirement:
• ACCA or bachelor’s or master’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field,
• 3+ years of experience in auditing and accounting,
• Strong understanding of accounting, finance, management principles, and Cambodians taxes,
• Proficient in MS Office with advanced knowledge of MS Excel,
• High attention to detail and accuracy, 
• Ability to direct and supervise,
• Good leadership and communication skills,
• Independent, self-motivated, and detail-oriented with good interpersonal skills

job title: Assistant Manager, Digital Marketing & Digital Sales
position: Assistant Manager, Digital Marketing & Digital Sales
Job Description:
We are looking to hire one passionate candidate who will be responsible for company’s Digital Marketing and Digital Sale. Under the supervision of Brand, Marketing and Digital
Senior Manager, S/he will be a focal person to drive the company’s all digital marketing activities and digital insurance sale platform. Those include, but not limited to,

- Develop and execute digital marketing plans to drive consumer engagement and align with brand and company strategies.
- Develop digital plan to promote and sell digital products through offline and online platforms.
- Plan and manage our social media platforms & corporate website.
- Prepare monthly reports for the marketing campaign’s overall performance.
- Work closely with the team in suggesting and planning appropriate ATL/BTL campaigns to improve quotes by considering key factors like (reviewing past campaign performance, budget, sales promotion we plan to offer, etc)
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in marketing, Media, Communication, or a related field.
- At least 3-4 years’ experience in marketing, social media & website
- Strong ability to create social media content, press release and articles.
- Experience in producing video, graphic design and running onlinE0020campaign is preferred.
- Experience in web journey principles, best practices, and content management platforms is a plus
- Very good written and interpersonal communication skills in English

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description:
** POSITION PURPOSE
The Marketing Manager will be responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies
for the various business streams, relationship management and the supervision and training of a
team of young professionals. This position is responsible for instilling a marketing led ethos
across IDP Cambodia, developing integrated annual marketing plans for the key business
streams, and establishing and building upon strategic relationships. The position must work
consultatively and responsively with both internal and external stakeholders and manage and
foster professional skills development in a team of junior staff who are responsible for events,
publications, advertising, and external and internal communications.
RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Strategy
 Develop and agree comprehensive annual / quarterly / monthly marketing plans that
successfully support the achievement of country goals across business lines within
agreed timeframes and to expected quality standards
JOB ANNOUNCEMENT AT IDP

- Design and agree multi-channel marketing campaigns, including details of the intended
source of leads, numbers of leads and related activities that will enable execution of the campaigns
- Work with Office Managers in developing and supporting effective execution of activity calendars including in-office activities and outreach initiatives
- Devise appropriate Public Relations strategies as required and in line with business needs
- Build and maintain strong relationships and communication with the regional marketing team to leverage learning from the wider region on best practices across marketing areas
2. Lead Generation
- Collaborate with key stakeholders to plan and execute all lead generation initiatives in a highly effective manner, which meet the required number of leads by source, enabling
the country team to maximise the sales opportunities / business results
- Identify new opportunities for generating leads and make recommendations to Country
Director on the proposed investment and projected outcomes to initiate theses new marketing initiatives
- Challenge the status quo by introducing creative and innovative ideas to the
management team for consideration
3. Event Marketing & Contact Centre Management – Lead Qualification
- Plan, schedule and execute marketing activity to support the successful operation of IDP
events. This includes pre-event marketing and all activities relating to the event itself
- Prepare marketing & booth designs (with support from Regional Team) and ensure IDP
is presented to participants in line with strategic goals and brand positioning
- Evaluate the success of marketing events from feedback received from both clients and students and improve
- Local Contact Centre setup and management, working closely with Regional Contact
Centre team
-  Support Contact Centre team to qualify the web leads as per the defined targets
- Contact Centre performance reporting and monitoring
4. Analytics and Reporting
- Make effective use of analytics to evaluate effectiveness of marketing campaigns and
track numbers of qualified lead generated vs. target for each destination
- Proactively escalate / highlight issues, when necessary, along with ideas of how to
improve lead numbers and lead quality
5. Digital Marketing (led by Regional Digital Marketing team)
- Work with the Regional Web Marketing team to ensure that the local website is maintained and updated to inspire students and to meet agreed objectives
- Drive effective use of websites by developing and implementing SEO/SEM strategies with the Regional Web Marketing team. This includes developing content that will drive students to seek out IDP’s website
- Work closely with Regional Web Marketing team to generate web leads through multiple
online platforms (Google, Facebook etc.)

6. Vendor and Agency Management
- Identify, build and maintain relationships with relevant vendors, agencies, and partners to​​ increase the business success and ensure high quality outcomes for IDP Cambodia
- Create corporate and government links to improve PR and partnership opportunities your team can leverage
7. Team Leadership
- Lead, develop and maintain a high performing team that will deliver IDP’s key marketing objectives from a corporate unit perspective
- Create an environment that delivers opportunities for collaboration and co-operation
across the wider regional marketing teams
- Set performance targets for key performance indicators for team ensuring all delegations are clear
- Contribute to building a positive work environment within the team based on a shared commitment to IDP’s values and quality
- Build and maintain strong relationships and communication with regional office to leverage all marketing strategies & material that is developed
8. Financial Management
- Manage budget and resource allocations effectively to deliver business priorities
- Exercise appropriate stewardship over IDP assets and intellectual property
- Expenditure is in line with agreed budget and business priorities
9. General
- Undertake any other lawful duties as reasonably directed by management
Job Requirement:
 Educated to Graduation level or equivalent
 Minimum five years work experience in a mid-level marketing role, or at least eight years
relevant work experience
- Background in the successful delivery of strategic marketing activities
- Experience in budget management
- Demonstrated analytical and problem-solving skills
- Demonstrated high level written and oral communication skills including the ability to prepare high quality materials and communication products for print and digital media
- Knowledge of contemporary marketing and communication practices and technological environments
- Outstanding interpersonal skills and the ability to communicate effectively in a cross- cultural setting
- High level of personal initiative combined with the ability to work collaboratively with other staff
-  Ability to inspire, manage and supervise staff, including the ability to establish priorities and meet competing deadlines

*** Desirable Requirements
- Accomplished knowledge of the education industry
- Experience in working in dynamic global environment
Women and Disabled People are strongly encouraged to apply.

Job Description:
The Opportunity
The Head of Finance is a key leadership role at IDP Cambodia. You will lead the IDP Cambodia
finance function by overseeing the overall financial performance management, ensuring high
standards of compliance are met and driving process improvement. You are responsible for
leading change in the development of a first-class finance function while supporting the Country
Director - Cambodia and Regional Finance Director - SEA.
Job Requirement:
What will you bring to the Organisation?     
- Over 10 years experience of financial leadership with a Bachelor’s degree or equivalent and post-graduate certifications in Commerce, business or analytical disciplines with solid experience in an MNC environment
- Experience leading finance functions in medium/large sized businesses - capable of inspiring, motivating, developing and stretching teams to achieve higher goals
- High personal and professional integrity – operates personally in an ethical and trustworthy manner. Leads team to operate in similar fashion
- A superior customer service attitude, showing positive work behaviours and being an excellent team player
- High influencing skills with colleagues and management
- Ability to handle changing conditions and overcome challenges in an effective manner. 

Adept at handling ambiguity
- Capable of operating proactively with minimal supervision with ability to effectively handle multiple priorities
- Outstanding communicator with excellent written and verbal skills in English to interact effectively with colleagues within and outside the country

** Benefits include:
- Competitive remuneration commensurate with skills and experience
- Medical and dental coverage for employee and dependents
- Be a part of a creative and collaborative truly global workforce
 Professional career development opportunities

Job Description:
POSITION PURPOSE
The People Experience Manager (Cambodia) is responsible for driving all people related matters and managing the day-to-day implementation of People Experience (PX) initiatives and policies in both operational and strategic levels to achieve high performance and high engagement organisation. 
The role will be working closely with the Country Director (CD), Country Leadership Team (CLT), Regional PX Director (RPXD) and the PX teams in both Regional and Global offices, to develop and deliver a number of work programs and campaigns aiming to provide our people with the best
employment experience across all three business units: Student Placement, IELTS and English Language Teaching, and support functions.
 Manage employee lifecycle processes from attraction and acquisition of talents to on-
boarding, capability and career development through to exit and separation.
 Support and advise the management team to provide great work environments for our
people through supporting facility management, occupational health and safety and
broad administration activities specifically for the Cambodia’s offices
 Deliver great employee experiences through effectively administrating employee
processes and records in SuccessFactors (personnel database)
JOB ANNOUNCEMENT AT IDP

JOB DESCRIPTION
An ASX100 business part that is owned by Australian universities, IDP is a pioneer in international
education services. Our core business lines include student placement to Australia, US, UK, Canada
and New Zealand institutions, English-language testing and training. 
We are on a mission to build the world's leading platform and connected community to guide students
along their journey to achieve their lifelong learning and career aspirations.
As a co-owner of IELTS, we deliver the English test that is trusted by more governments, universities
and organisations than any other. We also operate English language teaching schools in South East
Asia. 
We are innovators, driven by the needs of our customers and deep data insights. Our 5,000 team
members based around the world understand that our services change lives – not only of our
customers, but their wider communities. 
By combining empathy and professional expertise with digital excellence, we create launch pads for our
customers to achieve global success. 

POSITION PURPOSE
The People Experience Manager (Cambodia) is responsible for driving all people related matters and
managing the day-to-day implementation of People Experience (PX) initiatives and policies in both
operational and strategic levels to achieve high performance and high engagement organisation. 
The role will be working closely with the Country Director (CD), Country Leadership Team (CLT),
Regional PX Director (RPXD) and the PX teams in both Regional and Global offices, to develop and
deliver a number of work programs and campaigns aiming to provide our people with the best
employment experience across all three business units: Student Placement, IELTS and English
Language Teaching, and support functions. 

- Directly support CD and CLT to create a collaborative work environment across departments through effective internal communications via such channels as internal social network website (JAM), emails, bulletin boards, newsletters, town hall, social events, and instant messaging groups, etc.
- Collaborate with the Regional and Global PX teams to implement new projects and campaigns to improve and enhance employees' experiences.
- Oversee payroll data preparation, and coordinate with the Finance department to ensure pay is made to the employees correctly and on time
- Oversee the statutory compliance together with Global Privacy Data Officer

RESPONSIBILITIES 
 People Data and Process Integrity:  
- Accountable for accuracy and up-to-date data of people information in SuccessFactors
(SF)
- Collaborate with the RPXD and SF team in designing, testing and implementing new modules in SF
- Drive an adoption of the internal social media, JAM, to deliver a great people experience through regular content contributions and active participation in relevant discussions and topics.
- Effectively identify opportunities to digitise people process administration to increase effectiveness and enhance employment experience Talent Acquisition & On-boarding:
- Manage and facilitate the talent acquisition process by collaborating with both internal (hiring managers, CD, RPXD) and external (internal recruiting team, IDP Career Portal,
recruitment agencies, job posting websites, candidates) parties through an effective use
of the dedicated Application Tracking System (JobScore) to attract, recruit and hire high
quality talent into the organisation
- Ensure an effective and efficient talent acquisition process to provide a positive experience for hiring managers as well as candidates
- Conduct analysis, assess recruitment results, and identify areas of opportunity and change. Use the data to evaluate sourcing effectiveness, determine progress and
process improvement
-  Manage onboarding and induction program to provide new joiners with a smooth and seamless onboarding experience. Ensure that new joiners are properly oriented about the Company
Job Requirement:
-  Bachelor’s degree or higher in HR Management, Business
Studies/Administration/Management or related field
- Minimum 10 years of working experience of which 7 must be in HR function
- Minimum 5 years of experience in leading HR function for a medium to large MNC organization (min. 100 pax)
- Excellent fluency in Khmer AND English in both speaking and writing to collaborate with local, region and global teams
- Sound understanding of the principles underpinning great employee experiences and Cambodia labour laws
- Effective communication and interpersonal skills, and able to engage effectively with all levels of the organisation
- Highly organised, meticulous, able to prioritise and multitask with minimal supervision
- Demonstrated ability to manage internal and external relationships
- High degree of initiative and advanced problem-solving skills
- Proficient in Microsoft suite, especially Excel and PowerPoint
- Proactive personality with positive influence on our people

- Only candidates with the rights to work in the country will be considered. Shortlisted candidates will be contacted by recruiter

Desirable Experience:
- Proactive to implement process improvements
- Experience working in MNC with matrix organisation setting
- Experience in SAP and payroll processing

 “Salary & Benefit: Attractive salary package (based on qualiﬁcations and experience), health insurance, international professional development opportunities, and other relevant beneﬁts” on top of the requirement for each of the positions. Please refer to the attachment for reference.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: Job SummaryThe LnD Business Partner works closely with employees and business leaders to identify, design, deliver, develop and evaluate learning solutions that build and enhance individual and organizational capabilities to drive the success and growth of the employees and company.Key Responsibilities 1.	Work closely with line leadership to understand the business and talent pressures in order to identify individual and organizational capability gaps.2.	Collaborate with business leaders and subject matter experts to design, develop, deliver and evaluate learning and development (L&D) solutions so that the business strategy and objectives can be achieved.3.	Ensure the alignment of goals and objectives of the L&D solutions with the goals and needs of individuals and business to maximize individual and organizational performance. 4.	Diagnose and solve individual and organizational performance issues so that the individuals and organizations can achieve their desired performance and growth levels. 5.	Identify capability gaps in employees and manages and propose learning and development solutions to close the gaps and drive performance, development, engagement and retention. 6.	Drive talent development processes (individual development plan, career planning, etc.) to ensure that employees’ level of performance and capabilities meet current and future needs.7.	Support the implementation of learning management system (LMS), platforms, tools and processes to foster learning and high-performance culture.8.	Provide data-driven people and organizational insights so that line leadership team can make informed talent and capability development decisions.9.	Service as a trusted advisor on performance and capability development matters to line leadership so that they are empowered to deal with employee performance and career development issues.10.	Partner with HR Business Partners, HR Shared Services and Community of Practices to deliver great employee and manager experience of L&D services.Key Challenges 1.	Keep employee learning and development needs aligned with business needs2.	Design and deliver engaging and impactful learning and development programs3.	Ensure learning application back on the jobs4.	Balance learning and development program costs and effectiveness
Job Requirement: 1.	Education: At least Bachelor's degree (Master’s is preferred) in Human Resource Development, Business Administration, Organizational Development or related field2.	Experiences: o	3-5 years of work experience in the field of human resource management, preferably 1 or 2 years working in a HR-business partnership model.o	 Work experience in private sector, preferably in FMCG, supply chain management or manufacturingo	Experience in using LMS or other learning-related systems3.	Skills and knowledge: o	Deep expertise in business acumen, talent strategy, organizational effectiveness and data analysiso	Working knowledge of multiple human resource disciplines, including talent development, performance management, organizational development, and etc.o	People skills (broad understanding of human behaviors, motives and/or practical psychology)o	Relationship building, o	Consulting,o	Project management, o	System thinkingo	Coaching and mentoringo	Strong organizational skillso	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.o	Excellent commination and networking skills o	Computer literacy (Microsoft office and other useful software) o	Language: Strong command both Khmer and English

Job Description:
JOB PURPOSE
Providing seamless support to the Deputy CEO & CEO, including but not limited to: diary management, arranging meetings and calls, report and document preparation, preparing detailed international travel itineraries, making bookings and generally being proactive to ensure the DECO & CEO is well prepared for all meetings on a day to day basis.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
• To facilitate the organization of meetings by scheduling the meeting, inviting participants, ordering refreshments, booking equipment and meeting rooms, preparing and distributing agendas and taking minutes, and greeting visitors so that meetings are efficiently and effectively organized
• Ensure meetings are both regular, which can be scheduled well in advance, and ad hoc, responding to urgent requests for support
• Meetings are organized efficiently and to the satisfaction of the DCEO.
• Key support to the DCEO in preparation for board committee meetings and other formal meetings
• To organize, plan and facilitate Guest according to the instructions of DCEO

ORGANIZATION RELATIONSHIPS
• Reports directly to the DCEO and CEO’s office.
Job Requirement:
• A bachelor degree with a major in business or Admin
• At least 5 years of relevant secretarial experience to Top management in a large company with culturally diversified environment.  
• Good communication skills and the ability to work with people are essential.
• Strong leadership skills. 
• Familiarity with personnel laws and regulations is required.
• Strong planning skills.
• Great negotiator, good interpersonal skills, strategic yet hands-on in getting things done, caring and a good listener, enjoys working within a multi-cultural environment.  
• Fluent spoken and written English and able to conduct presentation with high confidence.

Job Description:
Job Purpose: Cyber security engineer help businesses by protecting their computer, server and networking systems from potential hackers and cyber-attacks. He safeguards sensitive data of a business from hackers and cyber-criminals.
We are looking a cyber security engineer with an analytical mind and a detailed understanding of cybersecurity methodologies. Cyber security engineers are expected to have meticulous attention to detail, outstanding problem-solving skills, work comfortably under pressure, and deliver on tight deadlines.

To ensure success, a cyber security engineer must display an excellent understanding of technology infrastructures using Firewalls, VPN, Data Loss Prevention, IDS/IPS, Web-Proxy, Security Audits, and others. Top candidates will be comfortable working with a variety of technologies, security problems, and troubleshooting of the network.

JOB SCOPE:
• Planning, implementing, managing, monitoring, and upgrading security measures for the protection of the organization's data, systems, and networks.
• Troubleshooting security and network problems.
• Responding to all system and/or network security breaches.
• Ensuring that the organization's data and infrastructure are protected by enabling the appropriate security controls.
• Participating in the change management process.
• Testing and identifying network and system vulnerabilities.
• Perform testing of in-house software for cyber security issues. Proposing security improvements for in-house software.
• Daily administrative tasks, reporting, and communication with the relevant engineers and management, and other departments in the organization.
• Report to the head of IT department

JOB SCOPE:
• Planning, implementing, managing, monitoring, and upgrading security measures for the protection of the organization's data, systems, and networks.
• Troubleshooting security and network problems.
• Responding to all system and/or network security breaches.
• Ensuring that the organization's data and infrastructure are protected by enabling the appropriate security controls.
• Participating in the change management process.
• Testing and identifying network and system vulnerabilities.
• Perform testing of in-house software for cyber security issues. Proposing security improvements for in-house software.
• Daily administrative tasks, reporting, and communication with the relevant engineers and management, and other departments in the organization.
• Report to the head of IT department
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENT
• A degree in computer science, IT, systems engineering, or related qualification.
• At least 3 years of work experience with incident detection, incident response, forensics, implementing and maintaining the cyber security controls, incident response.
• Experience with Firewalls (functionality and maintenance, from at least 2 brands), Office 365 Security, VSX, and Endpoint Security.
• Great awareness of cybersecurity trends and hacking techniques.
• Some knowledge of Power Shell, Python, and/or others (C++, Java, Ruby, Node, Go).
• Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.
• Strong attention to detail with an analytical mind and outstanding problem-solving skills.
• Security evaluation and preparing security policies. 
• Cloud Security. 
• Security Audits.
• Experiences implementation of security tools.
• Good verbal, communication skill and written English skills to present to senior management. 
• Proficiency in understanding the technical architecture of IT or Telco systems built on Windows, UNIX, Linux, VMware, ZStack, MS SQL, MySQL, and other systems that are used in the company.
• Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.

JOIN WITH US:
1- Public holiday follows to labor law        
2- Challenge salary and benefit                     
3- Cooperative teamwork                                               
4- On job training will be provided  
5- Difference work experience and equal applicant opportunity                              
6- Motivative and professional challenge.

Job Description:

compliance to ensure smooth business operation

marketing activities to capture business and increase market share

relationship with customers in order to increase more businesses

dissatisfaction/complaint, team knowledge and productivity followed by the
proposed solutions or recommendation and follow up actions to ensure gaps are
closed and continuous improvement is made

two-way communication and create an open, honest and motivating
team environment

compliance to ensure no surprise is discovered

- Sound sales and negotiation skills
- Excellent relationship building skills both internal and external

company_name: Rep. Office of PEB Steel Buildings Co., Ltd
Job Description:
- Be responsible for the assigned Projects.
- Prepares Proposal drawing bases on Sales information and customer’s requirements then send to Engineering Head office to get quotation-estimate.
- Updates Proposal drawing and Project information form when having changes from customers or/ and Sales engineer/manager
- After get Letter of Intent from Sales engineer, Pass information (Proposal drawing and Project information) to head office at Vietnam to get detail drawing with committed schedule from customer or sale engineer.
- Verify related information of jobs to provide to Head office at Vietnam, to make sure that all information of job is clear.
- Handle design change from beginning until hangover the Project to customer.
-  Makes preliminary designs for quotations as requested by sales/sales support for the purpose of quantity calculations in accordance with PIF (Project Information Form).
- Fills in the estimate break down sheet where the quantity of each component
is listed separately & clearly for each area or phase of the project.

** Other General responsibilities.
-  To Assist Sales, in any or all Engineering related supports, that may require during the execution time of the Project, by coordinating with Engineering Department.
- To ensure, all policies and procedures for entering jobs in the system are being strictly followed
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Construction/ Mechanical/ Civil
- At least 2 years-experience in related work.
- Have experience on steel design is more advantage
- Good interpersonal & communication skills, Good communication in English.
- Excellent Auto Cad, Microsoft, 3D sketch up and related software
- Careful and accurate
- Ability to maintain records, prepare reports and compose correspondence related to the work
- Willingness to work under high pressure, overtime & at weekends.
***  Working Days and Hours:
- Monday to Friday: 8:00am to 12:00am & 1:00pm to 5:30pm
- Lunch time: 12:00am to 1:00pm
** Benefit:
- Salary (Negotiable - based on Experience and knowledge)
- 13th salary per year
- Meal allowance
- Annual incentive base on sale performance
- Annual Salary increment
- Annual Staff Party
- Annual Trip
- Education Sponsorship

- Internal and External Training 
- High development and improvement

** Contact Information:
- Contact person: HR Department
- Phone: 010 23 33 02
- Email: scm@pebsteel.com
- Address: The Emerald Building, 6th Floor, No64, Preah Norodom Blvd, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.

Job Description: Taisun Group has embarked on a Transformation journey to deliver on its promise of profitable, sustainable growth. To realize its compass strategy of doubling the size of the business while reducing its inefficiencies, Taisun wants to embark on a new role to anchor its profitable growth agenda through proper business control and strengthen with Net Revenue Management (NRM) discipline and program. NRM (Net Revenue Management) is a new but systematic approach to defining our strategic pricing, our price-pack architecture, our promotions and our trade terms structure with the aim of driving profitable growth. For 2023 and beyond, business control and NRM discipline have been identified as one of our core strategic growth enablers.As Commercial Business Controller you are responsible to ensure proper accounting and booking of all Commercial utilization of expenses in Sales and Marketing Expense line and for creating growth strategies for Winsun through portfolio optimization, pricing, active mix management, trade spend utilization and promotional spend excellence. You will collaborate and act as a crucial link between the Marketing, Sales, and Finance teams throughout the process to ensure strategy alignment and execution. As Commercial Business Controller you will be responsible for the following tasks:     1.	Review, compile & evaluate monthly forecast submission from heads of channel, trade & marketing, and submission of consolidated commercial business forecast to various department ie planner & finance     2.	Prepare various analysis report include commercial PL by channels, regions & brand     3.	Review, monitor & tracking of trade & marketing expense, including accruals & actual payment management to avoid surprises in under or over-accruals     4.	Conduct in-depth portfolio assessments to set brand objectives, identify price realization gaps, highlight white spaces and ensure price-pack execution to support the brand and portfolio strategy     5.	Optimize channel-customer / pack mix to accelerate profitable growth for Taisun and customers     6.	Evaluate consumer promotional strategies including alignment with brand objectives, promotional responsiveness as well as ROI profile. Recommend an optimal promotion strategy.      7.	Identify conclusions through in-depth analysis, using financial tools/frameworks and methodologies which will be developed over time for this role     8.	Develop methodologies in order to perform financial analyses and scenario development that will be the base for portfolio pricing simulations and white space launches     9.	Collaborate and act as a crucial link between the Marketing, Customer and Finance teams throughout the NRM process to ensure strategy alignment and execution    10.	Responsible for relationship management with key stakeholders in Modern Trade
Job Requirement: You have good appreciation of marketing, finance and operations and strong problem-solving and analytical skills. You have a strong drive to excel, at all times, within a team and as an individual. You are an achiever with brainpower and stamina to develop and drive in-depth strategic projects. Furthermore, you are a great team player, giving respect and stimulating an environment of enthusiasm.I. Education/Academic Qualifications Degree in Finance, Business, and/or relevant discipline from a notable university.II. Functional knowledge/Technical skillsWhat You’ll Need To Succeed     1.	Strong FMCG experience     2.	Strong analytical skills     3.	Bachelor's or Master’s degree in business           or marketing     4.	2+ years of experience in marketing,      finance, sales or consulting     5.	Fluent English skills     6.	Excellent senior stakeholder management skills     7.	Ability to operate independentlyIII. Professional/Technical Qualifications & LicenseIV. Work Experience     At least 2 years Financing experience in the FMCG industry- Business Environment   I. Key Contacts:    1. Commercial Teams in Cambodia and other geographies within Taisun Group, R&D Team and Up and Downstream Supply Chain including Plant & Manufacturing    2  External：Distributors, Key Accounts & Key decision makers in each channels ( including E-Commerce)Work condition:Working Hours:  8 hours / 5 days (Mon ~ Fri)Working Condition：OfficeTravel is required from time to time.* Send your CV and Cover Letter to our email : recruitment@winsuncambodia.com and CC Email to  ponlok.noeun@winsuncambodia.comFor more information, you may contact us via phone line: 010 756 508 | 015 337 375​
Company Profile:
Winsun Cambodia is a proud member of the Taisun Holding Group and has secured its position as the leader of the Cambodian hygiene products market. With our most well-known diaper brands UniDry and SunMate, we have been offering a sound solution to personal health and hygiene to families across all of Cambodia.
We have over 20 years of experience in the personal hygiene industry and are constantly finding innovative technological solutions to elevate our product quality and benefits. Started as the first diaper manufacturer in Cambodia, we now offer a full scope of hygiene products including baby diapers, adult incontinence products, sanitary pads for ladies, wet wipes, and face masks.

Even though we have become the number one brand in Cambodia, we never forgot what got us here. Our core value “Growing Together” is so much more than just a saying. We sincerely believe that for our business to thrive we must also take good care of all of our stakeholders. We are an active promoter of clean energy and a regular donor to struggling communities all over Southeast Asia.
-Our Mission: To be one of the best solution providers for premium hygiene & natural products.
-Our Vision: To be the leading manufacturer of hygiene products & services in Asia through sustainable development.
General Overview of Winsun:

-120 employees at Winsun Cambodia
-More than 22 years of experience in the industry
-Export business spans across 20 countries worldwide
-Total of 8 product categories, maintaining the ratio of 70% OBM and 30% OEM.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. More projects are expected in the near future.

Company Profile:
Since 2013, Naki Group has grown from a local real estate and property management firm into an investment firm focused on developing the Indo-China belt. With representation in Singapore and Seattle, the Group invests in our 3 key pillars of property development, realty services, and hospitality management.

As a developer, Naki Group has completed Silvertown Metropolitan, a 111-unit condominium in 2014, Woodland Residences, an 84-unit luxury villa gated community to be completed in 2022, and Agile Sky Residence, a 44-storey condominium to be completed in 2022.

As a property management firm, Naki Group have served Silvertown Metropolitan, Woodland Residences, Agile Showroom, TK Avenue Community Mall and The One Mall. In addition to managing medium to large projects, our property management services extend to those smaller shops who require janitorial, pest control and sanitization services.

As a hospitality services provider, Naki Group has maintained a high quality standards of stay to our tenants. From long stay to short stay, we ensure enjoyable accommodation coupled with services of convenience.

Now as a growing real estate company, Naki Group is determined to reach out to larger domestic and overseas projects. On a larger scale, investors both financial and expertise will play a large role in achieving the goal of higher and faster returns to our partners.

job title: Internal Audit Manager ($800-$1000) Boeng Keng Kang
position: Internal Audit Manager ($800-$1000) Boeng Keng Kang
Job Description: • Establish and implementation of audit framework, policies, procedures to comply with applicable laws and parkas • Audits the company’s financial records, statements, and reports, verifying accuracy and consistency.• Audits the company’s information systems, assessing compliance with data security and storage requirements.• Frequently reviews internal controls, policies, and procedures for effectiveness.• Prepare and present audit finding report and recommendations to improve operations to Mgt and BoD in the monthly and quarterly basic • Implement internal and checking policy, procedures and ensure compliance respective SOP• Verify and assess that appropriate controls or measures are implemented and practiced by the audited.• Investigate and search for fundamental reason of irregularities and errors• Conduct regular field visit as per internal plan including investigate frauds and staff compliants • Periodically monitor and check monthly/weekly reports to National Bank of Cambodia (NBC) and other regulatory reports • Perform testing over internal control system of JCF (i.e. Compliance Function) to ensure a good governance and effectively  • Prepare and submit regulatory report to regulators (i.e. Annual Internal Control Report to NBC) • Assist external auditors for preparing annual audited financial statement for NBC • Assist accounting team and compliance on tax matters   •Assist HR/Admin on some admin work (i.e. register or update company information to Authorities) •Work with other departments in the company to deal with problems and making risk protection procedures• Performs other related duties as assigned by the Mgt and BoD

Job Description:
Job Summary:
The Sale executive plays an important role in building strategic relationships with OEM/ODM clients in the cosmeceutical and Nutraceutical industries. The Sales executive will ensure customer satisfaction of existing customer relationships and sign on new customers of a similar type. The sales executive will be responsible for achieving sales quota and account targets.

Essential Job Functions:
- Develop new OEM/ODM accounts.
- Execute the Sales department development strategic plans.
- Continuously develop relationships with priority customer stakeholders, understand their key business issues, and recommend ways to deliver value
- Manage key account business and grow year to year customer orders
- Achieve assigned key accounts revenue objectives
- Identify, target, and close new business
- Support key account customer requirements and assist in orchestrating resources that align with needs
- Create strong relationships based on trust, integrity, and customer satisfaction to drive sales and repeat business
- Maintain comprehensive knowledge of beauty and wellness industry and customers to identify and propose unique solutions
- As a trusted advisor, build in-depth knowledge of clients’ wants and needs, challenges and initiatives that can be translated into additional Revoked Cambodia opportunities.
- Travel required in this role (customer meetings within territory, annual sales events, sales booths in trade shows etc.).
- Additional work days required: the 1st and 3rd Saturday of every month
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in business administration or related field or equivalent training.
- 2+ years of successful sales experience. (if in beauty and supplements products will be a plus)
- Proven track record of selling cosmeceutical and nutraceutical solutions and building OEM/ODM customers.
- Excellent in strategic selling and take the lead in high-level sales engagements.
- Ability to generate leads, penetrate new accounts and develop and manage a pipeline.
- Excellent communication and presentation skills [written, verbal, and listening].
- Strong negotiation skills with a problem-solving attitude.
Excellent interpersonal skills with an aptitude for building strong customer relationships.
- A hunter mentality with a proven track record of prospecting and closing new business at new accounts.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information EFG Cambodia   017 888 349 efgcareer@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017 888 349

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description: The Legal Officer shall be responsible for monitoring and/or advising on all legal matters, commercial contracts, and agreements. The Legal Officer shall also ensure the company complies with the statutory and corporate governance practices and guidelines as observed in the industry.Duties & Responsibilities:·Preparing and managing Contracts, Leases, security documents, MISAs, MOUs and other legal documents between the company and other parties·Reviewing and negotiating various agreements and documents with suppliers and customers including MISA, AWO, confidential agreements, tender documents etc.·Communicating with external attorneys to provide legal advice on the issues related to the institution’s obligations, rights, risks and organization privileges if needed·Collaborating with the Senior Executive Team and other internal departments such as HR, Finance to ensure Legal Compliance for the company’s operations·Coordinating with Human Resources, Management Team or external attorneys (if needed) in order to enforce procedures and policies legally·Reviewing and vetting demand letters, statutory notices, pleadings, affidavits and other relevant litigation documents·Providing guidance on Litigation matters·Managing litigation records and regular review of litigation matters·Liaising with external lawyers to defend the company’s rights involved in contract negotiation, disputes settlement, and litigation in needed; and·Any other duties assigned from time to time
Job Requirement: ·Good legal analysis skills·Excellent speaking and writing skills in English and Khmer, including the ability to draft material in a variety of styles, for different audiences and within tight deadlines·Public speaking skills·Ability to manage staff and provide leadership·Ability to work under pressure, without administrative support·Ability to undertake a variety of tasks within the same time frame·Basic computer literacy. ·Bachelor degree in law.·Certified lawyers are highly encouraged to apply and will be given priority.
Contact Info: Contact Information Lena Administration Manager 0888169303 admin@evolinkgroup.com Phnom Penh Flatiron by Meridian 0888169303

Job Description:
The Senior Hydroelectric Engineer (Specialist) is a full-time hybrid role located in Phnom
Penh, with flexibility for some remote work. The role requires the management of
hydroelectric power plant facilities and development of new power plant projects. The
successful candidate will be responsible for planning, designing, and implementing largescale hydroelectric power generation projects while ensuring compliance with local
regulations and environmental standards. Additionally, they will be responsible forsupervising and directing the work of hydroelectric engineers and engineering teams, as
well as overseeing the operation and maintenance of the power plants.
Job Requirement:
Bachelor's or master's degree in Electrical, Mechanical, Civil Engineering, or a related field
A minimum of 2 years of experience working with hydroelectric power plant development
and management
Strong technical knowledge of hydroelectric power generating equipment and systems,
including turbines, generators, switchgear, and electrical systems
A deep understanding of power system modeling and analysis, knowledge of grid codes,
grid integration studies, and regulatory policies related to hydroelectric power projects
Experience leading and supervising multidisciplinary teams of engineers and technicians
Effective time management skills, the ability to work independently and in teams, and
excellent written and verbal communication skills
Fluency in English and Khmer is required
Professional engineering certifications or licenses in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical
Engineering, or Civil Engineering are a plus

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
